loans.name: Muhabat

texts.ru: Мухабат 1970 года рождения, замужем имеет 5 детей. Имеет среднее образование. Она разводит коров и овец, также у нее есть козы. В бизнесе помогает муж и сыновья. Муж раньше работал в России, сейчас находиться  дома и работает мастером ремонтных работ. Двое сыновей находятся в России также присылают деньги.  Она в течении 22 лет разводит скот. Сотрудничает с нашей организацией с 2011 года. Кредит получила для покупки коров и овец.
texts.en: Muhabat was born in 1970.  She is married and has five children.  She has a secondary education.  Muhabat breeds cattle and sheep and also has goats.  Her husband and sons help her with the business.  Her husband previously worked in Russia and is now home and works as a repairman.  Two of their sons are in Russia and send money home.  Muhabat has been breeding livestock for 22 years.  She has been partnering with our organization since 2011.  She is requesting this loan for the purchase of cattle and sheep.

loans.use: to purchase cattle and sheep

loans.name: Hinde Group

texts.fr: HINDE est un groupe de trois personnes, dont les membres résident dans le même quartier au Bénin. La représentante du groupe, Aïssatou Alakè (celle qui est au milieu sur la photo et dont la main est levée), est âgée de 43 ans. Aïssatou Alakè est mariée à un certain Pierre. Le couple a deux enfants tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Aïssatou Alakè vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Aïssatou Alakè a arrêté l’école au cours secondaire. Pour faire face à ses différentes charges, Aïssatou Alakè vend divers produits (conserves, etc.) à son domicile. Parallèlement à cette activité, Aïssatou Alakè vend du jus de bissap. Aïssatou Alakè s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et en vue élargir son activité, Aïssatou Alakè sollicite un premier crédit auprès de ALIDé, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe HINDE. Ce crédit leur servira à mieux répondre aux demandes de leur clientèle et à se faire plus de profits.
texts.en:
HINDE is a group of three persons whose members reside in the same district in Benin. The group's representative, Aïssatou Alakè (who is in the middle of the photo with her hand raised), is 43 years old and married to Pierre. The couple have two children, both in school and in their care. Aïssatou Alakè lives together with her husband and children. The couple jointly cover the diverse household expenses. 

Aïssatou Alakè dropped out of secondary school. To cope with her different expenses, she sells a variety of goods (canned foods, etc.) out of her home. Parallel to this business, she sells bissap juice (made from dried hibiscus flowers). Her supplies come from a market in Benin. 

Seeking to satisfy her customers and to expand her business, Aïssatou Alakè together with the other members of the group HINDE are requesting an initial loan from ALIDé. This loan will serve to respond better to the demands of their customers and to make more profit.

loans.use: to buy a variety of goods (canned foods, etc.)

loans.name: Sanzu B Group

texts.fr:
Laurette est une commerçante âgée de 32 ans qui habite à Ruyigi.Elle vendeuse de la bière de banane comme son mari Alexis. Elle a étudié jusqu’en 4e année année primaire. Elle fait le commerce depuis 2 ans. Avant de se lancer dans le commerce, elle était cultivatrice. Le couple a 4 enfants dont 2 étudient. Elle a déjà bénéficié 3 crédits de Turame.
Le crédit Kiva qu’elle obtient , lui permet d’augmenter son capital et l’achat d’une ou deux chèvres pour avoir du fumier.
Elle membre du groupe communautaire « Sanzu B ».
texts.en:
Laurette is a 32-year-old shopkeeper living in Ruyigi. Along with her husband, she sells banana beer. She studied up to the fourth year of primary school and has been involved in business for two years. Before starting this business, she was a farmer. The couple have four children, two of whom are in school. She has already benefited from three loans through Turame.
The Kiva loan that she obtains will allow her to increase her capital and buy one or two goats to have manure.
She is a member of the community group "Sanzu B".

loans.use: To increase her capital and to buy one or two goats for manure.

loans.name: Sainte Trinite Group

texts.fr: Le groupe SAINTE TRINITE est composé de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. C'est la deuxième fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de son activité. La représentante  du groupe, du nom de Noèlie est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Noèlie est âgée de 28 ans et vit au Bénin. Noèlie n’a jamais fréquenté l’école. Noèlie est mariée à un enseignant du nom de Marcelin. Le couple a trois enfants tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Noèlie vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Afin d‘assurer les diverses charges de la famille, Noèlie vend depuis trois ans, des fruits de façon ambulante. Noèlie s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Noèlie sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe SAINTE TRINITE, un deuxième crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en:
The Sainte Trinite group consists of three people who live in the same neighborhood. This is the second time that this group is requesting financial support from ALIDé, in order to increase the level of their business. 

The representative of the group. by the name of Noèlie, is the one who has her hand raised on the photo. Noèlie is 28 years old and lives in Bénin. Noèlie never went to school. Noèlie is married to a teacher by the name of Marcelin. The couple has three dependent children who all go to school. Noèlie lives together with her husband and children. 

In order to take care of the diverse family responsibilities, Noèlie has been selling fruit as a street vendor for three years. Noèlie gets her supplies in a market of Bénin. In seeking to satisfy her customers and to grow her turnover and her income, Noèlie is requesting a second loan from ALIDé together with the other members of the Sainte Trinite group.

loans.use: to buy fruit.

loans.name: Irina

texts.ru:
Ирина просит предоставить ей кредит для закупки зимнего ассортимента обуви. Предыдущий кредит помог ей сделать удачные закупки и получить дополнительную прибыль на продаже весенне-летнего товара. За счет полученной прибыли Ирина улучшает свои жилищные условия - делает мелкий ремонт, покупает бытовую технику.

У Ирины трое взрослых детей. Ирина живет вместе со старшей дочерью в своем доме. Дочь пошла по стопам матери и начала свой бизнес. Сын и младшая дочь с семьями проживают отдельно.
texts.en: Irina is requesting this loan for the purchase of a winter selection of shoes.  Her previous loan helped her to make successful purchases and earn an additional profit from the sales of spring-summer merchandise.  Irina uses her profits to improve her living conditions - makes small repairs and buys household appliances.  Irina has three adult daughters.  She lives with the oldest daughter in their own house.  Her daughter followed her mother's steps and started her own business.  Irina's son and youngest daughter live with their own families.

loans.use: to expand the selection of winter shoes

loans.name: Rafoat

texts.ru: Рафоат 51 год, замужем, имеет 3 детей. Муж  работает на заводе. Она торгует тортами и пирожными. Кондитерские цеха привозят ей товар, и она их продает. Рафоат в бизнесе 15 лет, а с нашей организацией сотрудничает с 2010 года. Сейчас у нее сезон в торговле. Впереди Новый год и она планирует реализовать почти весь товар. По ее словам каждый день она продает более 20 тортов и несколько коробок с кондитерскими изделиями. У нее есть постоянные клиенты не только с городов но и с дальних районов. Так как сейчас у нее есть большой заказ на торты, для этого ей нужны были наличные деньги, поэтому она получает у нас кредит.
texts.en: Rafoat is 51 years old, married and has three children.  Her husband works at a factory.  She sells cakes and pastries.  Bakeries deliver products to her, and she sells them.  Rafoat has been in the business for 15 years and has been partnering with our organization since 2010.  This is a good season for sales.  New Year's holiday is coming up, and she plans to sells almost all of her products.  According to Rafoat, she sells over 20 cakes and several boxes of confectionery goods every day.  She has regular customers, who come not only from the cities, but from remote districts.  Because she has a large order for cakes, she needs cash, and this is why she is requesting this loan from us.

loans.use: to purchase cakes and pastries

loans.name: Kosso-Lou Group

texts.fr: Le groupe KOSSO-LOU est composé de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. C'est la première fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de son activité. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Céline Abèkè est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Céline Abèkè est âgée de 33 ans et vit au Bénin. Céline Abèkè a arrêté l’école au niveau primaire. Céline Abèkè est mariée à un certain Walilou. Le couple a quattre enfants tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Céline Abèkè vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants.  Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Afin d'assurer les diverses charges de la famille, Céline Abèkè vend  des bijoux de façon ambulante. Céline Abèkè s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin et au Nigeria. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Céline Abèkè sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe KOSSO-LOU, un premier crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en:
The Kosso-Lou group consists of three people who live in the same neighborhood. This is the first time that this group is requesting financial aid from ALIDé, in order to elevate the level of their business. 

The representative of the group, by the name of Céline Abèkè, is the one who has her hand raised on the photo. Céline Abèkè is 33 years old and lives in Bénin. Céline Abèkè stopped school at the primary level. Céline Abèkè is married to a certain Walilou. The couple has four dependent children who all go to school. Céline Abèkè lives together with her husband and children. The couple takes care of the diverse household responsibilities together. 

In order to take care of the diverse family responsibilities, Céline Abèkè sells jewelry as a street vendor. Céline Abèkè gets her supplies in a market of Bénin and in Nigeria. In seeking to satisfy her clientèle and to grow her turnover and her income, Céline Abèkè is requesting a first loan from ALIDé together with the other members of the Kosso-Lou group.

loans.use: to buy jewelry.

loans.name: Arlen Martina

texts.es: Arlen está en el último año de su carrera de Derecho, está solicitando el crédito para pagar el curso de finalización de estudios y poder obtener su título. Le inspiran a seguir adelante sus hijos y sus padres porque desea una mejor vida para ellos. Anhela una casa propia para su familia. Dentro de algunos años se ve trabajando en un bufete jurídico. Dentro sus planes está estudiar dos idiomas inglés y francés. A través de sus estudios espera también poder poner una empresa de taxis junto a su compañero de vida y así poder tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Arlen is in the last year of her degree program in Law. She is applying for the loan to pay for her final course, and obtain her degree. 

Her children and her parents inspire her to keep moving forward, because she wishes a better life for them. 

Within a few years, she sees herself working in a law practice. Her plans include studying two languages: English and French. 

Through her studies, she also hopes to be able to set up a taxi company with her life companion, and so be able to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: To pay for the final course for her degree.

loans.name: Rondera A Group

texts.fr:
George est un commerçant de Bière depuis deux ans, âgé de 33 ans.
Il habite à Rutegama et il est marié à Marcienne. Le couple a 4 enfants, l’’aîné a 8 ans, il est en première année primaire. Georges a étudié jusqu’en 6e année primaire année primaire.
Avant de se lancer dans son activité actuelle, il était agriculteur comme sa femme.
Il a déjà bénéficié 3 crédits avec Turame. Le crédit Kiva qu’il obtient, lui permet d’augmenter son capital, il pourra augmenter la quantité de bières à revendre afin d’avoir plus de bénéfices.
Il est membre du groupe communautaire « Rondera A ».
texts.en:
Georges is 33 years old and has been a beer-seller for two years.
He lives in Rutegama and is married to Marcienne. The couple have four children, the eldest of whom is 8 and in his second year of primary school. Georges completed six years of primary school education.
Before starting his current business, he was a farmer, as was his wfe.
He has already benefited from three loans with Turame. The Kiva loan that he obtains will allow him to augment his capital, and he will be able to increase the amount of beer he sells in order to obtain more profits.
He is member of the community group "Rondera A".

loans.use: To augment his capital and increase the amount of beer sold in order to have higher profits.

loans.name: María Carmen

texts.es:
María es una mujer honrada, trabajadora y alegre, tiene 68 años de edad y es viuda. Vive con su hija en Ibarra Provincia de Imbabura, al norte de Ecuador.

María trabaja sola en la crianza de pollos, debido a que no tiene otro ingreso económico, además ella tiene que sustentar los gastos diarios de su familia y de su casa. Trabaja con Fodemi desde el año 2007, el actual crédito que solicita es para la compra de materiales como madera, cemento, arena para reconstruir el galpón de sus pollos ya que el actual está en malas condiciones y sus animales pueden enfermarse ocacionando pérdidas en sus ingresos.

El sueño de María es poder construir un galpón grande para incrementar su negocio y poder sistribuir a grandes empresas.
texts.en:
María is an honest, hard-working and cheerful woman. She is 68, and a widow. She lives with her son in the town of Ibarra, in Imbabura province, in northern Ecuador. 

Maria works on her own, raising chickens. This is because she doesn't have other income, and also has to support the daily expenses of her family and household. She has been working with Fodemi since 2007. 

The current loan she is applying for, is to buy materials such as wood, cement, and sand for rebuilding her chicken shed. The present one is in poor condition, and the animals can get sick, resulting in losses to her income. 

María's dream is to build a large shed, in order to increase her business, and be able to distribute to large companies.

loans.use: To buy material, such as wood, cement, and sand, to build a new shed for her chickens, since the current one is in very bad condition.

loans.name: Nazirjon

texts.ru: Назирчону 23 года, женат, детей пока нет. Он самостоятельно разводит крупный рогатый скот. Он недавно женился и что бы прокормить свою молодую семью решил получить кредит, чтобы увеличить поголовье скота. Он хотел уехать в Россию на заработки, но родители не пустили, так как семья еще молодая. Назирчон разводит скот с детсва, этому его научил его отец и дед, и теперь его опыту уже почти 13 лет. Назирчон посчитал, что сейчас очень выгодно закупить скот, так как он немного подешевел и с этой целью просит кредит.
texts.en: Nazirjon is 23 years old, married and does not yet have children.  He independently breeds cattle.  He recently got married and , in order to provide for his family, decided to obtain a loan to increase livestock headcount.  He wanted to go to Russia for work, but his parents did not let him because his family is still young.  Nazirjon has been breeding livestock since childhood because his father and grandfather taught him this business, and now he has almost 13 years of experience.  Nazirjon decided that now is a good time to buy livestock because its prices slightly dropped, and he is requesting the loan for this purpose.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Twiyunge I Group

texts.fr:
Donatien est une commerçante âgée de 36ans qui habite à Gitega. Il vend des tomates depuis 8ans. Il a commencé cette activité alors qu’elle faisait l’agriculture. Il a un niveau d’études primaire. Il est marié à Geneviève et ont ensemble 4 enfants dont 2 étudient. 
Le crédit Kiva qu’il obtient lui permet d’augmenter son capital pour acheter une  grande quantité de tomates à revendre.

Il est membre  du groupe  communautaire«Twiyunge».
texts.en:
Donatien is a 36-year-old retailer who lives in Gitega. He has sold tomatoes for eight years. He began this activity while he was a farmer. He has a primary school education. He is married to Geneviève, and the two have four children together, two of whom are in school.
The Kiva loan he obtains will allow him to increase his capital in order to buy a large quantity of tomatoes for resale.

He is a member of the community group "Twiyunge".

loans.use: To augment his capital in order to buy a large quantity of tomatoes for resale.

loans.name: Omar

texts.es: Omar, de 53 años de edad, es un hombre trabajador y decidido, además de amable. Convive con Cristina quien también se dedica a la agricultura, vive en compañía de su pareja y su hijo de 14 años de edad, habitando en su casa propia. La actividad que realiza Omar es la agricultura,  para eso cuenta con un terreno de 7 hectáreas de extensión que compró hace 3 años, ahí siembra yuca, papaya; asimismo para que lo ayuden en las labores de mantenimiento y cosecha contrata los servicios de hasta 2 peones a los que paga por día trabajando 20 nuevos soles. Le gusta su actividad ya que le genera un ingreso económico para mantener y solventar sus gastos del hogar. Comenta que escogió ésta actividad por la necesidad de tener una oficio a la cual dedicarse, ya que durante su juventud no logró terminar sus estudios y viendo la necesidad económica y mantener una familiar ha optado por éste trabajo. Ahora tiene planes de seguir y ampliar con más plantaciones y de esa manera aumentar su producción. Este será el préstamo número 4 con la institución MFP, se siente agradecida de contar con una línea de crédito para avanzar con su actividad, por tanto se compromete en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas como en créditos anteriores, de esa manera tendrá un record crediticio. Con el monto solicitado de 2000 nuevos soles, lo invertirá en la compra de porcinos para implementar un nuevo negocio de crianza de chanchos, contando para eso con un corral preparado en su propiedad.
texts.en:
Omar is 53 years old. He is a hard-working and determined man, and also friendly. He lives with his partner Cristina, who is also a farmer. He lives with his partner, and his 14 year-old son in their own house. 

He is a farmer, and has a seven hectare piece of land that he bought three years ago. There he grows yuca, and papaya.  As well, he hires the services of up to two workers to help him maintain and harvest his crop. He pays them 20 nuevos soles per day of work. 

He likes what he does, as it generates income for supporting his family, and paying the household expenses. He says that he chose this livelihood because he needed a trade to work at, as in his youth, he didn't manage to complete his schooling. Seeing the financial necessity, and having a family member to support, he chose this work.

Now he plans to continue, and to expand with more planting, and in that way increase his production. 

This will be his fourth loan with MFP.  He is grateful to have a line of credit in order to progress with his business, so he promises to pay his instalments, as with his previous loans. That way he will have a good credit record. 

With the amount of 2,000 nuevos soles that he has applied for, he will buy pigs in order to launch a new pig-raising business. For that purpose, he has a pen already prepared on his property.

loans.use: To buy pigs.

loans.name: Sanzu A Group

texts.fr:
Lenatte est âgée de 33 ans, elle a  son restaurant  qui fonctionne depuis 5 ans. Elle habite à Ruyigi. Son ancienne activité est le commerce de la bière. Elle a étudié jusqu’en 6 è année primaire Elle est marié à Joseph, ensemble ont 5 enfants dont 3 étudient. Il a déjà bénéficié  10 crédits avec Turame. Le crédit Kiva, lui permet d’augmenter son capital en achetant d’autres ustensiles pour augmenter la quantité de nourriture  à vendre dans le restaurant.
Elle est membre du groupe  du  « Sanzu I  »
texts.en:
Lenatte is 33 years old and has run a restaurant for five years. She lives in Ruyigi. Her previous business was selling beer. She studied through six years of primary school. She is married to Joseph, and the couple have five children together, three of whom are in school. She has already benefited from 10 loans with Turame. This Kiva loan will allow her to increase her capital by buying additional kitchenware to increase the amount of food sold in the restaurant. 
She is member of the "Sanzu I" group.

loans.use: To increase her capital by buying additional kitchenware to increase the amount of food sold in her restaurant.

loans.name: El Hadji Ousmane

texts.fr: L'emprunteur est un jeune qui a arrêté ses études en classe de troisième au collège car étant le seul soutien de  ses deux parents. Il s'est lancé alors dans le transport de marchandises par charrette. Avec la saturation de ce secteur, il ne parvenait plus à assurer le versement quotidien à son employeur et à avoir un bénéfice.Il s'est alors tourné du côté du transport par motocyclette, principale moyen de déplacement dans sa ville.Après un an, il arrive à acheter sa propre moto et à épargner dans son compte ouvert à l'UIMCEC.Il parvient aussi à assurer régulièrement a dépense quotidienne pour l'entretien de sa famille. Aujourd'hui, pour améliorer ses revenus, il veut acheter une nouvelle motocyclette et  sollicite ainsi  auprès de l'UIMCEC un prêt de 400 000f.Son ambition est de constituer un parc de motocyclette de transport dans sa localité.
texts.en:
The borrower is a youth who stopped his studies in the third year of college because he was the only one supporting his two parents. So he began transporting merchandise by cart. With the saturation of this sector, he was no longer able to make the daily payments to his employer and make a profit. 

So he turned to motorcycle transport, which is the main mode of transportation in his town. After one year, he was able to buy his own motorcycle and to save in his account opened at the UIMCEC. He also manages to regularly take care of the daily expenses for the care of his family. 

Today, to improve his income, he wants to buy a new motorcycle and is thus requesting a loan of 400,000f from the UIMCEC. His goal is to set up a motorcycle transport park in his town.

loans.use: to buy a new motorcycle.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fuelwood and feed for chicks and fowl.

loans.name: Agban-Lin Group

texts.fr: Le groupe AGBAN-LIN est composé de trois personnes qui vivent dans le même quartier. C'est la première fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de son activité. La représentante  du groupe, du nom de Afiavi Virginie est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Afiavi Virginie est âgée de 39 ans et vit au Bénin. Afiavi Virginie a arrêté l’école au niveau secondaire. Afiavi Virginie est mariée à un certain Ludovic. Le couple a quatre enfants dont certains scolarisés et tous à leur charge. Afiavi Virginie assure ensemble avec son mari les divers besoins de la maison. Afin de subvenir à ses besoins et à ceux de ses enfants, Afiavi Virginie vend depuis une vingtaine d’année, divers produits ( savons, etc..). Afiavi Virginie s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Afiavi Virginie sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe AGBAN-LIN, un premier crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en: The AGBAN-LIN group is made up of three women who live in the same neighborhood.  This is the first time that the group is requesting financial aid through ALIDé, in order to increase their business activity.  The group's representative, named Afiavi Virginie, has her hand raised in the photo.  Afiavi Virginie is 39 years old and lives in Benin.  She stopped attending school at the secondary level.  She is married to a man named Ludovic.  The couple has four children, some of whom are in school and all of whom are in their care.  Afiavi Virginie shares the various household expenses with her husband.  To meet her and her children's needs, she has been selling various products (soap, etc.) for about 20 years.  She buys her products in a market in Benin.  With the goal of satisfying her customers and to increase her business capital and income, Afiavi Virginie and the rest of the AGBAN-LIN group are requesting their first loan through ALIDé.

loans.use: to buy various products (soap, etc.).

loans.name: Karla Martina

texts.es:
Karla, habitante de uno de los barrios más populares y pintorescos de la ciudad de León, tiene 42 años de edad , es comerciante , se dedica a la venta de ropa usada , es casada, tiene 2 hijos de 17 y 14 años de edad respectivamente . Su negocio lo tiene por herencia de su madre quien era la que vendía pero por su edad avanzada se retiró pero durante ese tiempo Karla aprendió  del negocio ya lleva 10 años que ella misma administra y vende su esposo la apoya en el hogar con lo que gana como mecánico industrial. 
Ella realizo el crédito para compra de una paca de ropa usada. Pues este tipo de  mercadería genera buenas ganancias se vende a muy buen precio la posibilidad de comprar este tipo de mercadería es muy accesible para los clientes. Uno de sus planes es mejorar infraestructura de su negocio y comprar pacas de ropa de niño y adultos.
texts.en:
Karla, a resident of one of the most popular and picturesque neighborhoods of the city of Leon, is 42 years old, is a merchant, sells used clothing, is married, and has 2 children of 17 and 14 years old respectively.  She acquired her business by inheritance.  Her mother used to sell but since she in now in advanced years she has retired, but during that time Karla learned about the business and it has now been 10 years since she herself has administered and sold.  Her husband supports her at home with what he makes as an industrial engineer.
She asked for the loan to buy a bale of used clothing for this type of merchandise generates good profits. It is sold at a good price and the possibility of buying this type of merchandise is very accessible to the customer.  One of her plans is to improve the infrastructure of her business and to buy bales of children and adult clothing.

loans.use: to purchase a bale of used clothing.

loans.name: Sharafniso

texts.ru: Шарафнисо 36 лет, замужем и имеет 2 детей. Сотрудничает с нашей организацией с 2008 года. Имеет среднее образование. После того как окончила школу  и начала работу с матерью и через несколько лет вышла замуж. Несколько лет сидела дома по уходу за детьми. Восемь лет назад ее родственница предложила работу продавщицы в магазине. Проработав год , она решила сама начать свой бизнес, муж поддержал в этом предложении и теперь у нее свой бизнес. Более 5 лет она торгует на рынке своего района. Прибыль от бизнеса Шарафнисо тратит на семейные расходы и на своих детей. Настоящий кредит Шарафнисо получает на пополнения своего прилавка на новый год конфетами и кондитерскими изделиями. Надеется на высокую реализацию на праздничные дни. Благодарна "Арванд"-у за поддержку.
texts.en: Sharafniso is 36 years old, married and has two children.  She has been partnering with our organization since 2008.  She has a secondary education.  After graduating from school, Sharafniso started working with her mother and then got married several years later.  She stayed home for a few years and took care of the children.  Then, her relative offered her a salesperson job at a store eight years ago.  After working for one year, she decided to start her own business.  Her husband supported her decision, and now she has her own business.  Sharafniso has been selling at her district market for over five years.  She spends the profit from the business on family expenses and her children.  Sharafniso is requesting this loan to refill her store inventory with candy and confectionery goods.  She hopes to have high sales during the holidays.  She is grateful to "Arvand" for the support.

loans.use: to purchase candy and confectionery products

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es:
Luis es un hombre de 45 años que vive junto a su familia en "Latacunga" que es un cantón situado en el centro de Ecuador, al suroeste del volcán que da nombre a la provincia del "Chimborazo", constituyendo un punto de enlace entre la Costa, los Andes y la Amazonia. Posee un clima templado, a veces ventoso y frío. Desde allí se puede llegar a toda la provincia que ofrece a sus visitantes la belleza de sus lagunas, aire puro y una hermosa vegetación. La presencia de actividad volcánica en la zona ha llevado a la acumulación de depósitos de piedra pómez que actualmente están siendo extraídos, así como la presencia de agua con gas, que es embotellada.

Luis aprendió de sus padres el oficio de la agricultura. El siembra maíz y chochos (que es un grano típico de la región andina). Trabaja diariamente de 8 a 10 horas siendo su mayor obstáculo la gran distancia que hay desde su casa hasta su terreno. El desea invertir en semillas y fertilizantes para de esta manera aumentar su producción. El ofrece un producto de calidad gracias a su esfuerzo. Con esta inversión él está seguro de que obtendrá mayores ingresos.

El desea que su familia tenga una vida mejor. La vida en el campo es muy dura, pero sin embargo el ama la agricultura que hasta hoy ha sido su sustento.
texts.en:
Luis is a 45-year-old man who lives with his family in Latacunga, which is a canton in the center of Ecuador southwest of the volcano that gave its name to the Chimborazo Province.  It is a central point in the intersection of the coast, the Andes, and the Amazon.  It has a temperate climate that is sometimes windy and cold.  From there you can reach the entire province, which offers its visitors beautiful lagoons, clean air, and gorgeous vegetation.  The volcanic activity in the area has increased the accumulation of pumice deposits, which are currently being mined.  It has also led to the presence of sparkling water, which is bottled.

Luis learned how to farm from his parents.  He grows corn and chochos, which are a common grain in the Andean region.  He works between 8 and 10 hours every day, with his biggest obstacle being the distance between his home and his land.  He wants to invest in seeds and fertilizers to increase his yield.  He offers a quality product thanks to his hard work.  With this investment, he is sure he will earn more.

He wants his family to have a better life.  Life in the country is hard, but regardless of that, he loves farming because it has always been his means of support.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers for his crops

loans.name: Ganga Maya

texts.en:
Ganga Maya is 40 years old. She is married and has two children who are 15 and 5 years old. In 2004, she established her tailoring business. Working 7 days a week and 10 hours a day, she supports her family. She has already received and successfully repaid five loans from Patan BPW and used her most recent to buy raw materials for her business.  In the future, Ganga Maya plans to uplift the economic condition of her family.  She thanks you for your support. 

In the Kathmandu Valley, clothing is made to order.  Tailor stalls line the streets where storeowners sell material and work their sewing machines.  These skilled tailors make school uniforms for children as well as the traditional women's kurta surwal and men's daura surwal.  With a Kiva loan, BPW borrowers are able to purchase additional cloth material or sewing machines that will increase production and profitability.

loans.use: to buy raw material

loans.name: Valentina

texts.ru:
Валентина - вдова.  Она имеет свой небольшой бизнес - продает женскую одежду и колготы в киоске на одном из городских рынков. Валентина начала заниматься этим бизнесом 15 лет назад. За это время она приобрела опыт, рассширила свой бизнес. На данный момент у нее две торговых точки. Бизнес идет хорошо.
Валентина просит предоставить ей кредит в сумме 10,000 гривен на закупку зимней одежды. Валентина надеется получить дополнительную прибыль и сделать небольшой ремонт у себя дома, где она живет со своим сыном и невесткой.
texts.en: Valentina is a widow.  She has her own small business and sells women's clothing and stockings at a kiosk at one of the city's markets.  Valentina became involved in this business 15 years ago.  She gained experience and expanded her business during this time.  Currently, she has two retail outlets.  The business is going well.  Valentina is requesting a loan in the sum of 10,000 hryvnia to purchase winter clothing.  She hopes to make an additional profit and make minor repairs at home, where she lives with her son and daughter-in-law.

loans.use: to expand the selection of winter clothing

loans.name: Abdurahim

texts.ru: Абдурахиму 23 года, он еще не женат. Живет со своей матерью. Отца рано потеряли, и их вырастила их мать. Мать раньше торговала на рынке зеленью, со временем она перешла на овощи и фрукты. Возраст и погодные условия не позволяли часто выходить на торговлю. Абдурахим помогал с сестрой торговать матери. Сестра вышла замуж, он остался один с матерью. Теперь полностью контролирует семейный бизнес. У нас кредит получил впервые, раньше товар привозил в рассрочку.  А сейчас перед новым годом ему необходимо привезти товар на наличные, потому что так дешевле и быстрее получить товар.
texts.en: Abdurahim is 23 years old and not yet married.  He lives with his mother.  His father died early, and his mother raised him.  His mother previously sold herbs at a market and then transitioned to selling fruits and vegetables.  Her age and weather conditions did not allow her to work often, so Abdurahim and his sister helped their mother with the sales.  The sister got married, and he was left alone with his mother.  Now, he fully controls the family business.  Abdurahim obtained a loan from us for the first time and previously bought his products in installments.  He currently needs cash to bring in products in anticipation of the New Year's holiday because it is cheaper and quicker to get products with cash.

loans.use: to purchase apples

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy fresh fish.

loans.name: Julio C. Tello Al Progreso Group

texts.es: Juliana es integrante de la Alcancía Comunal “Julio C. Tello al Progreso” grupo conformado por 07 socios responsables y trabajadores. Juliana tiene 19 años de edad es conviviente y tiene 01hijo la cual ha sido su motivo para seguir mejorando cada día, actualmente Juliana trabaja como mesera en un restaurante, gracias a su trabajo le ha permitido mejorar su economía, ya que puede aportar con los gastos de su hogar. El deseo de Juliana es de comprarse su propio terreno, ya que por el momento vive en casa de sus suegros. En esta oportunidad solicito el crédito para la compra de víveres para su hogar como arroz, azúcar, fideos y leche. La Alcancía Comunal “Julio C. Tello al Progreso” agradecen el crédito brindado y se comprometen a seguir trabajando bien con el Programa- Prosperidad. Adjuntamos la fotografía de Floriana.
texts.en: Juliana is a member of the “Julio C. Tello al Progreso” Communal Bank, which has seven responsible and hard-working members. Juliana is 19, lives with her partner, and has one daughter who has always been her inspiration to continue improving every day. Juliana works as a waitress in a restaurant. Thanks to her job, she has been able to improve her income and contribute to the household income. Juliana wants to buy her own plot of land, since she currently lives in her in-laws' home. She requested this loan for the purchase of groceries for her home, such as rice, sugar, pasta and milk. The “Julio C. Tello al Progreso” Communal Bank are grateful for this loan and promise to continue to work well with the Programa Prosperidad. We have added in the photo of Floriana.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar, pasta and milk.

loans.name: Miriam

texts.es:
La señora Miriam se dedica  de artículos de piel como es  bolsas ,cinturones y carteras, ellas nos cuenta que lo que mas le gusta de su negocio es la atención que le da a sus clientes.
Su mercancía la da en pagos quincenales  y también vende dulces y refrescos.
Tiene la cantidad de  dos hijos el motivo de su inspiración para trabajar con mas gusto.
Ella pidió el préstamo para comprar mas mercancía: bolsas ,carteras y cinturones.
Le da las gracias a fundación por el apoyo que le ha dado para segur trabajando.
texts.en:
Señora Miriam sells leather items such as bags, belts and wallets. She tells us that she most enjoys tending to her customers.
Her merchandise is paid for every two weeks, and she also sells candy and pop.
She has two children who are her motivation to work harder.
She requested this loan for the purchase of more merchandise: bags, wallets and belts.
She thanks the Fundacion for the support that they have given her so that she can continue working.

loans.use: to buy leather bags to sell.

loans.name: Mehri

texts.ru: Мехри второй раз получает кредит в нашей организации. Она первый кредит использовала на ремонт квартиры, закончив решила получив кредит и купить  мебель. Её сын работает на заводе специалистом информационных систем. Его заработная плата составляет 700 сомони, а так как у Мехри нет мужа (в разводе), он полностью помогает маме в семейных расходах. В том году Мехри выдала дочь замуж, поэтому пока сына не женила, но есть планы в начале весны сыграть свадьбу. Она работает в магазине продавцом, хозяин  платит ей в месяц 600 сомони (123 доллара США), что даёт ей возможность без проблем погасить полученный кредит.
texts.en: This is Mehri's second time obtaining a loan from our organization.  She used the first loan to make repairs to her apartment and, after repaying it, decided to obtain another loan and purchase furniture.  Mehri's son works as an Information Systems Specialist at a factory.  His salary is 700 somoni, and because Mehri does not have a husband (divorced), he fully supports his mother with family expenses.  Because Mehri married off her daughter this year, she has not yet married off her son, but has plans to hold a wedding at the beginning of spring.  Mehri works as a salesperson at a store, and the owner pays her 600 somoni ($123) per month, which gives her an opportunity to repay this loan without any issues.

loans.use: to purchase furniture

loans.name: Sante Mahoussi Group

texts.fr: Le groupe SANTE MAHOUSSI est composé de deux personnes qui vivent dans le même quartier. C'est la première fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de leur activité. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Agbalé Alix est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Agbalé Alix est âgée de 22 ans et une célibataire. Agbalé Alix vit seule. Pour assurer ses divers besoins, Agbalé Alix mène comme activité depuis deux ans environs la coiffure. De façon secondaire, Agbalé Alix vend des produits de coiffure. Cette activité lui permet de contribuer sans grande difficulté à ses besoins. Agbalé Alix s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaire et son revenu, Agbalé Alix sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe SANTE MAHOUSSI, un premier crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en: The SANTE MAHOUSSI group consists of two people who live in the same neighborhood.  This is the first time that this group is requesting financial aid from Alide in order to grow their business.  The representative of the group, named Agbale Alix, is the one with her hand raised in the photo.  Agbale Alix is 22 years old and single.  She lives alone.  To provide for her various needs, she has been a hairstylist for the past two years.  Secondarily, Agbale Alix sells hairstyling products.  This business allows her to take care of her expenses without much difficulty.  Agbale Alix stocks up at a market in Benin.  In the pursuit of customer satisfaction and to increase her revenues and income, Agbale Alix together with the other member of the group SANTE MAHOUSSI is asking for a first loan from Alide.

loans.use: to buy hairstyling products.

loans.name: Edith

texts.es:
La señora Edith se dedica a la  venta de antojitos mexicanos  como es tostadas, tacos  dorados, carne  frita y sopes.
Tiene la cantidad de tres hijos  trabajadores , humilde llena de sueños  por cumplir.
Ella pidió el préstamo para comprar ingredientes como es: cebolla,chile,tomate,carne de pollo y res,tortillas y aceite.
Le da las gracias a fundación por todo el apoyo que le ha dado.
texts.en:
Señora Edith sells Mexican antojitos [traditional corn-based food] such as tostadas, fried tacos, fried meat, and sope [fried tortilla topped with refried beans, onion and hot sauce].
She has three hard-working children. They are humble and full of dreams to achieve.
Edith requested this loan for the purchase of ingredients such as: onion, chilli pepper, tomato, chicken and beef, tortillas, and oil.
She thanks the Fundacion for all of the support they have given her.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for making food.

loans.name: Sunita

texts.en:
Sunita is 32 years-old. She is married and has 2 children, aged 7 and 12. In 2001, she established her grocery store business. Working 7 days a week and 10 hours a day, she supports her family.  She has already received and successfully repaid 6 loans from Patan BPW and used her most recent to buys grocery goods for her business.  

In the future, Sunita plans to uplift the economic condition of her family.  She thanks you for your support. In the Kathmandu Valley, the small grocery store, called a pasal, is an important part of the local economy. Fresh produce, milk, and staples such as rice, lentils, and flour are purchased daily for cooking in the home. Owners of small grocery stores use Kiva loans to increase their purchasing power and profit margins. By keeping inventory strong and purchasing in larger amounts, owners of these small stores are able to increase profitability. While a typical pasal might be no more than 100 sq. feet, they are always full of bargaining customers, incoming produce, and shrewd businesswomen.

loans.use: to buy grocery goods.

loans.name: Mbah

texts.en:
Born on  May, 1974, he is married and has two children, both younger than 15. He lives with his children in Azire old church, a quarter in the Bamenda Mezam division of the North West region of Cameroon. He has faced challenges in life such as the death of his father, poverty, no money to pay rent and unemployment.

He joined GHAPE in 2009 and has borrowed and repaid one loan, which was used to purchase palm wine and for farming. He used the profit from the loan for his children's education and to improve his farm by purchasing and applying fertilizer. He promises that he will use this loan to expand his palm wine sales by buying  glasses, manure, yams and palm oil. The profit generated from this loan will be used for medication, his children's education and farm products. He strongly believes his business will succeed because of his longevity in the business, his regular customers and their satisfaction. The community will benefit from his regular supply, low prices and other discounts offered.

He prefers a loan from GHAPE because of low interest rates, convenient repayment times and the education of members before loan disbursements.

loans.use: to buy palm oil, yams, seedlings and manure

loans.name: Gie Sante Yalla 1 Group

texts.fr: Le sous groupe  est un démembrement d'un  GIE  qui regroupe des femmes vivant dans une meme localité et pratiquant des activités génératrices de revenus. Elles habitent dans l’une des banlieues du territoire  sénégalais. Elles sont représentées  par madame  Mariama   ( celle qui a levé la main sur la photo). Elle évolue dans le secteur du commerce plus particulièrement dans la vente de  tissus et d’habits  divers. Parallèlement   elle dispose de revenus réguliers et est employée dans un e ministère de la place. Elle  est mariée et prend en charge une partie de dépenses  domestiques  de son foyer. Elle sollicite au nom du GIE un crédit de  1 750 000 frs prévu pour l’ achat de tissus, habits et autres produits divers qui seront destiné a la vente. L’objectif  visé est le développement  de leurs activités de commerce et sa diversification. Elle ambitionne d’accroitre  leurs bénéfices  pour augmenter  leur épargne en vue d’améliorer  les conditions alimentaires de leurs familles respectives.
texts.en: The subgroup is a spin-off of an Economic Interest Group (GIE) that consists of women who live in the same community and engage in income-generating activities. They live in a suburb of Senegal.  They are represented by Ms. Mariama (the person with her hand raised in the photo).  She works in commerce, selling fabric and a variety of clothing.  At the same time, she earns a regular income and is employed by a government ministry.  She is married and is responsible for a part of the expenditures of her household.  She is asking on behalf of GIE a loan of 1,750,000 francs to purchase fabric, clothing, and other miscellaneous products for resale.  The goal is to develop and diversify their businesses.  She plans to increase their profits to increase their savings in order to improve the diet of their respective families.

loans.use: to buy fabric, clothes, and other miscellaneous products for resale.

loans.name: Marcela Benita

texts.es:
La joven Marcela de 22 años de edad, es comerciante vende frutas y verduras en el mercado municipal de la ciudad de León , tiene 1 hijo pequeño de un año de edad. Inicio con este negocio a los 17 años de edad cuando su madre se encargaba del negocio de ventas de frutas y verduras las frescas y dulces quien orgullosa y sonriente recibe a sus clientes.
Ella realizo el préstamo para compra de  verduras y frutas al por mayor  pues durante este época la afluencia de comerciante es constante por tal motivo quiere ofrecer lo mejor y a un buen precio a sus clientes. Además las ventas son muy buenas y le ayuda a mejorar su negocio. Ella está ahorrando para construir su vivienda y brindarle un techo digno a su hijo.
texts.en:
The young Marcela is 22 years old and is a merchant.  She sells fruits and vegetables in the municipal market of the city of Leon.  She has one small child who is one year old.  She started this business at 17 years old when her mother was in charge of a business selling fresh and sweet fruits and vegetables.  Her mother was proud and smiling when she received her customers.
She undertook the loan to buy fruits and vegetables wholesale because during this time the influx of the merchant is constant for that reason she wants to offer the best and at a good price to her customers.  In addition, sales are very good and it helps her improve her business.  She is saving to build her home and provide decent shelter for her child.

loans.use: to purchase fruits and vegetables wholesale.

loans.name: Kpedenou Group

texts.fr: Le groupe KPEDENOU est composé de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. C'est la quatrième fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de son activité. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Edwige est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Edwige est âgée de 26 ans et vit au Bénin. Edwige a arrêté l’école au niveau primaire. Edwige est mariée à un certain Eric. Le couple a deux enfants tous scolarisés et à leur charge. En plus de leurs enfants, le couple a deux autres enfants à charge. Edwige vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Afin d‘assurer les diverses charges de la famille, Edwige vend depuis six ans, des bijoux et des vernis à son domicile. Edwige s’approvisionne dans une région du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Edwige sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe KPEDENOU, un quatrième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les trois premiers prêts ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en: The KPEDENOU group consists of three people who live in the same neighborhood. This is the fourth time that this group has requested financial aid from Alide in order to grow their business.  The representative of the group, named Edwige, is the one with her hand raised in the photo.  Edwige is 26 years old and lives in Benin. She dropped out after elementary school.  Edwige is married to Eric. The couple have two children, both in school and their dependents.  In addition to their children, the couple have two other children in their care.  Edwige lives together with her husband and children. In order to take care of various family expenses, Edwige has been selling jewelry and nail polish from her home for the past six years.  She stocks up in a region of Benin. In the pursuit of customer satisfaction and to increase her revenues and income, Edwige together with the other members of the KPEDENOU group are asking for a fourth loan from Alide. The three previous loans were all completely repaid.

loans.use: to buy jewelry.

loans.name: Granito De Arena Group

texts.es:
Este Banco comunal se llama “Granito de Arena” está conformado por 18 emprendedores, quienes se dedican a diferentes rubros, entre los cuales se encuentran verdulería, minimarket, peluquería, venta de ropa, venta de joyas, perfumes y juguetes, entre otros negocios. Todos ellos pertenecientes a la ciudad de Chillán.
Edith integrante del grupo del Banco comunal, quien en la foto se encuentra de pié en la primera fila, en el cuarto puesto de derecha a izquierda, usa anteojos, su cabello está tomado y usa una blusa estampada con colores negro, Calipso y blanco. 
Se dedica a atender un bazar librería, ahí ofrece diferentes artículos y servicios para escolares. Entre útiles escolares y fotocopias. Trabaja en éste rubro desde hace 5 años.
Su negocio lo tiene ubicado al interior de su casa, ya que habilitó el living como local. Su horario de trabajo es durante todo el día hasta la 1ºº de la madrugada, todos los días de la semana, incluyendo festivos. 
Con el crédito comprará resmas de hojas de oficina para sacar fotocopias, además realizará la mantención de su máquina impresora.
Sus metas a corto plazo para su negocio son surtirlo de mercadería, por otro lado sus metas a largo plazo son implementarlo como un minimarket.
Edith vive junto a su marido y sus dos hijos de 22 y 17 años de edad, comenta que su hijo mayor está estudiando la carrera de ingeniería en informática (5º año) y su hija aún asiste a la enseñanza media.
Uno de sus sueños a nivel personal es tener una mejor calidad de vida, que le brinde tranquilidad a su familia.
Las motivaciones de continuar con el negocio se deben a que anhela tener una vejez tranquila en el ámbito económico, ya que Edith es de profesión contadora y su jubilación no alcanzaría a cubrir sus gastos familiares, por lo que éste negocio está destinado como una fuente de ingreso estable y perdurable en el tiempo.
Ella está muy contenta y agradecida de la oportunidad brindada por Fondo Esperanza, ya que le permitirá contar con un capital económico para invertir en su negocio y prosperar. Respecto al grupo del Banco comunal comenta que es muy agradable y comprometido. 
Chillán es una comuna de la zona centro sur de Chile. Su nombre significa “silla del sol” en mapudungun, idioma de nuestros indígenas mapuches. Chillán es conocida como “Cuna de la Patria” o “Tierra de Artistas”, debido a que en la ciudad han nacido destacados personajes de la historia de Chile, como por ejemplo el conocido pianista Claudio Arrau.
texts.en:
This communal bank is called “Granito de Arena” [Little Grain of Sand]. It is made up of 18 entrepreneurs who make their livings in different areas, including selling vegetables, running a mini-market, operating a hair salon, selling clothing, selling jewelry, perfumes and toys, among other businesses. They are all from the city of Chillán.

Edith is a member of the communal bank. In the photo, she is standing in the front row, fourth from the right. She wears glasses; her hair is pulled back; and she is wearing a printed black, white and calypso blue shirt.

She makes her living running a stationery store. Here she offers items and services for students, including school supplies and photocopies. She has been working in this area for the past 5 years.

Her business is located inside her home, because she has converted the living room into a store. Her work schedule is all day long until 1 a.m. every day of the week, including holidays.

With the loan, she will purchase reams of office paper to take photocopies, and she will do maintenance on her printer.

Her short-term goal for her business is to stock it with merchandise. Her long term goal is to convert it into a minimarket.

Edith lives with her husband and her two children, 22 and 17. She comments that her older son is studying to be a computer science engineer (5th year) and her daughter is still in school.

One of her personal dreams is to have a better quality of life, which will provide tranquility to her family.

Her motivation to continue her business is that she hopes to have an economically peaceful old age, since Edith is an accountant by trade and her retirement will not cover her family expenses. Therefore, this business is designed as a stable, enduring source of income.

She is very happy and greatful for the opportunity provided by Fondo Esperanza, because it allows her to have economic capital to invest in her business and prosper. With regards to the group in her communal bank, she comments that they are very pleasant and committed.

Chillán is a town in the south central area of Chile. Its name means “seat of the sun” in Mapudungun, the language of the Mapuche indigenous people. Chillán is known as the “Birthplace of the Fatherland” or “Land of the Artists,” due to the fact that distinguished characters in the history of Chile were born here, for example the well-known pianist Claudio Arrau.

loans.use: to purchase reams of office paper to make photocopies and to do maintenance on her printer.

loans.name: Guadalupe

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de carne de chancho,carne de cordero y carne de res,ella vende en el mercado desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,la socia por medio de este negocio quiere sacar adelante a sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es vender al por mayor la carne y distribuirlo a las diferentes tiendas que venden carne.La socia solicita el credito para comprar carne de res,cerdo y cordero al por mayor.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Guadalupe continues making her living by selling pork, lamb and beef. She sells in the market from 8 a.m. until 7 p.m. Through this business, she wants to help her children get ahead. Her dream is to sell meats wholesale and distribute meat to the different stores that sell it. She requested the loan to purchase beef, pork and lamb at wholesale. 

She is happy for the loan and commits to make her repayments.

loans.use: to purchase beef, pork and lamb at wholesale.

loans.name: Ruth Mery

texts.es:
Ruth Mery tiene 22 años edad, es soltera y nació en la provincia de Urubamba pero actualmente vive en la ciudad del Cusco y donde realiza sus actividades económicas. 

Ruth Mery estudio la carrera técnica de administración de hotelera en uno de los institutos más prestigiosos de la ciudad del Cusco. Actualmente, Ruth Mery trabaja en uno de los restaurantes más concurridos de la ciudad del Cusco como mozo. Ya son meses que trabaja en el restaurante y le está yendo muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo, ella trabaja desde las 6 de la mañana hasta las 4 de la tarde de lunes a sábados. Ruth Mery y sus papas tienen el negocio de la crianza de animales en su domicilio ósea en el poblado de Rumichaca Baja en la ciudad de Urubamba. Ya son varios años que se dedican a este negocio y les va muy bien. En esta oportunidad Ruth Mery requiere el préstamo para comprar más ganado.  Su sueño de Ruth Mery es estudiar la carrera profesional de Derecho y abrir una agencia de viajes de turismo.    
 
Ruth Mery es integrante del grupo “Los Girasoles de Rumichaca Baja” lo conforman 19 socios que viven en el poblado de Rumichaca Baja y donde realizan sus actividades económicas.
texts.en:
Ruth Mery is 22 years old and single. She was born in the province of Urubamba but currently lives in the city of Cusco where she works.

Ruth Mery studied hotel administration in one of the most prestigious institutes in the city of Cusco.  Currently she works as a waiter in one of the busiest restaurants in Cusco.  It has been a few months already that she has been working in the restaurant and it is going very well for her thanks to the effort she puts into her work.  She works from 6 in the morning until 4 in the afternoon from Monday through Saturday.

Ruth Mery and her parents have a business raising animals at home, in the village of Rumichaca Baja in the city of Urubamba.  They have been doing this work for several years now and it is going very well for them.  Right now Ruth Mery needs the loan to buy more livestock.  Her dream is to study law and open a tourist agency. 

Ruth Mery is a member of the Los Girasoles de Rumichaca Baja group, made up of 19 members who live in the village of Rumichaca Baja where they carry out their work.

loans.use: to buy more livestock.

loans.name: Mahoudjro 1 Group

texts.fr: Le groupe MAHOUDJRO 1 est composé de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. C'est la troisième fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de son activité. La représentante  du groupe, du nom de Yvette est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Yvette est âgée de 31 ans et vit au Bénin. Yvette a arrêté l’école au niveau primaire. Yvette est mariée à un certain Georges. Le couple a quatre enfants tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Yvette vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Le couple assure ensemble les divers besoins de la famille. Afin d‘assurer les diverses charges de la famille, Yvette vend depuis quatre ans, divers produits vivriers (maïs, haricot etc..) dans une boutique située dans sa région. Yvette s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Yvette sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe MAHOUDJRO 1, un troisième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les deux premiers prêts ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
The Mahoudjro 1 group consists of three people who live in the same neighborhood. This is the third time that this group is requesting financial aid from ALIDé, in order to elevate the level of their business. 

The representative of the group, by the name of Yvette, is the one who has her hand raised on the photo. Yvette is 31 years old and lives in Bénin. Yvette stopped school at the primary level. Yvette is married to a certain Georges. The couple has four dependent children who are all in school. Yvette lives together with her husband and children. The couple takes care of the diverse family needs together.

In order to take care of the diverse family responsibilities, Yvette has been selling a variety of food products (corn, beans etc.) in a shop located in her region for four years. Yvette gets her supplies in a market of Bénin. 

In seeking to satisfy her customers and to grow her turnover and her income, Yvette is requesting a third loan from ALIDé together with the other members of the Mahoudjro 1 group. The first two loans were well repaid.

loans.use: to buy a variety of food products (corn, beans, etc.).

loans.name: Leonor

texts.es:
Leonor nació en la provincia de Urubamba pero vive en el poblado de Rumichaca Baja. Este pueblo se localiza en el distrito de Urubamba, provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco, Perú. 

Leonor tiene 53 años edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene cinco hijos, ella se dedica a diferentes actividades económicas como venta de chicha, crianza de animales menores y venta de jora. Ya son varios años que se dedica a estos negocios y le va muy bien. En esta oportunidad Leonor requiere el préstamo para comprar más jora y comprar gallinas.  
 
Leonor es integrante del grupo “Los Girasoles de Rumichaca Baja” lo conforman 19 socios que viven en el poblado de Rumichaca Baja y donde realizan sus actividades económicas.
texts.en:
Leonor was born in the province of Urubamba but lives in the village of Rumichaca Baja.  This town is located in the district of Urubamba, province of Urubamba and department of Cusco, Peru.

Leonor is 53 years old and has a common-law relationship from which she has five children.  She works in different economic activities such as selling "chicha" [a corn beverage], raising small farm animals, and selling "jora" [fermented corn].  She has been working in these businesses for several years now and it is going very well for her.  Now she needs the loan to buy more jora and to buy chickens.

Leonor is a member of the Los Girasoles de Rumichaca Baja group, made up of 19 members who live in the village of Rumichaca Baja where they carry out their economic activities.

loans.use: to buy more fermented corn and chickens.

loans.name: Visitasion

texts.es:
Visitasion tiene 44 años edad, es casada y fruto de esta unión tiene seis hijos, ella nació en la provincia de Urubamba pero actualmente vive en el poblado de Rumichaca Baja.  Este pueblo se localiza en el distrito de Urubamba, provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco, Perú. 

Visitasion se dedica a la crianza de animales menores, venta de chicha y venta de verduras, ella requiere el préstamo para comprar animales menores como por ejemplo pollos.   
 
Visitasion es integrante del grupo “Los Girasoles de Rumichaca Baja” lo conforman 19 socios que viven en el poblado de Rumichaca Baja y donde realizan sus actividades económicas.
texts.en:
Visitasion, age 44, is married and has six children.  She was born in the Urubamba province, but she currently lives in the Rumichaca Baja village.  This village is in the Urubamba district, Urubamba province, Cusco department, Perú.

Visitasion raises young animals, sells “chicha” (a corn based drink), and sells vegetables.  She needs the loan to buy young animals like chickens for example.

Visitasion is a member of the “Los Girasoles de Romichaca Baja”  (The Sunflowers of Romichaca Baja).  It is comprised of 19 members who live in the village of Rumichaca Baja.  This is where they carry out their business activities.

loans.use: to buy young animals like chickens for example.

loans.name: Jose Augusto

texts.es:
José es un hombre de 48 años que vive junto a su familia en Latacunga que es La capital de la Provincia de Cotopaxi. Es un importante centro comercial y turístico de la región centro-norte del país.  El paisaje urbano de la ciudad cautiva con sus calles estrechas, casas bajas, muchas de ellas con patios interiores que le confieren un sabor en que se une lo español con lo aborigen, lo antiguo con lo moderno. Latacunga conserva un barrio central donde se puede apreciar la arquitectura colonial española.  Sus habitantes mantienen muchas costumbres, durante la fiesta del “Corpus Cristi” y la celebración de la fiesta de la “Mama Negra”, donde demuestran al visitante su amistad y tradición.

José tiene dos negocios que son: la crianza de animales y la carpintería. Nos cuenta que en la crianza de animales sufrió una gran pérdida ya que sus animales murieron a causa de una enfermedad. Esto ha sido un gran bajón en la economía de su familia. José ha tenido una alta demanda en su segundo oficio que es la carpintería, que aprendió de su padre. Por ello el desea un crédito para comprara madera y así aprovechar las ventas. Él se considera un hombre innovador y por ello el sabe que con esta inversión podrá superar la pérdida económica de su negocio de animales y así poder seguir siendo el sustento de su familia.

Su objetivo es dar a su familia todo lo necesario para su subsistencia y a pesar de que su trabajo es muy duro y agotador ama lo que hace y sobre todo ama ver a su familia feliz.
texts.en:
José is a 48-year-old man living with his family in Latacunga which is the capital of Cotopaxi Province.  This is an important commercial and tourism center in the country’s north-central region.  The urban scape of the city captivates with its narrow streets and low houses many of them with interior patios that convey a special ambience where one can admire Spanish colonial architecture.  Its residents maintain many traditions like during the festivities of Corpus Christi and “Mama Negra” where they display friendship and tradition to visitors.

José has two businesses which are: raising animals and carpentry.  He tells us that he suffered a great loss with the animal husbandry because his animals died due to disease.  This was a huge drop in the family’s economy.  José has had large demand in his second business, which is carpentry, that he learned from his father.  Because of this, he’s asking for a loan to buy lumber and take advantage of sales.  

He believes that he’s an innovator and knows that with this investment he will be able to overcome the financial loss his animal raising business suffered to continue being his family’s source of support.  His objective is to give his family everything needed to survive and despite his work being very hard and exhausting he loves what he does and above all loves seeing his family happy.

loans.use: to buy lumber to increase furniture production.

loans.name: Fifame Group

texts.fr: Le groupe FIFAME est composé de trois personnes qui sont issues de la même famille. C'est la quatrième fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de son activité. La représentante  du groupe, du nom de Perpétue est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Perpétue est âgée de 28 ans et vit au Bénin. Perpétue n’a pas fréquenté l’école. Perpétue est mariée à un couturier du nom de Honoré. Le couple a trois enfants tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Perpétue vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Le couple assure ensemble les divers besoins de la maison. Afin de subvenir à ses besoins et à ceux de ses enfants, Perpétue vend depuis six ans environs, divers produits (lait, tomate etc..) dans un marché du Bénin. Perpétue s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Perpétue sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe FIFAME, un quatrième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les trois premiers prêts ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en: The FIFAME group is comprised of three persons of the same family. This is the fourth time they are asking for a loan from Alidé in order to improve their business activity, the three others were successfully reimbursed. The representative of the group, named Perpétue, can be seen in the photo with her hand raised. Perpétue is 28 years old woman living in Benin who did not attend school. She is married to a tailor named Honoré, and the couple are responsible for taking care of three children, all of whom attend school. They all live together in the same home, and both Perpétue and Honoré share responsibility for the household. In order to attend to her family's needs, Perpétue has been involved in the re-selling of diverse products (milk, tomatoes, etc) for the last six years out of a market in Benin. She is asking for this fourth loan, along with the other members of the group FIFAME, in order to satisfy her clients and increase her revenues.

loans.use: Purchase cartons of milk, tomatoes, etc.

loans.name: Julio

texts.es:
El socio Julio se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de artesania,el socio vende joyas como aretes,collares y pulseras,el socio ahora quiere comprar un carro para que haga servicio de turismo,el sueño del socio es ampliar el negocio de venta de artesania.El sueño del socio es tener otro local de venta de artesania.el socio solicita el credito para comprar artesania como collares,pulseras y aretes al por mayor.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Julio continues with his crafts sales.  He sells jewelry like earrings, necklaces and bracelets.  He now wants to buy a car to provide tourism services.  His dream is to expand the crafts sales and to have another place to sell his crafts in.  He’s asking for the loan to buy crafts like necklaces, bracelets and earrings at wholesale.   He is happy about the loan and pledges to make his installment payments.

loans.use: to buy craft jewelry at wholesale.

loans.name: Ndiaye

texts.fr: L'emprunteuse est une femme mariée, mère de quatre enfants.Elle exerce l'activité de commerce de sacs, de tissus et d'articles de mercerie.Son activité est très rentable et lui permet de subvenir à ses besoins et de participer activement à la prise en charge des dépenses d'entretien de la famille.Pour renforcer son commerce, elle sollicite un prêt de 100 000f pour acheter des tissus, des parfums et des sacs.Son ambition est d'élargir son activité.
texts.en:
The borrower is a married woman and mother to four children. 

She runs as a business a shop selling bags, fabric and haberdashery items. Her business is very profitable and allows her to meet her needs and to actively participate in taking care of family expenses. 

To strengthen her business, she is requesting a loan of 100,000f to buy fabric, perfume and bags. Her goal is to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fabric, perfume and bags.

loans.name: Las Comadres Group

texts.es:
Este grupo se llama las Comadres sus integrantes decidieron ponerle  así por que la mayoría de las integrantes son comadres y todas se caen bien y son coma familia todas comadres de todas.
Este grupo esta conformado por  once señoras   trabajadoras  y un señor trabajador y honesto el compadre de todas.
La representante del grupo es la señora Librada Minerva mas  bien conocida como doña Mine la de los licuados.
Sus compañeras de grupo le dicen así por que haces licuados  de productos  de Herbalife  para la salud.
Doña Mine se caracteriza por ser una señora trabajadora ,le gusta mucho salir adelante romper todas las barreras y cumplir sus sueños ,tener a su familia unida y ayudar a sus compañeras de grupo para que todo este bien .
Doña Mine cuenta con un local donde vende productos de Herbalife como son tes, licuados  y agua , ella nos cuenta que le gusta mucho su trabajo por que obtiene buenas ganancias y tanbien ayuda  a las personas ofreciendo cosas naturales .
Doña Mine esta felizmente casada con el señor Javier quien esta en los estados unidos , pero gracias adiós  y a fundación 
por que con la su ayuda de fundación doña Mine tiene su local y mas producto para que su esposo regrese y los dos trabajan juntos.
Ella  pidió  el préstamo para comprar mas productos de herbalife  para poder vender mas y obtener mas ganancias.
Las otras integrantes del grupo son:
Rosa Elia- quien se dedica a la venta de zapatos.
Tomasa- se dedica a la venta de dulces.
Margarito   German- se dedica a la venta de zapatos.
Lorena-  se dedica a la venta de perfumes.
Guadalupe se dedica a la venta de pollos.
Isabel se dedica a la venta de perfumes.
Rosa – se dedica a la venta de pescados.
Teresa- se dedica a la venta de  pollos.
Romulda- se dedica a la venta de antojitos mexicanos.
Margarita – se dedica a la venta de pollos.
Verónica – se dedica a la venta de pollos.

Le dan las gracias a fundación por ayudarlas  a cumplir sus sueños y  a tener un negocio para ayudar a sus familias.
texts.en:
This group is called “Las Comadres.”  The members decided on this name because most of them are comadres [have baptized each other’s children]; they like each other and are like family all of them together.  The group has 11 hardworking women and one hardworking, honest man who is compadre to all of them.  The group representative is Librada Minerva, better known as Doña Mine, the blended drinks lady.  Her fellow members call her that because she makes Herbalife blended drinks for health.

Doña Mine is noted for being a hardworking woman who likes to go out and tear down all barriers and reach her dreams; to have a united family and to help her fellow group members so that everything is OK.

Doña Mine has a locale where she sells Herbalife products like teas, blended drinks and water.  She tells us that she enjoys her work very much because she earns good profits and also helps people by selling them natural products.

Doña Mine is happily married to Javier who is in the United States but thanks to God and to the Fundación Mine has her locale and more products so that her husband can return and they can work together. She requested the loan to buy more Herbalife products to sell and earn higher profits.

The other group members are:

Rosa Elia- sells shoes.
Tomasa- sells candy.
Margarito German- sells shoes.
Lorena- sells perfume.
Guadalupe – sells chickens.
Isabel – sells perfume.
Rosa – sells fish.
Teresa- sells chicken.
Romulda- sells traditional Mexican fast food snacks.
Margarita – sells chickens.
Verónica – sells chickens.

They thank the Fundación for helping them reach their dreams and to have a business to help their families.

loans.use: to buy Herbalife products to sell.

loans.name: Lilian Esperanza

texts.es:
Lilian es una mujer casada de 28 años, tiene un hijo de cuatro meses de edad, viven en la ciudad de Ibarra, Provincia de Imbabura al Norte de Ecuador. Lilian es una persona responsable en su trabajo y muy amigable.

Lilian trabaja en la crianza de pollos, negocio que le permite ayudar a su esposo con los gastos de la familia. lilian necesita incrementar su animales (pollos) ya que por la temporada navideña hay una gran cantidad de clientes y quiere aprovechar esto para poder obtener buenos ingresos económicos y mejorar su calidad de vida. Es por eso que realiza su cuarto crédito en Fodemi para comprar pollos y criarlos.

El sueño de Lilian es tener una casa propia y en su negocio que crezca y poder distribuir al por mayor.
texts.en:
Lilian, 28, is a married woman; she has a four-month-old son and lives in the city of Ibarra, Imbabura Province in northern Ecuador.  Lilian is a person who is very friendly and responsible in her work.

Lilian works raising chickens, a business that allows her to help her husband with family expenses.  Lilian needs to increase the number of her animals (chicks) because during the Christmas season the number of customers increases and she wants to avail herself of this to earn good income and improve her quality of life.  Because of this, she hopes to get her fourth Fodemi loan to buy chicks to raise.  Lilian’s dream is to have a house of her own and that her business grows so that she can become a wholesaler.

loans.use: to buy chicks to raise.

loans.name: Maria Mercedes

texts.es:
María de 33 años de edad, vive en la comunidad El Jicarito  en las afuera de León  tiene 3 hijos de 14, 10 y 5 años de edad respectivamente están estudiando, es casada. Se dedica a la crianza de cerdos y a la siembra de hortalizas en la comunidad. La crianza de cerdos ha sido su primer negocio ella comenzó comprando un cerdo para reproducir y poco a poco se ido especializando con este tipo de actividades además de sentirse independiente y generar ingresos por ella misma aportando a su hogar. 
Ella requiere el préstamo para compra de cerdos y reproducir para vender. Uno de sus planes es tener una finca reproductora de cerdos de raza y sacar adelante la siembra de hortalizas que ella misma siembra.
texts.en:
María, aged 33, lives in the neighborhood of El Jicarito on the outskirts of León. She is the mother of three children who are 14, 10 and 5 years old, respectively, and attend school. María is married. She breeds pigs and grows vegetables in her community. Breeding pigs has been her first activity; she began it by buying a pig to breed and gradually she became specialized in this type of activity. It gives her a feeling of independence and generates an income, which she spends on household needs.

María applies for this loan to buy pigs to breed and sell. One of her plans consists in owning a farm for pig breeding, where she would also continue growing vegetables herself.

loans.use: to buy pigs to breed and sell.

loans.name: Fanny Luz

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de joyas como aretes,collares y pulseras,ella tiene una tienda donde reparte desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio la socia quiere salira adelante.El sueño de la socia es ampliar el local donde vende joyas.La socia solicita el credito para comprar aretes,pulseras y collares al por mayor.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: The member continues with her sale of jewelry like earrings, necklaces and bracelets.  She has a store where she sells from 8am until 7pm.  She wants to get ahead by means of this business.  Her dream is to expand the locale where she sells the jewelry and is asking for a loan to buy earrings, bracelets and necklaces at wholesale.  She is happy about the loan and commits to make her installment payments.

loans.use: to buy jewelry at wholesale.

loans.name: Fifagbe 2 Group

texts.fr: Le groupe FIFAGBE 2 est composé de quatre personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. C'est la quatrième fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de son activité. La représentante  du groupe, du nom de Germaine est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Germaine est âgée de 32 ans et vit au Bénin. Germaine a arrêté l’école au niveau primaire. Germaine ne vit plus avec son mari. Germaine es t mère de deux enfants tous scolarisés et à sa charge. Germaine vit seule avec ses enfants. Germaine assure seule les diverses charges de la maison. Afin de subvenir à ses besoins et à ceux de ses enfants, Germaine mène comme activité depuis une dizaine d’année, la vente de produits vivriers (maïs etc..) et des charbons de bois dans son quartier. Germaine s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Germaine sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe FIFAGBE 2, un quatrième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Les trois premiers prêts ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
The Fifagbe 2 group consists of four people who live in the same neighborhood. This is the fourth time that this group is requesting financial aid from ALIDé, in order to elevate the level of their business.
