La actividad que realiza Ruth es la agricultura dedicándose específicamente en la siembra de yuca, sobre los terrenos de sus suegros, quienes le prestaron un espacio de 7 hectáreas. Además alquila a un vecino 2 hectáreas adicionales pagando por alquiler 400 soles por hectárea producida. Estando en este negocio desde hace 2 años y contando con el apoyo de su pareja y 02 peones a los que paga un jornal de 20 nuevos soles, ha logrado salir adelante y darle lo mejor a sus hijos. Se siente a gusto con su trabajo, pues lo considera una actividad sana y tranquila, además de gustarle la vida de campo ya que no tolera la vida en ciudad. Tiene planes de ampliar su negocio y abrir una tienda de venta de repuestos de motocicletas en la ciudad de Pucallpa  viendo que ese negocio tiene bastante demanda. Este será el préstamo número 2 con la institución MFP. Por tanto espera de un pequeño préstamo para que pueda cumplir con sus objetivos. Por otro lado se compromete una vez más de cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, como en el crédito anterior  que tuvo. Además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas que son responsables y muy solidarias. Con el monto solicitado de 1500 nuevos soles lo invertirá en la siembra de más hectáreas de yuca contratando peones para esta actividad.
texts.en:
Ruth is 24 years old. She is a hardworking, determined woman, as well as happy and friendly. She lives with her partner, Felix, who also is a farmer. Ruth lives in the company of her partner and their children, who are seven and two years old, and who they really love. She says that at the moment she is living in a rented house. 

Ruth works in agriculture, specifically planting yuca on the land of her in-laws, who have loaned her seven hectares of land. On top of this, she rents two additional hectares from her neighbor, paying 400 soles of rent for each producing hectare. 

Having been in this business for two years and with the support of her partner and two laborers who they pay 20 nuevos soles daily, she has managed to get ahead and give her children the best in life. She is pleased with her job, since she finds it healthy and calm. Furthermore, she likes country life, since she cannot stand life in the city. She has plans to expand her business and open a store for motorcycle parts in Pucallpa city, seeing that there is enough demand for this business. 

This will be her second loan with the MFP institution. She hopes for a small loan so that she can meet her goals. On the other hand, she promises once again to make her payments, like with the last loan she had. Furthermore, she is grateful to be part of her communal bank because all the members are responsible and very supportive people. With the requested amount of 1500 nuevos soles, she will invest in the planting of more hectares of yuca, contracting laborers for this job.

loans.use: to contract laborers.

loans.name: Orlith

texts.es: Orlith, de 60 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y de campo, además de empeñosa y amable. Convive con  Eglin, quien es agricultor, tienen cuatro hijos pero ya son independientes. Juntos habitan a lado de su nieto de 15 años de edad en su casa propia. La actividad que realiza Orlith, es la agricultura, contando para eso con un terreno de 8 hectáreas del cual se posesionó hace 20 años, pero solo dos hectáreas cultiva mandarinas, naranjas y yuca. Una vez cosechado éstos productos son vendidos en los mercados más cercanos. Lo que le gusta de su actividad es que le permite mantener a su familia, como también comenta le gusta la vida de campo, donde se siente más tranquila, ya que aprendió de esa vida gracias a sus padres, quienes también eran agricultores. Por otro lado manifiesta sus deseos de seguir creciendo e incursionar paralelamente en otro negocio que sería el de una bodega contando para eso con una casa. Este seria el préstamo número 15 con la institución MFP, está agradecida de contar con un apoyo financiero para avanzar con su actividad. Además comenta sentirse a gusto con su banco comunal pues conoce a la mayoría de sus miembros y los considera ser personas responsables y solidarias. Con el monto solicitado de 3000 nuevos soles lo invertirá en su terreno en la contratación de personas para la cosecha que tiene de su producción de yucas.
texts.en: Orlith is 60 years old.  She is a hard-working woman from a rural area and is also earnest and friendly.  She lives with Eglin who is a farmer.  They have four children, but they are now independent.  Together, they live next to their 15 year old grandson who lives in his own house.  Orlith is a farmer; she has a plot of land of 8 hectares which she took possession of 20 years ago.  But only on two hectares does she grow tangerines, oranges, and cassava.  Once harvested these products are sold at the nearest markets.  What she likes about her work is that it allows her to support her family.  She also says she likes life in the country where she feels calmer.  She learned about this life thanks to her parents who were also farmers.  On the other hand, she expresses desires to continue to grow and to make inroads in another business which would be to have a grocery store in her home.  This will be loan number 15 with the MFP institution. She is grateful to have financial support to expand her business.  She also says she is happy with her communal bank because she knows the majority of its members and she considers them to be responsible and supportive people.  With the amount requested of 3000 nuevos soles she will invest in her land in the contracting of people for the harvesting of her yucca crop.

loans.use: to contract laborers.

loans.name: Purificacion

texts.es:
Purificacion nació en la ciudad de Huayllabamba y vive en la misma ciudad donde nació. El distrito peruano de Huayllabamba es uno de los siete distritos de la Provincia de Urubamba, ubicada en el Departamento del Cusco, perteneciente a la Región Cusco, Perú. 

Purificacion tiene 56 años edad, es casada y fruto de esta unión tiene siete hijos, ella tiene tres actividades económicas principales que realiza durante el año y estos son: ella se dedica a la elaboración de chicha de jora los días martes, viernes y domingos y su puesto de venta se encuentra ubicado al frente su casa, ella también se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como gallinas, chanchos y cuyes y ella tambien se dedica a la venta de verduras en uno de los mercados más populares de la ciudad de Urubamba. En esta oportunidad Purificacion requiere el préstamo para comprar más verduras o para hacer trabajar la chacra donde siembra sus verduras.    

Purificacion es integrante del banco comunal “Virgen Natividad” y el grupo está conformado con 15 socios que viven unos en el ciudad de Huayllabamba y otros en el ciudad de Yucay. El distrito peruano de Yucay es uno de los siete distritos de la Provincia de Urubamba.
texts.en:
Purificacion was born in the city of Huayllabamba and lives in the same city where she was born.  The Peruvian district of Huayllabamba is one of the seven districts of the Urubamba Province located in the Department of Cusco belonging to the Cusco, Peru Region.  

Purificacion is 56 years old.  She is married and the fruit of this union is seven children.  She has three primary economic activities that she does during the year:  She is dedicated to the preparation of chicha on Tuesdays, Fridays, and Sundays and her stall is located in front of her house; she also breeds small animals such as chickens, pigs, and guinea pigs; she also sells vegetables in one of the most popular markets in the city of Urubamba.  On this occasion Purificacion requests the loan to buy more vegetables or to work the farm where she grows vegetables.

Purificacion is a member of the communal bank "Virgen Natividad" and the group is comprised of 15 members, some of whom live in the city of Huayllabamba and others in the city of Yucay.  The Peruvian district of Yucay is one of the seven districts of the Urubamba Province.

loans.use: to buy more vegetables or to work the farm where she grows her vegetables.

loans.name: Lorena

texts.en:
Lorena owns a spa business that specializes in beauty services. She came from Columbia and opened the business over 3 years ago, with a dream and excitement to enter the beauty business which is constantly reinventing itself. She decided to become an entrepreneur by providing her clients with spa services such as massages, waxing, facials, body wraps and scrubs. She has one employee assisting with the spa. Lorena’s business is operated out of a storefront, and she has built her clientele over the years mostly through word of mouth. Now, she is hoping to gain capital for advertising and marketing. The biggest challenge for the business has been finding innovative strategies to expand and compete with the ever-changing industry. 

This loan will be used to purchase a facial/massage bed and three machines used for facials and wraps. It will also pay for new advertising for the business. This will help Lorena keep up with new trends in the industry and expand her clientele base.

loans.use: to purchase a massage bed and facial/wrap machines for her spa.

loans.name: Kely Tatiana

texts.es:
Kely tiene 21 años, es soltera y vive con su madre. La localidad donde residen es una localidad situada a orillas del mar llamada Puerto Malabrigo, es una zona dedicada a la extracción artesanal e industrial de pescado, se encuentra ubicada en la región La Libertad, a tres horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

Ella trabaja en una panadería ubicada en su vivienda elaborando y comercializando diversos productos. Lleva tres años en el negocio y lo administra junto con su madre.  Ellas dependen de esta actividad para solventar sus gastos y salir adelante.

Kely desea reparar una de las máquinas con las que cuenta para realizar su trabajo y así poder seguir asegurándose el sustento y calidad de vida, es por ello que ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.

Kely tiene buenas referencias por parte de sus vecinos y conocidos, es una persona trabajadora y responsable. Este es su primer crédito con nuestra institución.
texts.en:
Kely is 21 years old, is single, and lives with her mother.  The town where they live is a town located on the seafront of Puerto Malabrigo.  It is a zone dedicated to the artisan and industrial extraction of fish.  It is located in the region of La Libertad, three hours from the city of Chiclayo, capital of the Lambayeque region.

She works in a bakery located in her home producing and selling various products.  She has been working there for three years and she manages it together with her mother.  They depend on this business to cover their costs and come out ahead.

Keli wants to repair a machine which she uses to do her job and in that way ensure their livelihood and quality of life.  Because of this she has seen fit to request from Edpyme Alternativa a loan of 1000 nuevos soles that will help her achieve her goal.

Keli has good references from her neighbors and acquaintances.  She is a hard-working and responsible person.  This is her first loan with our institution.

loans.use: to repair bakery machinery.

location.town: Puerto Malabrigo - Rázuri - Ascope - La Libertad

loans.name: Las Atrevidas Group

texts.es:
El grupo Las Atrevidas esta conformado por 10 personas cada una con una diferente actividad economica, este grupo se encuentra hubicado en una region donde hay dos actividades economicas primordiales una de ellas es la simbre de caña de azucar y la segunda la recolecta de resina de arbol de hule.



La señora Domitila es no de los miembros de este grupo,  tiene la edad de 56 años, estudio hasta la preparatoria, es soltera y tiene un hijo de 19 años que estudia la preparatoria. ella nos platica que hace un poco mas de 6 años inicio a vender refrescos en su hogar para ganar un poco dinero extra para sacar a delante a su familia y poco a poco con el paso del tiempo su negocio fue cresindo e inicio tambien a vender abarrotes, ella realiza sus ventas desde su casa ha puesto algunas mesas y anaqueles en los cuales exibe sus productos, tambien nos dice que le  gusta tener su negocio  muy bien surtida ya que asi sus clientes siempre encontraran lo que buscan y volveran a su tienda a hacerle el gasto. Doña domitila nesecita este credito para invertirlo en la copra de arroz, frijol, aceite, refrescos, galletas, dulces, jabon, papel higienico, productos enlatados, huevos, pasta dental, sal y azucar para resurtir su tienda. ella espera que con esta inversion su negocio prospere y obtenga mas clientes para que sus ganancias aumenten y asi poder construir un pequeño local y continuar la construccion de su casa.

***Doña Gregoria(viste falda blanca y blusa verde) es una amiga de los miembros del grupo y quiso salir en la   foto 


los otros integrantes del grupo son:
 maria isabel venta de calzado
carmelo venta de dulces
francisca venta comida 
Rafaela venta de comida
eliana venta de frutas
juana venta de comida 
silvia venta de comida 
maria inez venta de cosmeticos 
jose venta de zapatos
texts.en:
The group 'Las Atrevidas' [The Bold Ones] is made up of 10 people, all of which are involved in different economic activities. The group is located in a region where there are two principal economic activities, one of them is planting sugar cane and the second is collecting resin from rubber trees. 

Domitila is one of the group members. She is 56 years old and studied up until high school. She is single and has a son who is 19 years old that also studied in high school. She told us that a little over six years ago she started selling juice drinks out of her home to earn a little extra money to help her family get ahead. Little by little with time her business was growing and she began to also sell groceries. She conducts sales from her home, where she has shelves and tables set up to display her products. She also told us that she likes to have her business well stocked so that her customers always find what they are looking for and come back to her store to spend their money. Domitila needs this loan to invest in the purchase of rice, beans, oil, juice drinks, crackers, candies, soap, toilet paper, canned products, eggs, toothpaste, salt and sugar to restock her store. She hopes that with this investment her business will prosper and will get more customers so that her profits will increase. She would like to be able to build a small place [for her store] and continue the construction of her home.    

*Gregoria (the woman in the white skirt and green blouse) is a friend of the group members and wanted to be in the picture.

The other group members are:
Maria Isabel who sells footwear
Carmelo who sells candies 
Francisca who sells food  
Rafaela who sells food 
Eliana who sells fruit
Juana who sells food 
Silvia who sells food 
Maria Inez who sells cosmetics  
Jose who sells shoes

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, oil, juice drinks, crackers, candies, soap, toilet paper, canned goods, eggs, tooth paste, salt and sugar.

loans.name: El Suspiro Group

texts.es:
El Grupo El suspiro esta integrado por 14 persona cada uno de ellos con una actividad economica, esta grupo se encuantra hubicado en una comunidad que se caracteriza por tener un clima calido y esta rodeado de huleras(arboles de hule).

La señora dulce maria tiene la edad de 24 años, solo estudio hasta es tercer grado de secundaria y esta casada con el señor alejandro, ellos tienen un hijo de solo un mes de nacido. Doña Dulce Maria nos platica que hace un poco mas de dos años decidio abrir un pequeño negocio de venta de refacciones  para bicicletas y automovil para ganar un poco de dinero extra y ayudar a sus esposo con los gastos del hogar, ella dice que Gracias a Dios le ha hido muy bien ya que es la unica refaccionaria de la comunidad y las ventas son buenas. ella invertira su credito en la compra refaciones para bicicletas y automovil para resurtir su negocio. ella espera que con esta inversion su negocio prospere  y sus ganancias aumenten para continuar invirtiendo en su negocio ya que en un futuro le gustaria que su hijo tenga la oportunidad de estudiar.

los demas miembros del grupo son:
 
esperanza refrescos
martha refrescos
venernda costura
emilia antojitos
minerva ropa 
herminia antojitos 
maria del carmen refrescos
maria isabel abarrotes 
ofelia refrescos 
reyna venta de catalago 
maxiimo pescado
eugenia antojitos 
irma refrescos
texts.en:
The El Suspiro communal bank is comprised of 14 people.  Each one of them has a business activity.  The group is located in a community that is known for having a warm climate and for being surrounded by rubber trees.

Dulce Maria, age 24, only went to school up to the third year of secondary school.  She is married to Alejandro, and they have a son who is only one month old.

Dulce Maria tells us that a little over two years ago she decided to open a small business selling spare parts for bicycles and automobiles.  She did this to earn a little extra money and to help her husband with the household expenses.  Thank God that it has gone very well for her.  She has the only spare parts business in the community, and sales have been good. 

She will use her loan to buy spare parts for bicycles and automobiles in order to restock her business.  She hopes to prosper from this investment in her business.  She also hopes to increase her income in order to continue investing in her business.

In the future she would like her son to have the opportunity to go to school.

The other members of the group are:

Esperanza:  soft drinks
Martha:  soft drinks
Venernda:  sewing
Emilia:  snacks
Minerva:  clothes
Herminia: snacks
Maria del Carmen: soft drinks
Maria Isabel:  groceries
Ofelia: soft drinks
Reyna:  catalog sales
Maxiimo: fish
Eugenia: snacks
Irma: soft drinks

loans.use: to buy spare parts for bicycles and automobiles.

loans.name: Ramona Del Carmen

texts.es:
En la ciudadela El Florón de la ciudad de Portoviejo, capital de Manabí conocida desde hace muchos años  como la ciudad de los reales tamarindos, se reúnen cada quince días  las socias del Banco Comunal Renacer.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Ramona, ella tiene  57 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tiene seis hijos todos mayores de edad, con ellos vive una hija que está soltera. Su esposo es minusválido y realiza ciertas ocupaciones ocasionales.

Ella para ganar el sustento diario ya que su esposo no gana mucho, hace más de tres años empezó un negocio el cual consiste en la preparación y venta de corviches, empanadas, colas, jugos, aguas, entre otras cosas, ella de jueves a domingos arregla un pequeño puesto en las afueras de su casa en el cual vende estos productos con lo cual ha podido salir adelante en momentos muy difíciles.  En las mañanas ella prepara todos los alimentos para tener todo listo a la hora de vender.

Este crédito lo va a emplear para comprar víveres para preparan los platos. Lleva más de 12 años en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por la ayuda que le dan a pesar de la enfermedad de su esposo.
 
Sus sueños son seguir adelante en su negocio y en su vida familiar.
texts.en:
The members of the "Renacer" communal bank meet very two weeks in the El Florón housing development in the city of Portoviejo, capital of Manabí province, known for many years as the City of the Royal Tamarind Trees. 

This is where we met Ramona. She is 57, married, and has six children, who are all adults. A daughter who is single, lives with them. Her husband is disabled, and does some casual labor.

To earn their daily living, since her husband doesn't earn much, she started a business three years ago, which consists of preparing and selling corviches (deep fried snack food), empanadas, soft drinks, juices, waters, and other products.

From Thursday to Sunday she runs a small stand outside her home, where she sells these products.  This has enabled her to move forward during some very difficult times.

In the mornings, she prepares all the food, in order to have it all ready at time of sale. She is going to use this loan to buy supplies for preparing the dishes. 

She has been in the communal bank for more than 12 years, and she likes it because of the help that they give her, in spite of her husband's illness. Her dream is to move forward in her business and in her family life.

loans.use: To buy supplies for her food stand.

loans.name: Irma

texts.es:
Irma nació en la ciudad de Huayllabamba y vive en la misma ciudad donde nació. (El distrito peruano de Huayllabamba es uno de los siete distritos de la Provincia de Urubamba, ubicada en el Departamento del Cusco, perteneciente a la Región Cusco, Perú). 

Irma tiene 25 años edad, es soltera y aun no tiene hijos, ella tiene varias actividades económicas principales que realiza durante el año y estos son: Durante los meses de abril hasta octubre se dedica a trabajar de forma dependiente osea ya se ha en un hotel, en un restaurante o en la municipalidad de Yucay. Durante los meses de Octubre a Marzo se dedica al negocio de venta de choclo y lleva sus productos a la ciudades de Juliaca, Puno, Cusco y los distribuye en diferentes mercados de esas ciudades. En esta oportunidad Irma requiere el préstamo para comprar más choclo. Su sueño de Irma es abrir una cabina de internet o abrir una empresa especializa en realizar software. Irma ha estudiado la carrera técnica de computación e informática en uno de los institutos de la ciudad del Cusco.      

Irma es integrante del banco comunal “Virgen Natividad” y el grupo está conformado con 15 socios que viven unos en el ciudad de Huayllabamba y otros en el ciudad de Yucay. El distrito peruano de Yucay es uno de los siete distritos de la Provincia de Urubamba.
texts.en:
Irrna was born in the city of Huayllabamba, and lives in the same city where she was born. The Peruvian district of Huayllabamba is one of the seven districts in Urubamba province, located in Cusco department, which is part of the Cusco region of Peru. 

Irma is 25, single, and has no children yet.  She has various main economic activities that she does during the year. During the months of April to October she works as an employee, whether it be in a hotel, restaurant or for the Yucay municipality. During the months from October to March, she sells corn, and takes her products to the cities of Juliaca, Puno, and Cusco, and distributes them in various markets in those cities. 

On this occasion, Irma needs the loan to buy more corn. Irma's dream is to open an Internet booth, or a company specializing in developing software. Irma has studied for a technical career in computing and informatics, in one of the institutes in the city of Cusco. 

Irma is a member of the "Virgen Natividad" communal bank, and the group is made up of 15 members, some of whom live in the city of Huayllabamba, and others in the city of Yucay. The Peruvian district of Yucay is one of the seven districts in Urubamba province.

loans.use: To buy more corn.

loans.name: Gema Isabel

texts.es:
En la ciudadela El Florón de la ciudad de Portoviejo, capital de Manabí conocida desde hace muchos años  como la ciudad de los reales tamarindos, se reúnen cada quince días  las socias del Banco Comunal Renacer.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Gema, ella tiene  21 años de edad, está casada y aun no tienen  hijos. Su esposo es comerciante. Ella estudia Educación Infantil en la Universidad.

Ella realiza el crédito para su esposo, el tiene un local en el centro de la ciudad el cual es en sociedad con una hermana, venden camisas, corbatas, cinturones y varios artículos de hombres, trabajan todos los días desde las 8h00 hasta las 18h00, además el también en su carro realiza transporte escolar, la mercadería se la envían directamente de fabrica. Lleva en este negocio por más de 5 años y les ha ido muy bien.

Este crédito lo va a emplear para comprar todo tipo de ropa de hombre. Lleva 3 años en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque los intereses son muy bajos.
 
Su sueño es tener su propio departamento ya que donde viven es arrendado.
texts.en:
The members of the "Renacer" communal bank meet very two weeks in the El Florón housing development in the city of Portoviejo, capital of Manabí province, known for many years as the City of the Royal Tamarind Trees. 

This is where we met Gema. She is 21, married, and they have no children yet. Her husband is a small business owner. She studies Early Childhood Education at the University.

She is taking out the loan for her husband. He has a shop in the center of the city, in partnership with a sister. They sell shirts, ties, belts, and various articles of men's clothing. They work every day from 8:00am to 6:00pm. In addition, he uses his car to transport schoolchildren.

They send him the merchandise directly from the factory. He has been in this business for more than five years, and it has gone very well for them. He is going to use this loan to buy all kinds of men's clothing.  

She has been in the communal bank for three years, and likes it, because the interest rates are very low. 

Her dream is to have her own apartment, since they are renting the place where they live.

loans.use: To buy men's clothing.

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es:
Jose Luis nació en la ciudad de Huayllabamba y vive en la misma ciudad donde nació. (El distrito peruano de Huayllabamba es uno de los siete distritos de la Provincia de Urubamba, ubicada en el Departamento del Cusco, perteneciente a la Región Cusco, Perú). 

Jose Luis tiene 20 años edad, es soltero y aun no tiene hijos, él tiene dos actividades económicas principales que realiza durante el año y estos son: él se dedica a la agricultura y la ganadería, él durante los meses de abril hasta octubre se dedica cultivar y sembrar maíz, zapallos, zanahorias, tomates y otras verduras pero durante los meses de Octubre a Marzo se dedica al negocio de venta de choclo y lleva sus productos a la ciudades de Juliaca y Arequipa y los distribuye a los mercados mayoristas de esas ciudades. En esta oportunidad José Luis requiere el préstamo para comprar abono y fertilizante. Su sueño de Jose Luis es comprar un carro para poder transportar sus productos pues actualmente lo que hacer es alquilar un camión.    

Jose Luis es integrante del banco comunal “Virgen Natividad” y el grupo está conformado con 15 socios que viven unos en el ciudad de Huayllabamba y otros viven en el ciudad de Yucay. El distrito peruano de Yucay es uno de los siete distritos de la Provincia de Urubamba.
texts.en:
Jose Luis was born in the city of Huayllabamba and lives in the same city where he was born. (The Peruvian district of Huayllabamba is one of the seven districts of the Urubamba Province, located in the department of Cusco, belonging to the Cusco region, Peru.)

Jose Luis is 20 years old. He is single and he does not have children. He has 2 main economic activities that he does during the year and they are agriculture and livestock. During the months of April to October he cultivates and plants corn, squash, carrots, tomatoes and other vegetables but during the months October to March he sells corn and takes his products to the cities of Juliaca and Arequipa and distributes them to the wholesale markets in these cities. At this time, Jose Luis is asking for a loan to buy compost and fertilizer. His dream is to buy a car so he can transport his products because currently he has to rent a truck.

Jose Luis is a member of the communal bank Virgin Natividad and the group has 15 members that live in the city of Huayllabamba, and others live in the city of Yucay. The Peruvian district of Yucay is one of the seven districts of the Urubamba Province.

loans.use: to buy compost and fertilizer

loans.name: Azucena Margarita

texts.es:
En la ciudadela El Florón de la ciudad de Portoviejo, capital de Manabí conocida desde hace muchos años  como la ciudad de los reales tamarindos, se reúnen cada quince días  las socias del Banco Comunal Renacer.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Azucena, ella tiene  48 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tiene cinco hijos, cuatro  mayores de edad y uno de 4 años. Su esposo tiene una vulcanizadora.

Ella aprovechando que su esposo tiene una vulcanizadora comenzó con su primer crédito un negocio de venta de tubos y llantas para automóviles, ella vende llantas nuevas o reencauchadas, trabaja en su negocio de lunes a sabados y nos cuenta que sus ventas están aseguradas ya que les vende a los clientes que llegan hasta donde su esposo para que le realice sus trabajos.

Este crédito lo va a emplear para comprar llantas y tubos. Lleva 16 años en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque los créditos son rápidos y sin tantos requisitos.
 
Su sueño es un negocio mucho más estructurado.
texts.en:
In the citadel El Florón in the city of Portoviejo, capital of Manabí, known for many years as the city of the Royal Tamarind Trees, the members of the communal bank of Banco Comunal Renacer meet twice a month.

In this place we meet Azucena. She is 48 years old, married and from this relationship has five children, four older children and one who is four years old. Her husband has a tire repair shop. She took advantage of her husband having a tire shop when she began her first loan for a business selling tubes and tires for cars. She sells new tires or retreads. She works in her business from Monday to Saturday and tells us that her sales are certain because she sells them to customers that have come to her husband to give him work.

This loan will be used to buy tires and tubes. She has been a member of the communal bank for sixteen years and she likes it because the loans are fast and without many requirements.

Her dream is a more orderly business.

loans.use: to buy tires and tubes

loans.name: Carmen Rosa

texts.es:
Carmen Rosa nació en la ciudad de Huayllabamba y vive en la misma ciudad donde nació.(El distrito peruano de Huayllabamba es uno de los siete distritos de la Provincia de Urubamba, ubicada en el Departamento del Cusco, perteneciente a la Región Cusco, Perú). 

Carmen Rosa tiene 56 años edad, es casada y ya son varios años que lleva casada con su esposo y tiene una bonita relación de la cual tienen dos hijos, ella tiene tres actividades económicas principales que realiza durante el año y estos son: ella se dedica a la agricultura, a la venta de chicha de jora y a la crianza de animales menores, ella durante los meses de abril hasta octubre se dedica cultivar y sembrar como por ejemplo maíz, zapallos, zanahorias, tomates y otras verduras pero durante los meses de Octubre a Marzo se dedica al negocio de venta de choclo, ella lleva sus choclos a vender a las ciudades de Juliaca y Arequipa y los choclos distribuye a los diferentes mercados mayoristas de esas ciudades. En esta oportunidad Carmen Rosa requiere el préstamo para comprar choclos. Su sueño de Carmen Rosa es comprar un carro para poder transportar sus productos pues actualmente lo que hacer es alquilar un camión para llevar sus productos.    

Carmen Rosa es integrante del banco comunal “Virgen Natividad” y el grupo está conformado con 15 socios que viven unos en la ciudad de Huayllabamba y otros en la ciudad de Yucay. El distrito peruano de Yucay es uno de los siete distritos de la Provincia de Urubamba.
texts.en:
Carmen Rosa was born in the city of Huayllabamba, and this is where she still lives.  The Peruvian district of Huayllabamba is one of the seven districts of Urubamba province, located in the department of Cusco in the Cusco region of Peru.

Carmen Rosa is 56 years old and married.  She has been married to her husband for a number of years, and they have a beautiful relationship that has produced two children.  Carmen Rosa has three main economic activities that she carries out during the year, these are: farming, the sale of chicha de jora (a traditional Peruvian beverage made from corn), and raising small animals.  During the months of April through October she plants and cultivates corn, squash, carrots, tomatoes and other vegetables, but during the months of October through March she has a business selling choclo (a Peruvian variety of corn with large kernels).  She takes her corn to sell in the cities of Juliaca and Arequipa where she distributes it in the different wholesale markets in those cities.  At this time, Carmen Rosa needs a loan to buy corn.  Carmen Rosa's dream is to buy a car to use in transporting her products, since now she has to rent a van to take her products to the market.

Carmen Rosa is a member of the communal bank “Virgen Natividad," which has 15 members who live in the city of Huayllabamaba, and others who live in the city of Yucay.  Yucay district is one of the seven districts of the province of Urubamba.

loans.use: to buy corn

loans.name: Reshon

texts.en:
In 2007, ReShon was hit with economic hard times with a layoff from a previous employer, and decided to give entrepreneurship a try. She then put her passion for fashionable accessories and previous experience in online sales and e-commerce to use by starting a business. ReShon now owns Angel Handbags LLC, an online retailer for designer handbags and accessories. Her niche is in a limited number of up-and-coming designers, animal/eco friendly products, and the right combination of search optimization with shopping sites presence. 

ReShon is using this loan to purchase inventory for 2012 and invest in marketing for sales growth. Check out the website here: 

http://www.angelhandbags.com/

loans.use: To purchase inventory for the upcoming 2012 season.

loans.name: Augusto

texts.es:
Augusto nació en la ciudad de Huayllabamba y vive en la misma ciudad donde nació. (El distrito peruano de Huayllabamba es uno de los siete distritos de la Provincia de Urubamba, ubicada en el Departamento del Cusco, perteneciente a la Región Cusco, Perú). 

Augusto tiene 36 años edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos, él tiene dos actividades económicas principales que realiza durante todo el año y estos son: él se dedica a la agricultura y ganadería, él durante los meses de abril hasta octubre se dedica cultivar y sembrar maíz, zapallos, zanahorias, tomates y otras verduras pero durante los meses de Octubre a Marzo se dedica al negocio de venta de choclo y lleva sus choclos a vender a la ciudades de Juliaca y Arequipa y los distribuye a los diferentes mercados mayoristas de esas ciudades. En esta oportunidad Augusto requiere el préstamo para comprar choclos.

Su sueño de Augusto es comprar un camión para poder transportar sus productos pues actualmente lo que hacer es alquilar un camión para llevar sus productos.    

Augusto es integrante del banco comunal “Virgen Natividad” y el grupo está conformado con 15 socios que viven unos en la ciudad de Huayllabamba y otros en la ciudad de Yucay. El distrito peruano de Yucay es uno de los siete distritos de la Provincia de Urubamba.
texts.en:
Augusto was born in the city of Huayllabamba, and this is where he still lives. The Peruvian district of Huayllabamba is one of the seven districts of Urubamba province, located in the department of Cusco in the Cusco region of Peru.

Augusto is 36 years old and is in a common-law marriage that has produced 2 children.  He has two main economic activities that he carries out during the year, these are: farming and raising livestock.  During the months of April through October he plants and cultivates corn, squash, carrots, tomatoes and other vegetables, but during the months of October through March he has a business selling choclo (a Peruvian variety of large-kerneled corn). He takes his corn to sell in the cities of Juliaca and Arequipa where he distributes to the various wholesale markets in those cities.  At this time, Augusto needs a loan to buy corn.

Augusto's dream is to buy a truck to use in transporting his products, since now he has to rent a truck to take his products to the market.

Augusto is a member of the communal bank “Virgen Natividad," which has 15 members who live in the city of Huayllabamaba, and others who live in the city of Yucay. Yucay district is one of the seven districts of the province of Urubamba.

loans.use: to buy corn

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en:
Rebecca is from Sto. Niño, Tukuran, Zamboanga del sur. She is 38 years old. Rebecca is married and has 3 school-age children. 

To make a living, Rebecca owns & operates a business selling a variety of fruit products in the local community. Rebecca has been engaged in her business for over 5 years and earns approximately 20,000 PHP a month. 

In 2008, Rebecca joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and to have the ability to engage in business activities. Rebecca is requesting a new loan of 30,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase additional products to sell. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell.

location.town: Sto. Niño, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Avelina

texts.es:
Avelina nació en la ciudad de Huayllabamba y vive en la misma ciudad donde nació. (El distrito peruano de Huayllabamba es uno de los siete distritos de la Provincia de Urubamba, ubicada en el Departamento del Cusco, perteneciente a la Región Cusco, Perú). 

Avelina tiene 41 años edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene tres hijos, ella tiene tres actividades económicas principales que realiza durante todo año y estos son: ella se dedica a la venta de chicha de jora, agricultura y ganadería. Ella durante los meses de abril hasta octubre se dedica cultivar y sembrar maíz, zapallos, zanahorias, tomates y otras verduras pero durante los meses de octubre a marzo se dedica al negocio de venta de verduras y a la venta de choclo. Ella lleva sus choclos a vender a la ciudades de Juliaca y Arequipa y los distribuye a los diferentes mercados mayoristas de esas ciudades. En esta oportunidad Avelina requiere el préstamo para comprar más choclos, pasto y zapallos. Su sueño de Avelina es comprar un camión para poder transportar sus productos pues actualmente lo que hacer es alquilar un camión para llevar sus productos.    

Avelina es integrante del banco comunal “Virgen Natividad” y el grupo está conformado con 15 socios que viven unos en la ciudad de Huayllabamba y otros en la ciudad de Yucay. El distrito peruano de Yucay es uno de los siete distritos de la Provincia de Urubamba.
texts.en:
Avelina was born in the city of Huayllabamba and lives in the same city where she was born. (The Peruvian district of Huayllabamba is one of the seven districts of the Urubamba Province, located in the Department of Cusco, which belongs to the Cusco Region in Peru.)

Avelina is 41 years old and is in a commonwealth marriage from which she has three children. She has three main economic jobs that she does during the year, and they are: selling fermented beverages, agriculture, and stockbreeding.  From April to October she cultivates and plants corn, pumpkins, carrots, tomatoes, and other vegetables, but from October to March she makes a living selling vegetables and selling corn. 

She brings corn cobs to sell to the cities of Juliaca and Arequipa and distributes them to different wholesale markets in these cities. At this time, Avelina needs a loan so that she can buy more corn, fodder, and pumpkins. Avelina's dream is to buy a truck so that she can transport her products, since right now what she does is rent a truck to take her products. 

Avelina is a member of the communal bank, “Virgen Natividad,” and the group is made up of 15 members, some living in the city of Huayllabamba and others in the city of Yucay. The Peruvian district of Yucay is one of the seven districts in the Urubamba Province.

loans.use: to buy more corn, fodder, and pumpkins.

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.es:
Yolanda nació en la ciudad de Huayllabamba pero actualmente vive en la ciudad Yucay. (Los distritos peruanos de Huayllabamba y Yucay son uno de los siete distritos de la Provincia de Urubamba, ubicada en el Departamento del Cusco, perteneciente a la Región Cusco, Perú). 

Yolanda tiene 40 años edad y es casada y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene cinco hijos, ella tiene una actividad económica principal que realiza durante todo año. Ella durante los meses de abril hasta octubre se dedica a comprar,  a cultivar y a sembrar maíz, zapallos, zanahorias, tomates y otras verduras pero durante los meses de octubre a marzo se dedica al negocio de venta de verduras y a la venta de choclo. Ella lleva sus choclos a vender a la ciudades de Urubamba, Cusco, Calca y otras ciudades. Ella distribuye sus productos a los diferentes mercados mayoristas de esas ciudades. En esta oportunidad Yolanda requiere el préstamo para comprar más choclos, pasto, zapallos y otras verduras. Su sueño de Yolanda es abrir un restaurante. 

Yolanda es integrante del banco comunal “Virgen Natividad” y el grupo está conformado con 15 socios que viven unos en la ciudad de Huayllabamba y otros en la ciudad de Yucay.
texts.en:
Yolanda  was born in the city of Huayllabamba, but she now lives in the city of Yucay. (The Peruvian districts of Huayllabamba and Yucay are two of the seven districts of Urubamba province, located in the department of Cusco in the Cusco region of Peru.)

Yolanda is 40 years old and married.  Through this beautiful relationship they have 5 children. Yolanda works throughout the year.  During the months of April through October she plants and cultivates corn, squash, carrots, tomatoes and other vegetables, but during the months of October through March she has a business selling choclo (a Peruvian variety of large-kerneled corn). She takes her corn to sell in Urubamba, Cusco, Calca and other cities.  She distributes her corn in the different wholesale markets in these cities. At this time, Yolanda needs a loan to buy more corn, pasture grass, squash and other vegetables. Yolanda's dream is to open a restaurant.

Yolanda is a member of the communal bank “Virgen Natividad," which has 15 members who live in the city of Huayllabamaba, and others who live in the city of Yucay.

loans.use: to buy more corn, pasture grass, squash and other vegetables

loans.name: Margarita

texts.en:
Margarita is from Sto. Niño, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur. She is 40 years old, married, and has three school-aged children. 

To make a living, Margarita owns and operates a fruit business, selling a variety of fruits products in the local community. Margarita has been engaged in her business for over 8 years and earns approximately 16,000 PHP a month. 

In 2011, Margarita joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and her ability to engage in business activities. Margarita is requesting a loan of 20,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase additional fruit to sell. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional fruit to sell.

location.town: Sto. Niño, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Lorenza

texts.es:
Lorenza nació en la ciudad de Abancay del departamento de Apurímac pero actualmente vive en la ciudad Yucay.( El distrito peruano de Yucay es uno de los siete distritos de la Provincia de Urubamba, ubicada en el Departamento del Cusco, perteneciente a la Región Cusco, Perú). 

Lorenza tiene 45 años edad y es casada y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene cinco hijos, ella tiene dos actividad económicas principales que realiza durante todo el año. Ella se dedica a la venta de artesanía y a la venta de productos de belleza de las marcas de Esika y Unique. Ella tambien elabora diferentes tipos de tejidos como mantas, chompas, pasadizos, chullos, frazadas y otras cosas más. Ella vende sus tejidos de forma ambulatoria en la puerta de uno de los hoteles más lujosos de la ciudad de Yucay. 

En esta oportunidad Lorenza requiere el préstamo para comprar más materiales como lana para seguir elaborando tejidos. Lorenza con las ganancias del negocio puede educar y alimentar a sus hijos por eso es muy importante el préstamo.  

Lorenza es integrante del banco comunal “Virgen Natividad” y el grupo está conformado con 15 socios que viven unos en la ciudad de Huayllabamba y otros en la ciudad de Yucay.
texts.en:
Lorenza was born in the city of Abancay but currently lives in the city of Yucay. (The peruvian district of Yucay is one of the seven districts in the province of Urubamba, located in the Department and Region of Cusco.) Lorenza, age 45, has 5 children as a result of her happy marriage. She has two main areas of work all year round. She sells handicrafts and beauty products from the "Esika" and "Unique" brands. She also makes a variety of woven items, including ponchos, sweaters, hats, table runners, and blankets. She sells her work on foot at the door of one of the most luxurious hotels in the city of Yucay.

Lorenza needs a loan to buy more materials, such as wool for weaving. With the money she makes from her work, Lorenza is able to educate and feed her children, so the loan is very important to her. She is a member of the “Virgen Natividad” Communal Bank, a group formed of 15 members. some of the members live in the city of Huayllabamba and others in the city of Yucay.

loans.use: To buy more materials, such as wool

loans.name: Erika

texts.es:
Erika nació en la ciudad de Huayllabamba y vive en la misma ciudad donde nació. (El distrito peruano de Huayllabamba es uno de los siete distritos de la Provincia de Urubamba, ubicada en el Departamento del Cusco, perteneciente a la Región Cusco, Perú). 

Erika tiene 31 años edad y es casada y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene un hijo, ella tiene dos actividad económicas principales que realiza durante todo el año. Ella trabaja como alfabetizadora del estado en el poblado de Urquillos de la provincia de Calca y también se dedica a la venta de choclo, pasto y otras verduras mas. En esta oportunidad Erika requiere el préstamo para comprar más verduras como choclo y pasto. 

Erika es integrante del banco comunal “Virgen Natividad” y el grupo está conformado con 15 socios que viven unos en la ciudad de Huayllabamba y otros en la ciudad de Yucay.
texts.en:
Erika was born in the city of Huayllabamba, and still lives in the city of her birth. (The peruvian district of Huayllabamba is one of the seven districts in the province of Urubamba, located in the Department and Region of Cusco.) 

Erika, age 31, has one child as a result of her happy marriage. She has two main areas of work all year round. She works as a state literacy teacher in the settlement of Urquillos in Calca province, and she also sells maize, hay and vegetables. Erika needs the loan to buy more vegetables. 

She is a member of the “Virgen Natividad” Communal Bank, a group formed of 15 members. some of the members live in the city of Huayllabamba and others in the city of Yucay.

loans.use: To buy more vegetables, maize and hay.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
Juan nació en la ciudad de Huayllabamba pero vive en la ciudad de Yucay. (Los distritos peruanos de Yucay y Huayllabamba son uno de los siete distritos de la Provincia de Urubamba, ubicada en el Departamento del Cusco, perteneciente a la Región Cusco, Perú.) 

Juan tiene 42 años edad y es casado y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene dos hijos. Su actividad económica principal del socio Juan es la venta de choclo, pasto y otras verduras. En esta oportunidad Juan requiere el préstamo para comprar más verduras como choclo. 

Juan es integrante del banco comunal “Virgen Natividad” y el grupo está conformado con 15 socios que viven unos en la ciudad de Huayllabamba y otros en la ciudad de Yucay.
texts.en:
Juan was born in the city of Huayllabamba but lives in the city of Yucay. (The peruvian districts of Yucay and Huayllabamba are two of the seven districts in the province of Urubamba, located in the Department and Region of Cusco, Peru.) 

Jun, age 42, has has two children as a result of his happy marriage. His main economic activity is selling maize, animal fodder and vegetables. Juan is seeking the loan to buy more vegetables, such as maize.

Juan es integrante del banco comunal “Virgen Natividad” y el grupo está conformado con 15 socios que viven unos en la ciudad de Huayllabamba y otros en la ciudad de Yucay.

loans.use: To buy more vegetables, such as maize.

loans.name: Bloques De San Marcos (Portoviejo) Group

texts.es:
En la ciudadela Municipal de la ciudad de Portoviejo se reúnen  cada quince días las 11 socias y 1 socio  del Grupo De  Crédito Bloques De San Marcos. Los mismos que se dedican a diversas actividades tales como comercio en general, prestación de servicios entre otras actividades. Ellos hace poco y al conocer de los beneficios que brinda la institución decidieron unirse  para  poder acceder a los créditos que brinda La  Fundación Espoir, este es su primer ciclo en el Banco Comunal   y esperan cumplir muy bien para seguir recibiendo los beneficios que da la institución.

En este lugar conocimos a don Miguel, tiene 36 años de edad, está separado, pero de esa  relación tienen cinco hijos de  17, 12, 6, 3 y 2 años de edad, tres de ellos viven con él y  estudian dos en colegio y uno en escuela.

Ella para ganarse el sustento diario se dedica a la venta de comida como carne asada, cueritos de chancho asados, acompañados de plátano asado y de una deliciosa ensalada de legumbres, lo cual es muy solicitado por los clientes de la localidad, nos cuenta que él se desplaza en una carreta por toda la ciudad vendiendo este delicioso plato, trabaja todos los días en las tardes desde las 14h00 hasta las 19h00, lleva 5 años realizando esta actividad y es así como ha podido sacar adelante a sus hijos.

Este crédito es para comprar carne de res, carne de chancho, legumbres, plátano y varias cosas necesarias en su negocio.
 
Sus sueños son salir adelante y algún dia tener un local para vender sus productos.

La foto pequeña adjunta es de una socia que por motivos de salud no pudo estar presente cuando se tomó la foto del grupo.
texts.en:
In the "Municipal" neighbourhood of the city of Portoviejo, eleven women and one man meet every 15 days as the "Bloques De San Marcos" group of borrowers. The group members pursue a range of economic activities, including sales and service occupations. To make the most of the benefits offered by the institution, they decided to unite to be able to access the credit available through [the field partner] Fundación Espoir. This is the group's first loan cycle and they hope to complete it successfully to continue to access the benefits of belonging to the institution.

Here we meet Don Miguel. He is 36 years old and, though they are separated now, he and his wife have five children, aged 17, 12, 6, 3 and 2 years old. Three of the children live with him, with two studying at primary school and one at secondary school. To earn his living he sells food, such as barbequed steak, pork chops, roast plantains and a delicious vegetable salad which his customers love. He sells these delicious dishes from a cart all over the city, working 5 hours every afternoon from 2pm till 7pm. In this way he has been able to bring up his children. This loan is to buy beef, pork, vegetables, plantains and other items necessary for his business. His dreams are to continue developing and one day to have a fixed location to sell his produce. 

The little photo inset is one of the group members, who was unwell and could not attend on the day the group photo was taken.

loans.use: To buy beef, pork, vegetables, plantains etc.

loans.name: Alcida

texts.es:
Alcida nació en la ciudad de Quillabamba de la provincia de La Convención pero vive en el poblado de Rumichaca de la provincia de Urubamba. (La provincia de Urubamba está ubicada al norte de la ciudad del Cusco, a orillas del río Vilcanota, en una zona que se conoce como el “Valle Sagrado” debido a su clima templado, tierra  fértil y abundantes riachuelos, que hacen de este valle uno de los más bellos del planeta.).

Alcida tiene 29 años edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos, ella trabaja en un condominio donde realiza diferentes labores como por ejemplo limpieza, lavar ropa, cocina y otras actividades. Ya es un año que trabaja en ese condominio y le va muy bien gracias al desempeño laboral que realza.

En esta oportunidad Alcida requiere el préstamo para construir su casa por lo tanto va comprar materiales de construcción como por ejemplo cemento, bloquetas, ladrillos, fierro, madera y otras cosas más.  Su sueño de Alcida era construir su casa por lo tanto ahora que se va cumplir su sueño pues ella tiene otro sueño que es ver a sus hijos profesionales.  

Alcida es integrante del banco comunal “Nueva Vision de Rumichaca”. Este  grupo está conformado con 19 socios que viven  en la provincia de Urubamba.
texts.en:
Alcida was born in Quillabamba, in the province of La Convención, but she lives in the settlement of Rumichaca in Urubamba. (The province of Urubamba is located north of the city of Cusco, on the shores of the Vilcanota River, in a zone known as the "Blessed Valley" thanks to the pleasant climate, fertile land and abundant streams that make the valley one of the most beautiful places on the planet.)

Alcida is 29 years old and has two children with her partner. She works in a large house, where she does a range of tasks, such as cleaning, washing clothes, cooking and other work. She has been working in the house for a year and it is going well thanks to the effort she puts into carrying out her tasks.

Alcida needs the loan to build her home, or at least to buy construction materials such as cement, blocks, bricks, iron, timber and other things. Her dream is to build her house, and she is now close to completing that dream. The other dream she has is to see her children grow into professionals.

Alcida is a member of the “Nueva Vision de Rumichaca” communal bank. This group is made up of 19 members who live in the province of Urubamba.

loans.use: To buy construction materials such as cement, blocks, bricks, iron, timber and other things.

loans.name: Eneria

texts.en:
Eneria is from Litapan, Ozamiz City. She is 59 years old, married and has 8 adult children. 

To make a living, Eneria is engaged in a livestock business, raising cows for sale. Eneria has been engaged in her business for over 5 years and earns about 10,000 PHP a month from these activities. 

In 2006, Eneria joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Eneria is requesting a loan of 30,000 PHP which will be used to purchase baby livestock to raise & sell in future. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase baby livestock to raise & sell in future.

loans.name: Janette

texts.es:
Janette nació en la ciudad de Taray de la provincia de Calca pero vive en el poblado de Rumichaca de la provincia de Urubamba. (La provincia de Urubamba está ubicada al norte de la ciudad del Cusco, a orillas del río Vilcanota, en una zona que se conoce como el “Valle Sagrado” debido a su clima templado, tierra  fértil y abundantes riachuelos, que hacen de este valle uno de los más bellos del planeta.).

Janette tiene 26 años edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos, ella se dedica a la elaboración de cerámica al frio de forma independiente y tiene un pequeño taller en su domicilio. En esta oportunidad Janette requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales como por ejemplo pintura, acrílicos, yeso, cola, moldes, madera y otras cosas más que necesitan para elaborar la artesanía. Su sueño de Janette perfeccionar su trabajo de elaboración de la cerámica y también tiene otro sueño que es abrir una galería donde pueda exhibir sus productos. 

Janette es integrante del banco comunal “Nueva Vision de Rumichaca”. Este  grupo está conformado con 19 socios que viven  en la provincia de Urubamba.
texts.en:
Janette was born in the city of Taray in the province of Calca but lives in the village of Rumichaca in the province of Urubamba. The province of Urubamba is located north of the city of Cusco, along the river Vilcanota, in a zone that is known as the Sacred Valley because of its mild weather. The land is fertile and teeming with streams making this valley one of the most beautiful in the world.

Janette is 26 years old, has a common law relationship and has 2 children. She works making cold cast ceramics, working independently from a small workshop in her home. 

Janette is asking for a loan to buy supplies such as paint, acrylic, plaster, adhesive, molds, wood and other things that are needed in her craft.

Her dream is to improve the work she does making ceramics and also another dream is to open a gallery where she can exhibit her work.

Janette is a member of the communal bank Nueva Vision de Rumichaca. This group has 19 members who live in the province of Urubamba.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as paint, acrylic, plaster, adhesive, molds, wood and other things

loans.name: Irma

texts.es:
Irma nació en la provincia de Urubamba pero vive en el poblado de Rumichaca Baja. (La provincia de Urubamba está ubicada al norte de la ciudad del Cusco, a orillas del río Vilcanota, en una zona que se conoce como el “Valle Sagrado” debido a su clima templado, tierra  fértil y abundantes riachuelos, que hacen de este valle uno de los más bellos del planeta.).

Irma tiene 32 años edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene un hijo, ella se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad. Ya son dos años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. Ella tiene una pequeña tienda en su domicilio donde tiene diferentes productos surtidos pero en esta oportunidad ella requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo sacos de arroz, sacos de azúcar y otras cosas. Su sueño de Irma es abrir un supermarket en la ciudad de Rumichaca. 

Irma es integrante del banco comunal “Nueva Vision de Rumichaca”. Este  grupo está conformado con 19 socios que viven  en la provincia de Urubamba.
texts.en:
Irma was born in Urubama but she lives in Rumichaca Baja (Urubamba province is north of Cusco, on the Vilcanota River that is in the “Valle Sagrado” (sacred zone, because of its temperate climate, fertile soil and abundant streams that make this valley one of the most beautiful of the planet).

Irma is 32,  is in a common-law-marriage and has one son.  She sells basic products.  She has been in this business for two years and it’s going very well thanks to the effort she puts into her work.  She has a small store in her home where she sells assorted items and at this time she needs a loan to buy merchandise such as: sacks of rice, sacks of sugar and more.  Irma’s dream is to open a supermarket in Rumichaca.

Irma is a member of the communal bank “Nueva Vision de Rumichaca”.  This group is made up of 19 members who live in Rumichaca province.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as: sacks of rice, sacks of sugar and more

loans.name: Eloy

texts.es:
Eloy nació en la provincia de Urubamba pues vive en el poblado de Rumichaca Baja.( La provincia de Urubamba está ubicada al norte de la ciudad del Cusco, a orillas del río Vilcanota, en una zona que se conoce como el “Valle Sagrado” debido a su clima templado, tierra  fértil y abundantes riachuelos, que hacen de este valle uno de los más bellos del planeta.).

Eloy tiene 46 años edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene tres hijos, él es carpintero de oficio y tiene en su domicilio un pequeño taller de carpintería donde fabrica sillas, puertas, mesas, roperos, ventas y otras cosas más. Ya son 13  años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. Él en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales como por ejemplo madera, cola de carpintero, clavos y otras materiales. Su sueño de Eloy es abrir un grifo en la ciudad de Rumichaca. 

Eloy es integrante del banco comunal “Nueva Visión de Rumichaca”. Este  grupo está conformado con 19 socios que viven  en la provincia de Urubamba.
texts.en:
Eloy was born in the province of Urubamba and lives in the town of Rumichaca Baja.  (The province of Urubamba is located to the north of the city of Cusco, on the banks of the Vilcanota River, in an area known as the "Sacred Valley."Due to its temperate climate, fertile soil, and abundant streams, this valley is one of the most beautiful on the planet).

Eloy is 46 and lives in a common-law marriage from which he has 3 children.  He is a carpenter by trade and has a small shop in his home where he makes chairs, doors, tables, wardrobes, and other items.  He has had this business for 13 years, and it is going very well thanks to the effort he puts into his work.  He needs a loan to buy materials like wood, wood glue, nails, etc.  His dream is to open a gas station in the city of Rumichaca.

Eloy is a member of the communal bank, "Nueva Visión de Rumichaca" (New Vision of Rumichaca).  This group is made up of 19 members who live in the province of Urubamba.

loans.use: to buy materials like wood, wood glue, nails, etc.

loans.name: Nemesio

texts.en:
Nemesio is a married and has four children. He is 52 years old and he resides at Lupagan, Clarin, Misamis Occidental in the Philippines. He owns and operates a farm, planting & harvesting rice for sale to earn a living, and he has been 10 years in this business. Each month, he earns approximately 2,000 PHP doing this type of business. 

Nemesio requested a loan of 6,000 PHP to purchase fertilizer such as manure. In 2005, he joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve his living situation and ability to engage in business activities. He plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer such as manure.

loans.name: Evangelina

texts.es:
Evangelina nació en la provincia de Urubamba pues  vive en el poblado de Rumichaca Baja. (La provincia de Urubamba está ubicada al norte de la ciudad del Cusco, a orillas del río Vilcanota, en una zona que se conoce como el “Valle Sagrado” debido a su clima templado, tierra  fértil y abundantes riachuelos, que hacen de este valle uno de los más bellos del planeta.).

Evangelina tiene 48 años edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene tres hijos, ella es una mujer emprendedora y trabajadora que saca adelante a su familia, ella tiene dos actividades económicas la agricultura y la crianza de animales menores como pollos. Ya son cuatro años que se dedica a la venta de pollos y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo, ella en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar pollos. 

Evangelina es integrante del banco comunal “Nueva Vision de Rumichaca”. Este  grupo está conformado con 19 socios que viven  en la provincia de Urubamba.
texts.en:
Evangelina was born in Urubamba Province.  She lives in the Rumichaca Baja neighborhood.  (Urubamba Province is located to the north of the city of Cusco, on the shores of Vilcanota River.  The area is known as “Valle Sagrado” (Sacred Valley) for its mild climate, fertile land and abundant streams that make this valley one of the most beautiful on the planet.)

Evangelina is 48 years old and with her partner has three children.  She is an enterprising and hardworking woman who keeps her family moving forward.  She has two businesses- agriculture and raising small animals like chickens.  She has made her living selling chickens for four years already, and it is been going very well for her thanks to the effort that she puts into her work.  At this point, Evangelina is requesting the loan to purchase chickens.

Evangelina is a member of the communal bank “Nueva Vision de Rumichaca” (New vision of Rumichaca).  This group is made up of 19 members who live in Urubamba Province.

loans.use: to purchase chickens.

loans.name: Clotilde

texts.es:
Clotilde nació en la provincia de Cusco pero vive en el poblado de Rumichaca Baja de la provincia de Urubamba. (La provincia de Urubamba está ubicada al norte de la ciudad del Cusco, a orillas del río Vilcanota, en una zona que se conoce como el “Valle Sagrado” debido a su clima templado, tierra  fértil y abundantes riachuelos, que hacen de este valle uno de los más bellos del planeta.).

Clotilde tiene 50 años edad y es padre y madre para sus cuatro hijos, ella es una mujer emprendedora y trabajadora que saca adelante a su familia, ella se dedica a la venta de refrescos caseros hechos con sus propias manos, ella prepara chicha morada, agua de limonada, agua de tamarindo, chicha blanca, agua de manzana y otros más, ella vende sus productos de forma ambulatoria en diferentes calles de la ciudad de Urubamba. Ya son ocho años que se dedica a la venta de refrescos y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo.  Clotilde en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar insumos para preparar sus refrescos entonces va comprar maíz, morado, manzana, naranja, piña y otras frutas. 

Clotilde es integrante del banco comunal “Nueva Vision de Rumichaca”. Este  grupo está conformado con 19 socios que viven  en la provincia de Urubamba.
texts.en:
Clotilde was born in Cusco Province but lives in the Rumichaca Baja neighborhood of Urubamba Province. (Urubamba Province is located to the north of the city of Cusco, on the shores of the Vilcanota River.  The area is known as “Valle Sagrado” (Sacred Valley) due to its mild climate, fertile land and abundant streams that make this valley one of the most beautiful on the planet.)

Clotilde is 50 years old and is mother and father to her four children.  She is an enterprising and hardworking  woman who is moving her family forward.  She makes her living selling home-made soft drinks that she prepares with her own hands.  Clotilde makes chicha morada (an alcoholic drink made from fermented purple maize) lemon drink, tamarind drink, white chicha, and apple drink, among others.  She sells her products on the streets of Urubamba City.  She has been making her living selling soft drinks for eight years already, and it has been going very well for her thanks to the effort she puts into her work.  At this time, Clotilde needs the loan to purchase soft-drink making supplies such as maize, purple maize, apples, pineapples and other fruits. 

Clotilde is a member of the communal bank "Nueva Vision de Rumichaca” (New Vision of Rumichaca).  The group is made up of 19 members who live in Urubamba Province.

loans.use: to purchase supplies.

loans.name: Nayda

texts.es:
Nayda nació en la provincia de Urubamba pero vive en el poblado de Yanahuara de la provincia de Urubamba. (La provincia de Urubamba está ubicada al norte de la ciudad del Cusco, a orillas del río Vilcanota, en una zona que se conoce como el “Valle Sagrado” debido a su clima templado, tierra  fértil y abundantes riachuelos, que hacen de este valle uno de los más bellos del planeta.).

Nayda tiene 23 años edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene un hijo, ella es una mujer emprendedora y trabajadora que saca adelante a su familia, ella trabaja en un condominio donde realiza actividades como por ejemplo limpieza, lavado de ropa, cocina y otras cosas más. Ya son varios años que trabaja en el condominio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo.  Nayda tambien tiene una pequeña tienda de abarrotes en su domicilio y ella en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo sacos de azúcar, sacos de arroz, tarros de leche y conservas. 

Nayda es integrante del banco comunal “Nueva Vision de Rumichaca”. Este  grupo está conformado con 19 socios que viven  en la provincia de Urubamba.
texts.en:
Nayda was born in Urubamba Province and lives in the village of Yanauara in Urubamba Province. (Urubamba Province is located north of the city of Cusco, on the banks of the Vilcanota River in an area known as the “Sacred Valley” due to its mild climate, fertile soil and abundant streams which make it one of the most beautiful valleys on the planet).

Nayda is 23 years old and lives in a common law marriage from which she has a son. She is an enterprising and hardworking woman who is moving her family forward.  She works in a condominium where she cleans, does laundry, cooks and does other tasks. She has already worked for several years in the condominium and it is going very well thanks to the effort she puts into her work. Nayda also has a small grocery store in her home and on this occasion needs a loan to purchase merchandise such as sacks of sugar and rice, milk and jars of preserves.

Nayda is a member of the “Nueva Vision de Rumichaca” Communal Bank. This group is made up of 19 members who live in Urubamba Province.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as sacks of sugar and rice, milk and jars of preserves.

loans.name: Meresel

texts.en: Meresel is 34 years old and lives in Danao, Plaridel, Misamis Occidental. She is married with no children. She works in the fish industry and catches fish for a living. She has been doing this for 2 years. She has requested a loan of 15,000 PHP to purchase fishing hooks, gasoline and boat maintenance. She has been a member of PMPC for 2 years and 4 mos. In the future, she hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: To purchase fishing hooks, gasoline and boat maintenance.

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es:
Sonia tiene 27 años edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos, ella nació en la provincia de Acomayo pero vive en el poblado de Rio Grande de la provincia de Urubamba, ella es una mujer emprendedora y trabajadora que saca adelante a su familia, ella trabaja en un condominio donde realiza actividades como por ejemplo limpieza, lavado, cocina y otras más, ella trabaja desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 12 de medio día o desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 5 de la tarde este horario depende si los dueños del condominio se encuentran. Ya es un año que trabaja y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. Sonia en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para uso personal ósea para educación  y para alimentación de sus hijos. 

Sonia es integrante del banco comunal “Nueva Visión de Rumichaca”. Este  grupo está conformado con 19 socios que viven  en la provincia de Urubamba. La provincia de Urubamba está ubicada al norte de la ciudad del Cusco, a orillas del río Vilcanota, en una zona que se conoce como el “Valle Sagrado” debido a su clima templado, tierra  fértil y abundantes riachuelos, que hacen de este valle uno de los más bellos del planeta.
texts.en:
Sonia is 27 years old and in a common law marriage from which she has two children. She was born in the province of Acomayo but lives in the village of Rio Grande in Urubamba province. She is a very  enterprising and hard-working woman who helps her family to get ahead. She works in a condominium where she performs activities like cleaning, washing, cooking, and other services. She works from 8 in the morning until noon or from 8 in the morning to 5 in the afternoon. Her schedule depends on whether the owners of the condominium are there. She has been at this job for a year and it is going very well thanks to the effort that she puts into her work. At this time, Sonia needs a loan for personal use - for her children's education and nutrition.

Sonia is a member of the "Nueva Visión de Rumichaca" ["New Vision of Rumichaca"] Communal Bank, which is comprised of 19 members who all live in Urubamba province. The province of Urubamba is located north of the city of Cusco, on the shores of the Vilcanota River. It is a zone known as the "Valle Sagrado" ["Sacred Valley"] thanks to its temperate climate, fertile land, and abundant streams that make the valley one of the most beutiful places on the planet.

loans.use: to pay for her children's education and nutrition

loans.name: Catalina

texts.en: Catalina is 56 years old and lives in Danao, Plaridel, Misamis Occidental. She is married with 3 children. She works in the fish industry and catches fish for a living. She has been doing this for 10 years. She has requested a loan of 20,000 PHP to purchase fishing nets, hooks and gasoline. She has been a member of PMPC for 4 years. In the future, Catalina hopes to have more savings for her family's future.

loans.use: To purchase fishing nets, hooks and gasoline.

loans.name: Josefa

texts.en: Josefa is 56 years old and is a married woman with 7 children. She has been a farmer for 20 years. She tills the land with her husband in their town of Trinidad, Bohol. Rice is the primary crop that they grow to sell. Josefa works hard to improve their family income. Josefa is requesting a loan to purchase seeds, fertilizers and other farm supplies. She hopes this loan will help them achieve an abundant harvest.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Florencio

texts.es:
Florencio tiene 46 años edad y es casado y fruto de esta unión tiene cuatro hijos, él nació en el departamento de Apurímac   pero vive en el poblado de Cotowincho de la provincia de Urubamba, él es albañil pero nos cuenta con mucha triste que hace 14 años que sufrió un accidente donde se fracturo el pie pero después se recupero pero fue por muy poco tiempo ahora la fractura del pie le empezó a molestar afectándole en su rendimiento de su trabajo hasta el extremo de no dejarle trabajar y teniendo que hasta usar otra vez muletas. Florencio es una persona muy trabajadora que a pesar de las adversidades sigue a delante pero se las ingenio para seguir trabajando, él tiene que acomodar su pie fracturado para que no le incomode al momento de trabajar. Ya son varios años que trabaja y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su labor. 

En esta oportunidad Florencio requiere el préstamo para comprar medicinas.

Florencio es integrante del banco comunal “Nueva Vision de Rumichaca”. Este  grupo está conformado con 19 socios que viven  en la provincia de Urubamba. La provincia de Urubamba está ubicada al norte de la ciudad del Cusco, a orillas del río Vilcanota, en una zona que se conoce como el “Valle Sagrado” debido a su clima templado, tierra  fértil y abundantes riachuelos, que hacen de este valle uno de los más bellos del planeta.
texts.en:
Florencio, age 46, is married and has four children.  He was born in the Apurímac department, but he lives in the town of Cotowincho in the Urubamba province.

He is a bricklayer.  However, with great sadness he tells us that 14 years ago he had an accident where he fractured his foot.  He later recovered, but only for a short while.  Now the fractured foot has started to bother him and affect his work performance.  At times it has gone to the extreme of not letting him work, and he even has to use crutches again.

Florencio is a very hard-working person.  In spite of the adversities, he continues on and manages to continue working.  He has to arrange his fractured foot so that it is not a problem when it is time to work.

He has worked for several years, and thanks to the effort he puts into his work it is going very well for him. 

Florencio now needs the loan to buy medications.  Florencio is a member of the Nueva Vision de Rumichaca communal bank.  This group is comprised of 19 members who live in the Urubamba province.  

The province of Urubamba is north of the city of Cusco on the banks of the Vilcanota River.  It is a zone that is known as the “Valle Sagrado” (Sacred Valley) because of its temperate climate, fertile land, and abundant streams.  They make this valley one of the most beautiful on the planet.

loans.use: to buy medications.

loans.name: Mariano

texts.es:
Mariano tiene 39 años edad y es soltero pero aun no tiene hijos, él nació en la distrito de Maras de la provincia de Urubamba, él trabaja brindando servicio de mototaxi en la ciudad de Urubamba. Ya son varios años que trabaja y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su labor.  En esta oportunidad Mariano requiere el préstamo para hacer mantenimiento de su mototaxi. (motocicleta de tres ruedas y con techo que se usa como medio de transporte popular para trechos cortos).

Mariano es integrante del banco comunal “Nueva Vision de Rumichaca”. Este  grupo está conformado con 19 socios que viven  en la provincia de Urubamba. 

La provincia de Urubamba está ubicada al norte de la ciudad del Cusco, a orillas del río Vilcanota, en una zona que se conoce como el “Valle Sagrado” debido a su clima templado, tierra  fértil y abundantes riachuelos, que hacen de este valle uno de los más bellos del planeta.
texts.en:
Mariano is 39 years old and single, but he still does not have children.  He was born in the district of Maras in the province of Urubamba.  He works offering motorcycle taxi service in the city of Urubamba.  He has been working for several years already and it is going very well for him thanks to the effort he puts into his work.

Now Mariano needs the loan to do maintenance on his motorcycle taxi (a motorcycle with three wheels and a roof that is used as a popular means of transportation for short stretches).

Mariano is a member of the Nueva Visión de Rumichaca communal bank.  This group is made up of 19 members who live in the province of Urubamba.  The province of Urubamba is located to the north of the city of Cusco, on the shores of the Vilcanota River, in an area known as the Valle Sagrado [Sacred Valley] because of its temperate climate, fertile land, and abundant streams that make this valley one of the most beautiful on the planet.

loans.use: to do maintenance on his motorcycle taxi.

loans.name: Romelyn

texts.en:
Romelyn is married with 2 children. She is 26 years old and lives in Kauswagan, Plaridel, Misamis Occidental. She has a general store that sells assorted goods like noodles, sardines and sachets of shampoo to earn a living, and she has had this business for 3 years. Each month, she earns about PHP 10,000 doing this type of work. 

She has requested a loan of 20,000 PHP to purchase assorted goods like noodles, sardines and sachets of shampoo. She has been a member of PMPC for 3 years.  In the future, Romelyn hopes to finish all her children through college.

loans.use: To purchase assorted goods like noodles, sardines, and sachets of shampoo.

loans.name: Lolito

texts.en:
Lolito is a fisherman from Trinidad, Bohol. He is married and has a 25-year-old child. Lolito has been a fisherman for 4 years. He earns about 4,800 PHP per month. He also supports his wife in running their small eatery. He works hard to improve his family's quality of living.

He has requested this loan to purchase fishing nets and also raw ingredients such as meat and vegetables. Lolito hopes for his family to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase fishing nets and raw ingredients such as meat and vegetables.

loans.name: Juan Cancio

texts.es:
