Juan Cancio tiene 42 años edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene tres hijos, él nació en el distrito de Maras de la provincia de Urubamba y vive en el poblado de Cotowincho de la provincia de Urubamba, él es carpintero metálico y tiene un pequeño taller en su domicilio donde fabrica sillas de metal, mesas de metal y otro cosas. En esta oportunidad Juan Cancio requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales como por ejemplo fierro, soldadura, pintura, lijar y otras cosas más. 

Juan Cancio es integrante del banco comunal “Nueva Vision de Rumichaca”. Este  grupo está conformado con 19 socios que viven  en la provincia de Urubamba. La provincia de Urubamba está ubicada al norte de la ciudad del Cusco, a orillas del río Vilcanota, en una zona que se conoce como el “Valle Sagrado” debido a su clima templado, tierra  fértil y abundantes riachuelos, que hacen de este valle uno de los más bellos del planeta.
texts.en:
Juan Cancio is a member of the Nueva Vision de Rumichaca communal bank, a group of 19 members who live in Urubamba Province, located north of the city of Cusco on the banks of the Vilcanota River. The area is known as the Sacred Valley for its mild climate, fertile soil, and abundant streams that make this valley one of the most beautiful on the planet.  

Juan Cancio is 42 years old and has three children with his partner. He was born in the Maras district of Urubamba Province and lives in the town of Cotowincho in Urubamba. He's a metal carpenter and has a small workshop in his home where he makes metal chairs, doors, and other items. 
At the moment, Juan Cancio needs this loan to buy materials such as steel, welding material, paint, sandpaper, and other materials.

loans.use: to buy materials such as steel, welding material, paint, sandpaper, and other materials.

loans.name: Mirasol

texts.en:
Mirasol is 35 years old and lives in Danao, Plaridel, Misamis Occidental. She is married with 2 children. Mirasol works in the fish industry and catches fish for a living. She has been doing this for 2 years. 

She has requested a loan of 20,000 PHP to purchase a bundle of nylon, hooks and gasoline. She has been a member of PMPC for 3 years. In the future, Mirasol hopes to save more for the education of her children.

loans.use: To purchase a bundle of nylon, hooks and gasoline.

loans.name: Paulino

texts.es:
Paulino tiene 47 años edad y tiene cinco hijos, él nació en el distrito de Urubamba de la provincia de Urubamba y vive en la misma ciudad donde nació, él es docente y trabaja en uno de los colegios más prestigiosos de la ciudad de Chincheros y enseña en el nivel primario por las mañanas. Ya son 17 años que ejerce su profesión y le va muy bien. Paulino también tiene un pequeño taller de carpintería en su domicilio donde él trabaja por las tardes. Paulino tiene un trabajador quien se encarga del negocio en las horas que paulino no se encuentra en el negocio. En esta oportunidad Paulino requiere el préstamo para comprar madera. 

Paulino es integrante del banco comunal “Nueva Vision de Rumichaca”. Este  grupo está conformado con 19 socios que viven  en la provincia de Urubamba. La provincia de Urubamba está ubicada al norte de la ciudad del Cusco, a orillas del río Vilcanota, en una zona que se conoce como el “Valle Sagrado” debido a su clima templado, tierra  fértil y abundantes riachuelos, que hacen de este valle uno de los más bellos del planeta.
texts.en:
Paulino is a member of the Nueva Vision de Rumichaca communal bank, a group of 19 members who live in Urubamba Province located north of the city of Cusco on the banks of the Vilcanota River. The area is known as the Sacred Valley for its mild climate, fertile soil, and abundant streams that make this valley one of the most beautiful on the planet.

Paulino is 47 years old and has five children. He was born in the Urubamba District in Urubamba Province and lives in the same city where he was born. His is a teacher at one of the most prestigious schools in the city of Chincheros and teaches at the primary level in the mornings. He's already been working in this profession for 17 years and it's going very well. Paulino already has a small carpentry workshop in his home where he works in the afternoon. Paulino has one worker who he employees to man the shop in the hours when he's not there. At the moment, Paulino needs this loan to buy wood.

loans.use: to buy wood.

loans.name: Fidelia

texts.es:
Fidelia tiene 43 años edad y es casada y fruto de esta unión tiene siete hijos, ella nació en el distrito de Huarocondo de la provincia de Anta y actualmente vive en el poblado de la Cantuta de la provincia de Urubamba, ella se dedica a la venta de cerveza y chicha de jora, ella también se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como gallinas y cuyes. En esta oportunidad Fidelia requiere el préstamo para comprar cuyes, gallinas y maíz para hacer jora. 

Fidelia es integrante del banco comunal “Nueva Vision de Rumichaca”. Este  grupo está conformado con 19 socios que viven  en la provincia de Urubamba. La provincia de Urubamba está ubicada al norte de la ciudad del Cusco, a orillas del río Vilcanota, en una zona que se conoce como el “Valle Sagrado” debido a su clima templado, tierra  fértil y abundantes riachuelos, que hacen de este valle uno de los más bellos del planeta.
texts.en:
Fidelia is 43 years old and is married with seven children. She was born in the Huarocondo in the Anta Province. Currently, she lives in the town of Cantuta in Urubamba Province. She sells corn and chicha de jora [traditional corn liquor] while also raising small animals like hens and guinea pigs. At the moment Fidelia needs this loan to buy guinea pigs, hens, and corn to make chicha de jora.  

Fidelia is a member of the Nueva Vision de Rumichaca communal bank, a group of 19 members who live in Urubamba Province, located north of the city of Cusco on the banks of the Vilcanota River. The area is known as the Sacred Valley for its mild climate, fertile soil, and abundant streams that make this valley one of the most beautiful on the planet.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs, hens, and corn to make chicha de jora.

loans.name: Ruku

texts.en:
Ruku is 43 years old.  She is married and has 2 children, aged 20 and 15.  In 2001, she established her potato selling business.  Working 7 days a week and 8 hours a day, she supports her family.  She has already received and successfully repaid 6 loans from Patan BPW and used her most recent to buy potatoes for her business.   

She is a wholesaler in the potato business. She sells potatoes cheaply in the local market. She buys potatoes from the Kalimati bazaar which is one of the famous wholesale vegetable bazaars of the Kathmandu valley. She uses Kiva loans to buy potatoes for her business   In the future, Ruku plans to uplift the economic condition of her family.  She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy potatoes for her business.

loans.name: Marco

texts.es:
Marco tiene 50 años edad y es casado y fruto de esta unión tiene siete hijos, él nació en el distrito de Ollantaytambo de la provincia de Urubamba y actualmente vive en el poblado de la Cantuta de la provincia de Urubamba, él es carpintero y se dedica a la elaboración de mesas, sillas, roperos y otras cosas más. En esta oportunidad Marco requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales como madera y calvos. 

Marco es integrante del banco comunal “Nueva Vision de Rumichaca”. Este  grupo está conformado con 19 socios que viven  en la provincia de Urubamba. La provincia de Urubamba está ubicada al norte de la ciudad del Cusco, a orillas del río Vilcanota, en una zona que se conoce como el “Valle Sagrado” debido a su clima templado, tierra  fértil y abundantes riachuelos, que hacen de este valle uno de los más bellos del planeta.
texts.en:
Marco is 50 years old and married with seven children. He was born in the Ollantaytambo District in Urubamba Province and currently lives in the town of Cantuta. He's a carpenter and makes tables, chairs, armoires, and other items. At the moment, Marco needs this loan to buy materials such as wood and nails. 

Marco is a member of the Nueva Vision de Rumichaca communal bank, a group of 19 members who live in Urubamba Province, located north of the city of Cusco on the banks of the Vilcanota River. The area is known as the Sacred Valley for its mild climate, fertile soil, and abundant streams that make this valley one of the most beautiful on the planet.

loans.use: to buy materials such as wood and nails.

loans.name: Veronica Yanet

texts.es:
Yanet tiene 34 años edad y es casada y fruto de esta unión tiene tres hijos, ella nació en la distrito de  Yucay de la provincia de Urubamba pero vive en la misma ciudad donde nació, ella tiene una pequeña tienda de abarrotes en su domicilio. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien. En esta oportunidad Yanet requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como sacos de azúcar, sacos de arroz, fideos, tarros de leche y otras cosas que faltan en el negocio. 

Yanet es integrante del banco comunal “Nueva Vision de Rumichaca”. Este  grupo está conformado con 19 socios que viven  en la provincia de Urubamba. La provincia de Urubamba está ubicada al norte de la ciudad del Cusco, a orillas del río Vilcanota, en una zona que se conoce como el “Valle Sagrado” debido a su clima templado, tierra  fértil y abundantes riachuelos, que hacen de este valle uno de los más bellos del planeta.
texts.en:
Yanet is 34 years old and is married with three children. She was born in the Yucay district of Urubamba Province and lives in the same city where she was born. She has a small grocery store in her home. She's had this business for several years already and it's going very well. At the moment, Yanet needs this loan to buy merchandise like sacks of sugar, rice, noodles, jars of milk, and other items that her store is missing. 

Yanet is a member of the Nueva Vision de Rumichaca communal bank, a group of 19 members who live in Urubamba Province, located north of the city of Cusco on the banks of the Vilcanota River. The area is known as the Sacred Valley for its mild climate, fertile soil, and abundant streams that make this valley one of the most beautiful on the planet.

loans.use: to buy merchandise like sacks of sugar, rice, noodles, jars of milk, and other items that her store is missing.

loans.name: Kamala

texts.en:
Kamala is 42 years old.  She is married and has 3 children, aged 23, 22 and 20.  In 2001, she established her grocery store business.  Working 7 days a week and 10 hours a day, she supports her family.  She has already received and successfully repaid 6 loans from Patan BPW and used her most recent to buy grocery goods for her business.  In the future, Kamala plans to uplift the economic condition of her family.  She thanks you for your support. 

In the Kathmandu Valley, the small grocery store, called a pasal, is an important part of the local economy.  Fresh produce, milk, and staples such as rice, lentils, and flour are purchased daily for cooking in the home.  Owners of small grocery stores use Kiva loans to increase their purchasing power and profit margins.  By keeping inventory strong and purchasing in larger amounts, owners of these small stores are able to increase profitability.  While a typical pasal might be no more than 100 sq. feet, they are always full of bargaining customers, incoming produce, and shrewd businesswomen.

loans.use: to buy grocery goods for her business.

loans.name: Yesica

texts.es:
Yesica tiene 26 años edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos, ella nació en la ciudad de Quillabamba en la selva del Perú pero actualmente vive en el poblado de Cotowincho de la provincia de Urubamba, ella se dedica a la elaboración de artesanía, ella tiene un pequeño taller en su domicilio donde elabora tejido de tipo plano ósea pisos, alfombras, frezadas, individuales y otros cosas más. Ya son siete años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien. En esta oportunidad Yesica requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales como lana sintética e hilos de algodón. Su sueño de Yesica es abrir una cabina de internet.  

Yesica es integrante del banco comunal “Nueva Visión de Rumichaca”. Este  grupo está conformado con 19 socios que viven  en la provincia de Urubamba. La provincia de Urubamba está ubicada al norte de la ciudad del Cusco, a orillas del río Vilcanota, en una zona que se conoce como el “Valle Sagrado” debido a su clima templado, tierra  fértil y abundantes riachuelos, que hacen de este valle uno de los más bellos del planeta.
texts.en:
26-year-old Yesica lives with her partner with whom she has two children. She was born in the town of Quillabamba, in the Peruvian jungle, but now lives in the town of Cotowincho in the province of Urubamba. Yesica is a craftswoman and has a small workshop at home where she produces items such as woven fabrics, carpets, blankets and placemats among other things. She has had her business for seven years and is doing very well. Yesica requires this loan to buy materials such as synthetic wool and cotton thread. Her dream is to open a cybercafe.

Yesica is a member of the communal bank "Nueva Visión de Rumichaca", made up of 19 members living in Urubamba. Urubamba is located north of the city of Cusco, along the Vilcanota River in an area known as the "Sacred Valley" due to its mild climate, fertile soil, and abundant streams which make this one of the most beautiful valleys in the world.

loans.use: to purchase materials such as synthetic wool and cotton thread.

loans.name: Ricardo

texts.es:
Ricardo tiene 38 años edad y es casado y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene tres hijos, él nació en la ciudad de Urubamba pero actualmente vive en el distrito de Yucay de la provincia de Urubamba, él es carpintero y tiene un pequeño taller de carpintería en su domicilio donde fabrica hermosas mesas, sillas, roperos, escritorios y otras cosas más. 

En esta oportunidad Ricardo requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales como por ejemplo madera. Su sueño de Ricardo es abrir una tienda de venta y exhibición de muebles de madera en la ciudad de Yucay.   

Ricardo es integrante del banco comunal “Nueva Visión de Rumichaca”. Este  grupo está conformado con 19 socios que viven  en la provincia de Urubamba. La provincia de Urubamba está ubicada al norte de la ciudad del Cusco, a orillas del río Vilcanota, en una zona que se conoce como el “Valle Sagrado” debido a su clima templado, tierra  fértil y abundantes riachuelos, que hacen de este valle uno de los más bellos del planeta.
texts.en:
38-year-old Ricardo is married with three beautiful children. He was born in the city of Urubamba but currently lives in the district of Yucay in the Urubamba province. He is a carpenter and has a small carpentry workshop at home where he makes beautiful tables, chairs, wardrobes, desks and other furniture.

Ricardo requires this loan to buy materials for his business, such as wood. Her dream is to open his own store for the sale and exhibition of his wooden furniture in the city of Yucay.

Ricardo is a member of the communal bank "Nueva Visión de Rumichaca", made up of 19 members living in Urubamba province. Urubamba is located north of Cusco, along the Vilcanota River in an area known as the "Sacred Valley" due to its mild climate, fertile soil, and abundant streams, making this one of the most beautiful valleys in the world.

loans.use: to purchase materials such as wood.

loans.name: El Progreso Group

texts.es:
11 mujeres del Chaco se han unido con el propósito de ayudarse las unas con las otras, ellas tienen el deseo de sobresalir por medio del trabajo en conjunto. Ellas se encuentran en el primer ciclo del programa de mujeres emprendedoras de la fundación y su meta es poder llegar al nivel máximo del mismo.
Una de estas mujeres trabajadoras es la señora Denice, quien se dedica a la venta de joyas. Ella nos comenta que tiene muy buena venta, ya que ya ha logrado formarse una buena clientela que siempre compran de ella, lo cual le trae muy buen ingreso. Ella sueña con poder tener, algún día, una pequeña joyería donde ofrecer sus productos.
Ellas pide la ayuda de la fundación y de kiva para la compra de joyas, como ser anillos, cadenas, pulseras y demás tipos, con los cuales podrá abastecerse y cumplir con sus clientes.
texts.en:
These 11 women from Chaco joined together in order to help each other, and they all share the desire to succeed by working together. They are in the first cycle of the foundation's women entrepreneurs program, and their goal is to reach the highest level of the program.

One of these entrepreneurial women is Denice, who sells jewelry. She says that sales have been very good and she has formed a good base of customers who always buy her products, giving her a very good income. She dreams to someday own a small jewelry store where she can offer their products.

The women have asked for help from the foundation and Kiva so that they can purchase of jewelry, such as rings, chains, bracelets and other types, which will replenish their stock and meet customer demand.

loans.use: to purchase rings, chains, bracelets and other types of jewelry.

loans.name: Elvie

texts.en: Elvie is 38 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 5 children. She has a shop that sells charcoal. She has had this business for 3 years. She requested a loan to purchase charcoal supplies to sell. She has been a member of PMPC for 1 year.  In the future, Elvie hopes to expand her business and send her children to school.

loans.use: To purchase charcoal supplies.

loans.name: Marina

texts.en: Marina is 53 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 1 child. She works in the fish industry, selling fish for a living. She has been doing this for 10 years. She has requested a loan of 10,000 PHP to purchase more fish to sell. She has been a member of PMPC for 7 years. In the future, Marina hopes to expand her business in her locality.

loans.use: To purchase more fish to sell.

loans.name: Annielyn

texts.en:
Annielyn is married and has one child. She is 34 years old and resides at Guingona, Ozamis City, in the Philippines. 

She owns and operates a business venture, planting & harvesting ginger crops for sale to earn a living, and she's been 8 years in this business. Each month, she earns about 5,000 PHP doing this type of business. She requested a loan of 10,000 PHP to purchase additional seeds, seedlings & young crops to raise. 

In 2010, she joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and her living situation. In the future, Annielyn wants to make improvements to her house and to finish the studies of her children.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings & young crops to raise.

loans.name: Ermetania

texts.en:
Ermetania is married with 6 children. She is 54 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is a farmer and she plants and harvests rice to sell to earn a living. She has been doing this for 20 years, and every month she earns about 10,000 PHP from this work. She has requested a loan of 30,000 PHP to purchase additional seeds, seedlings & young crops to raise.

In 2010, Ermetania joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. In the future, she hopes to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings & young crops to raise.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy dyes, hairspray, shampoo, rinses and other supplies

loans.name: Ellaine

texts.en:
Ellaine is married with 2 children. She is 30 years old and lives in Mansabay Alto, Lopez Jaena, Misamis Occidental. She has a general store to earn a living and has had this business for 2 years. Each month, she earns about PHP 3,800 doing this type of work. 

She has requested a loan of 20,000 PHP to purchase assorted canned goods, noodles, sugar, rice and corn. She has been a member of PMPC for 3 years.  In the future, Ellaine hopes to save more for the education of her children.

loans.use: To purchase assorted canned goods, noodles, sugar, rice and corn.

location.town: Mansabay Alto, Lopez Jaena , Misamis Occidental

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy shirts, trousers, t-shirts, and other garments for eventual resale.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy meat, condiments, vegetables and other products.

loans.name: Unidas De San Antonio Group

texts.es:
El comité "Unidas de San Antonio"se originó a traves de promociones  que se realizó en el barrio. Todas las integrantes son de la misma zona, conocidas y vecinas del barrio. El objetivo de cada de una de ellas es trabajar, fomentar el espíritu solidario y llegar al nivel máximo del programa por medio del esfuerzo de todas.
La sra. Ana es la Presidenta del grupo, ella  tiene un puesto enfrente a su casa donde vende todo lo que han producido en la chacra que ella tiene. Nos comenta que su trabajo es muy pesado ya que debe de cosechar y luego sembrar, además de eso estar pendiente de plagas y de más problemas, pero pese a ello le gusta lo que hace por que es un trabajo digno y decoroso.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de semillas y fertilizantes para utilizar en el campo, lo cual es su medio de vida. Está muy agradecida con la fundación con esta oportunidad que le da, pues muchas instituciones no lo harina.
texts.en:
The “Unidas de San Antonio” Communal Bank was started through promotions that were held in the neighborhood. All the members are from the same area; they are neighbors and acquaintances from the neighborhood. The objective of each one of them is to work, promote a spirit of solidarity and reach the highest level of the program through the efforts of all.

Sra. Ana is the president of the group. She has a stand in front of her house where she sells everything she has produced on the small farm she has. She tells us that her work is hard since she needs to harvest and then plant. In addition to this she is at the mercy of infestations and other problems. However, despite this, she enjoys what she does because it is honest, dignified work.

She is requesting a loan to buy seeds and fertilizer to use on her fields, which are her source of livelihood. She is very grateful to the Fundación for this opportunity they are giving her, since many institutions would not do so.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Eliza

texts.en:
Eliza  is 43 years old and lives in Layawan, Oroquieta City. She is married with 3 children.
 
Eliza has a tricycle-driving business and earns approximately PHP 3,000 each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of PHP 6,000 to purchase equipment to maintain her motorcycle. 

Eliza has been a member of PMPC for 7 years.

loans.use: to purchase equipment to maintain a motorcycle

loans.name: Tolobubu

texts.ru:
Толобубу 60 лет, пенсионерка. Основным источником дохода для Толобубу является животноводство, начатое ею в 2009 году.  Стартовав свой бизнес с суммы в 20,000 сом (KGS), она смогла развить свое хозяйство с ежемесячной прибылью в 5,000 сом (KGS).  
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Толобубу обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 20,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дополнительных голов овец. Доходы Толобубу планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение поголовья скота.
texts.en: Tolobubu is 60 years old, and is retired. Her chief source of income is animal husbandry, which she began in 2009. Starting with a sum of 20,000 som (KGS), she has been able to grow her business to where it brings in a monthly income of 5,000 som (KGS). In order to further grow her business, Tolobubu has gone to Bai Tushum & Partners to request a loan of 20,000 som (KGS) to purchase more sheep. Tolobubu plans to invest the earnings from the loan into further increasing her number of livestock.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: La Fe Group

texts.es:
El grupo "La Fe" es de la ciudad de Encarnación, son 18 mujeres que tienen un gran animo de progreso, es por ello que se unieron al programa de mujeres emprendedoras de la fundación, ven en este una gran oportunidad y ayuda a la vez, es por ello que siempre se esfuerza. Su objetivo principal es poder ayudar a sus familias y sus hijos para que tengan una vida digna y sin privaciones.
Zunilda nos cuenta que se dedica a la venta de bebidas en general, como ser cervezas, vinos, gaseosas y demás tipos de bebidas. Cuenta que tiene muy buena clientela, lo cual la ayuda a poder tener los ingresos que necesita para ayudar en la casa y cubrir los gastos del día a día.
Zumilda solicita el crédito para la compra de cervezas, vinos, gaseosas, pues se acerca la época de navidad y de año nuevo y quiere surtirse, por que es el tiempo en que más ventas tiene.
texts.en: The group La Fe (The Faith) is from the city of Encarnación.  There are 18 women who have a great encouragement for progress, which is why they joined the program for women entrepreneurs of the foundation.  They see in this a great opportunity and help at the same time, which is why they always strive. Their main objective is to help their families and their children to have a decent life without hardship.  Zunilda tells us that she sells drinks in general, such as beer, wine, soda and other types of drinks.  She says that she has very good customers, which helps to be able to have the income she needs to help around the house and cover the day to day expenses. Zumilda requested a loan for the purchase of beer, wine, soft drinks, as the Christmas and New Year season approaches she wants to stock up, because it is the time that she has more sales.

loans.use: to purchase beer, wine, sodas.

loans.name: Claudio

texts.es:
El señor Claudio tiene 22 años de edad, está casado con la señora Cristina, tienen un hijo pequeño, el cual ellos mismos dicen, es la razón de la lucha de la pareja.
El señor Claudio es comerciante desde hace tiempo, tiene una Despensa bien surtida en su domicilio. Nos cuenta que tiene mucha clientela de la zona ya que comercializa todo tipo de productos de primera necesidad y es una de las pocas despensas que hay en la zona. Su esposa lo ayuda siempre ya que el a menudo debe salir para buscar productos para poder abastecer el local. Gracias a la lucha de ambos han podido salir adelante y mantener a su familia.
Solicita el crédito para la compra de enlatados, carnes, lácteos, panificados y demás artículos de primera necesidad, lo cual tiene más salida. Agradece a la fundación y a kiva por la oportunidad de progreso que les da.
texts.en:
Mr. Claudio is 22 years old, married to Cristina; they have a young son, which they say is why they struggle.
Mr. Claudio is a merchant for some time now, has a well-stocked pantry at home. He tells us that he has much business in the area and sells all kinds of staples and is one of the few pantries that are in the area. His wife always helps since often he must leave to search for products in order to supply the premises. Thanks to the struggle of both they have been able to move forward and support their family.
He is asking for a loan for the purchase of canned goods, meat, dairy, bread and other staples, which has more output. He is thankful to KIVA for the opportunity they give him.

loans.use: to purchase canned goods, meat, dairy, bread and other staples.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for the construction materials she needs to improve her house.

loans.name: Abdukhalik

texts.ru: Абдухолик женат и ответственный отец троих детей. Более 10 лет он занимается скотоводством и выращиванием сельхозкультур. В бизнесе помогает жена. Они вместе усердно работают ради светлого будущего своих детей, чтобы дать хорошее воспитание и образование. Абдухолик уже 4 года сотрудничает с «ИМОН Интернешнл». На ранее полученную прибыль от займа он благоустроил свой дом, а теперь еще хотел бы получить займ для покупки двух голов крупного и мелкого рогатого скота, а на остальную сумму хочет закупить  высококачественные семена пшеницы и ячменя для посева с целью расширения бизнеса. Он надеется на вашу помощь и поддержку.
texts.en: Abdukhalik is married and is a responsible father of three children.  He has been involved in animal husbandry and growing agricultural crops for over ten years.  His wife helps him with the business.  They work diligently together for the sake of a bright future for their children, in order to provide them with good upbringing and education.  Abdukhalik has been partnering with "Imon International" for four years.  He used a previously obtained profit from a loan to make improvements to his house and now wants to obtain a loan for the purchase of two heads of cattle and small livestock, and use the rest of the loan to purchase high-grade wheat and barley seeds for sowing, in order to expand his business.  He relies on your help and support.

loans.use: to purchase livestock and seeds

loans.name: Alberto

texts.es:
El señor Alberto es casado, tiene tres hijos pequeños, que aun van a la escuela, ellos viven en la ciudad de Caacupé.
Alberto comenta que tiene una hamburguesería en su domicilio, cuenta con muy buena clientela, ya que el es una persona muy amable con los clientes, y es por ello que le va muy bien. Dice que todo el esfuerzo que hace es por darle a su familia todo lo mejor, pues no quiere que ellos tengan que pasar por privaciones como las que el tuvo que atravesar.
El solicita el crédito para la compra de carne, huevos, panificados, hortalizas y demás insumos necesarios para hacer las hamburguesas que vende. El está muy contento por la oportunidad que le dan la fundación y kiva, por que este apoyo es muy importante para el.
texts.en:
Sr. Alberto is married and has three young children who are in school. They live in the city of Caacupé.

Alberto says that he has a hamburger stand set up in his home and has many good customers. He is a very friendly person when it comes to serving his customers. For this reason, he has done very well. He says that all of his efforts are geared toward providing the best for his family since he does not want them to experience the same hardships that he had to endure.

Alberto is requesting a loan to buy meat, eggs, bread, vegetables, and other necessary supplies for making the hamburgers that he sells. He is very pleased with the opportunity that Fundación Paraguaya and Kiva have given him. This support is very important to him.

loans.use: to buy meat, eggs, bread, vegetables, and other supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for construction materials and labor to improve her house.

loans.name: Flora

texts.es:
La señora Flora es de la ciudad de Itá, tiene 45 años de edad, es separada,  tiene 2 hijas, las cuales la ayudan en el salón de belleza que tiene en centro de la ciudad de Itá.
Nos cuenta que se dedica a esto hace más de 15 años, presta todo tipo de servicios de belleza tales como cortes para dama, peinados, lavado, alargue de cabello, manicura, pedicuro, tinte y otros, una de sus hijas la ayuda con servicios de maquillaje ya que la misma es maquilladora profesional, y la otra con lavados, cortes y tintes.
La señora Flora solicita el crédito para abastecer su negocio con tintes, tijeras, peines, shampoo, enjuagues, spray y demás insumos importantes para poder usar en su local. Agradece por la valiosa ayuda que kiva y la fundación le están dando.
texts.en:
Sra. Flora is from the city of Itá. She is 45 years old, separated, and has two daughters who help manage her beauty salon that is located in central Itá.

Flora says that she has been in business for more than 15 years, providing all types of beauty services, such as women’s haircuts, styling, washing, hair extensions, manicures, pedicures, tinting, and other amenities. One of her daughters provides makeover services since she is a professional makeup artist. Her other daughter provides shampoos, haircuts, and tinting.

Sra. Flora is requesting a loan to restock her business with tints, scissors, combs, shampoos, rinses, hair spray, and other important supplies that are used in her shop. She is grateful for the valuable assistance that Kiva and Fundación Paraguaya has given her.

loans.use: to buy tints, scissors, combs, shampoos, rinses, hair sprays, and other supplies.

loans.name: Rodemay

texts.en:
Rodemay is married with one child. She is 26 years old and lives in the Philippines.

Rodemay is a farmer and raises pigs to earn a living. She has been doing this for 3 years. She has requested a loan of PHP 20,000 to purchase sacks of feed and medicine.

Rodemay has been a member of PMPC for 3 years. In the future, Rodemay hopes to have enough savings for her family.

loans.use: To purchase sacks of feed and medicine

location.town: Lao Sta. Cruz, Plaridel, Misamis Occidental

loans.name: Mirian

texts.es:
La Sra. Mirian es de la ciudad de Villarrica, tiene 36 años de edad, está casada con el Sr Carlos, tienen 2 hijos, viven en su casa en la misma ciudad.
Se dedican a la repartición y venta de frutas y verduras por la mañana y por la tarde se dedica a la venta de Empanadas, cuenta con clientela formada ya que realiza reparto a domicilio en su carrito con caballo, su esposo es el que se encarga de hacer las compras por las madrugadas y ella sale a vender.
Acude a Fundación Paraguaya y a Kiva para  acceder a una pequeña ayuda la cual quiere para la compra de verduras y frutas de estación, ya que desea abastecerse, para que de esa forma pueda estar preparada para la demanda de los clientes.
texts.en:
Sra. Mirian is from the city of Villarrica. She is 36 years old, married to Sr. Carlos, and has two children. They live in their house in the same city.

Sra. Mirian sells fruits and vegetables from her subdivision in the mornings. In the afternoons, she sells empanadas. Mirian has an established customer base because she makes deliveries using her horse-drawn cart. Her husband is in charge of purchasing her inventory at dawn so that she can make her sales.

Mirian approached Fundación Paraguaya and Kiva to access a small loan so that she can buy seasonal fruits and vegetables. She wants to restock her inventory so that she can be prepared to meet the demands of her customers.

loans.use: to buy seasonal fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Ho's Group

texts.en:
Ho is a 58-year-old mother of seven children, two of whom are dependents and still in school. To feed and support her family, she has been farming on a four-hectare farmland for thirty-eight years. She owns three hectares and leases one hectare. She has been with VisionFund for five years. Her past loans have improved her living significantly, including helping her provide food and provide for her children’s education. 

Now Ho is requesting another loan with VisionFund with her group member Soheurt, who has been with VisionFund for two years. She will use this $125 USD loan to hire workers to harvest her rice paddy. She hopes to increase her crop yield and earn more income in order to better support her basic needs and to keep her children in school to obtain a higher education.

loans.use: To hire workers to harvest her rice paddy.

loans.name: Ruos

texts.en:
Mrs. Ruos is a 42-year-old mother of seven children, living in Reussey Keo commune, Phnom Penh. She grows rice crops to generate her income of $1.00 each day. It’s such a low income for the family. However, some of the children also help support the family by working in various jobs. 

This is Mrs. Ruos' fourth loan from Kiva, and she’ll use the loan to purchase a pumping machine for her dry-season rice crops. With the income generated from her business, she’ll support her school-age children until they finish high school.

loans.use: to purchase a pumping machine for her dry-season rice crops.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy pork, chicken, oil, cream, vegetables and plantains.

loans.name: Osmar

texts.es:
El señor Osmar tiene 31 años de edad, es soltero, vive con sus padres en la ciudad de Villarrica. El comenta que se dedica a la mecánica automotor, su padre es mecánico de profesión y su madre realiza artesanías en aopo i.
Osmar  aprendió de su padre todos los secretos profesionales para llegar a ser uno bueno. Actualmente tiene todas las herramientas que necesita, como ser un compresor de aire, soplete, aire de oxigeno, herramientas de uso manual y otros, para realizar variados servicios mecánicos.
El solicita el crédito para la compra de repuestos para poder venderlos en el taller mecánico. Agradece a la fundación por esta oportunidad que le da.
texts.en:
Osmar is 31 years old, single and living with his parents in the city of Villarrica.  He comments that he works as an auto mechanic.  His father is an auto mechanic by profession and his mother is an Ao po'i craftswoman.

Osmar learned all his father’s professional secrets to become a good one.  He currently has all the work tools he needs like an air compressor, welder, oxygen tank, manual tools and others to do all the various types of car repairs.

He is asking for the loan to buy spare parts to sell in his auto shop.  He thanks the foundation for the opportunity it’s giving him.

loans.use: to buy auto spare parts for subsequent resale.

loans.name: Razia's Group

texts.en:
Razia is married and supports her family financially by operating a dairy business. She sells milk to people in her community for a reasonable price.

Razia is very efficient and also performs her household tasks very well along with her business.  She has given birth to a son and a daughter. Both are very young and are not of school going age yet.  Her husband is a mason and constructs buildings and houses on order. He is known in his area for his skills and earns reasonably good profits.

Razia has applied for a loan from Kiva field partner Asasah to fund her dairy business. She plans to use the proceeds of this loan to buy another buffalo that will allow her to get larger quantities of milk and increase her income by selling it at a profit.

In the photo that accompanies this profile, Razia is the woman holding the Asasah Passbook.

loans.use: to buy a buffalo for a dairy business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cement, sand, corrugated metal roofing, and bricks.

loans.name: Sophy's Group

texts.en:
Sophy, aged 36 years old, is a mother of two children who are still in school. To support her family, she has been working as a rice farmer on her two-hectare farm for 15 years in her village in the Ratanak Mondul district of Cambodia.

Sophy and the two other members of her borrower group, Kimheng and Sim, have taken loans out before from Kiva field partner VisionFund. The previous loans have helped Sophy afford sufficient food and have helped her to send her children to school.

Sophy is the leader her borrower group, which has applied for another loan. She plans to use her portion of this group loan to buy fertilizer for her rice crop. Sophy hopes she can increase her crop yield so as to earn more income to set aside for her business and also to keep her children in school.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to repair his house

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy bricks, metal sheets and cement, and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Ven's Group

texts.en:
Ven, 45 years old, is the breadwinner for a family with 8 children. Three of the children are married and the rest work on the maize plantation. Ven has been farming maize for 8 years and it is his only income generating business to feed his family. 

Ven and his group member Hong have been with VisionFund for 6 loan cycles. His previous loans have helped him to buy sufficient food and basic household necessities. He now leads this group to request another loan, which he will use to buy maize seeds and fertilizer for his farmland. He hopes to grow more maize to earn a better income to make a better living.

loans.use: To buy maize seeds and fertilizer for his farmland

loans.name: Preng

texts.en:
Preng is a 61-year-old married man and a loving father of 5 children, living in the Baray district. He is in the business of cultivating rice and potato crops within each season of the year. He typically earns an average of $3.00 per day and tries hard to support his family. 

This time, for his 3rd loan from HKL, he is borrowing KHR2,400,000. He plans to use the loan to buy stocks of cashew nuts from the local villagers’ plantations. This project will create a good income for the family when the market increases its demand. With the increase in income, Preng will use it to expand his farming businesses.

loans.use: to buy stocks of cashew nuts.

loans.name: Matluba

texts.ru: Матлуба вдова и любящая мать троих детей. Когда её муж покинул их, она чувствовала себя без защиты, а потом постепенно поставила себя на ноги, и открыла свой бизнес. Ради содержания своих детей в хороших условиях  она начала заниматься скотоводством 5 лет назад. Кроме этого она занимается выращиванием сельхозкультур. Часть урожая идет на содержание семьи, а остальную часть продает на рынке. Отходы от культур идут на корм скота. Матлуба запрашивает займ в размере 3000 Сомони для покупки 2 голов крупного рогатого скота, а на остальную сумму хочет купить высококачественные семена пшеницы.  Она надеется на вашу поддержку, и просит вас о помощи для улучшения своих бытовых  условий.
texts.en: Matluba is a widow and the loving mother of three children. When her husband left them, she felt unsupported, but she gradually fell back on her feet and opened her own business. To guarantee her children's welfare, she began to work in animal husbandry five years ago. In addition, she also cutlivates crops. Part of her harvest goes to support her family; the rest is sold at the market. Waste material from the crops goes to feed livestock. Matluba is requesting a loan in the amount of 3,000 Somoni to purchase two head of cattle.  With the rest of the money, she wants to buy high-quality wheat seeds. She looks forward to your support, and asks for your help to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: To purchase cattle and seeds

loans.name: Jhuna Group

texts.en:
Jhuna is married with 3 children. Jhuna is 36 years old and lives in Tambulig, Zamboanga del Sur.
Jhuna has a general store business to earn a living and has had this business for 4 years. Each month, she  earns PHP 4,000 doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 8000 to purchase more stock for her general store .
Jhuna has been a member of PMPC for 2 years. 
Jhuna is the leader of a 2 person group.  Although they borrow as a group, each member of the group has their own business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock for her general store

loans.name: Lovely

texts.en:
Lovely is married with one child. Lovely is 25 years old and lives in Usocan, Plaridel, Misamis Occidental.

Lovely sells home products items to earn a living.  She has had this business for 5 years. Each month, she earns PHP 5,000 doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of PHP 15,000 to purchase cooking oil, sacks of sugar, shampoo and noodles.

Lovely has been a member of PMPC for 1 year.  In the future, Lovely hopes to be successful in her business and to send her child to college.

loans.use: To purchase cooking oil, sacks of sugar, shampoo, noodles

loans.name: Marebel

texts.en:
Marebel is married with 4 children. She is 36 years old and lives in Mangidkid, Plaridel, Misamis Occidental.

Marebel has a general store to earn a living and has had this business for 1 year. Each month, she earns PHP 4,000 doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of PHP 12,000 to purchase products such as shampoo, sardines, noodles, sugar and salt.

Marebel has been a member of PMPC for 1 year.  In the future, Marebel hope to succeed in her new business.

loans.use: To purchase assorted products such as shampoo, sardines, noodles, sugar and salt

loans.name: Kanybek

texts.ru: Каныбеку 48 лет, женат, имеет четырех детей. Супруга Каныбека работает учительницей в школе. В 1991 году, в поисках дохода для своей семьи, Каныбек начал свой бизнес в животноводстве. Благодаря упорству и настойчивости Каныбека, начатое с суммы 15,000 сом (KGS) хозяйство, на сегодняшний день приносит около 8,000 сом (KGS) в месяц от продажи молочных  и мясных продуктов и насчитывает три головы коровы, пять голов коз и одну лошадь. Доходы от бизнес – деятельности позволили Каныбеку оплатить обучение для троих старших детей. В целях дальнейшего увеличения поголовья скота, Каныбек обратился в компанию «Бай - Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 10 голов овец. В планах - вложить доходы в дальнейшее увеличение количества домашней скотины, а в будущем – накопить сумму для оплаты обучения младшей дочери Рахат.
texts.en:
Kanybek is 48 years old, married and has four children. Kanybek's wife works as a school teacher. In search of income for his family, Kanybek started his business of animal husbandry in 1991. 

Thanks to Kanybek's persistence and perseverance, the farm, which was started with a sum of 15,000 som (KGS), currently brings in around 8,000 som (KGS) per month from the sale of meat and dairy products, and numbers three cows, five goats and one horse. The income from his business activity allowed Kanybek to pay the tuition for the three older children. 

In order to further increase the number of cattle, Kanybek turned to the organization "Bai Tushum & Partners" for a loan in the amount of 50,000 som (KGS) for the purchase of 10 sheep. Kanybek's plan is to invest the income in further increasing the number of domestic animals, and in the future to save enough for the tuition for his youngest daughter Rakhat.

loans.use: to purchase sheep

loans.name: Farida's Group

texts.en:
Farida has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her husband who sells diesel and engine oil. He operates his shop in the market from where he manages his business. With the loan investment, he will buy different brands of engine oils and also diesel in larger quantity which will allow him to sell more and increase his profits.

Farida is a housewife who stays at home and performs her household responsibilities. She is very active and fulfills her responsibilities very well. She has given birth to 2 sons. Her eldest son is married and also operates a diesel selling business while her youngest son is a driver by profession. Farida is hopeful that her husband will make good use of loan and improve his business.

loans.use: to buy engine oil and diesel to sell for profit.

loans.name: Sakina Bibi's Group

texts.en:
Sakina bibi is 40-years-old and a married lady. She lives with her husband and four children who are 20, 16, 14 and 12 years old.  Her elder son has completed his education till 10th standard and now works as a salesman in a grocery store earning monthly wages. The child next to him in age works in a factory.  

Her husband is taking care to stock his small grocery store. This is the business which makes him the income. He has been operating his grocery store for over 8 years.  

Sakina is requesting for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her husband. With this loan, he will buy stocks of soap, sugar, coffee, oil, rice, and candies for his grocery store. This will help him make more sales and thereby improve his family's conditions. 

Note: “In the photo, the lady holding a book (called Asasah Passbook) is Sakina bibi”.

loans.use: to buy stocks of groceries for grocery store business

loans.name: Kozhon

texts.ru: Кожону 44 года, женат, имеет четверых детей. В 2005 году, в поисках дохода для своей семьи, Кожон начал свой бизнес в животноводстве. Благодаря упорству и настойчивости Кожона, начатое с суммы 5,000 сом (KGS) хозяйство, на сегодняшний день приносит около 6,000 сом (KGS) в месяц от продажи молочных  и мясных продуктов и насчитывает одну корову с теленком, девять голов коз, одну нетель и десять голов овец. Благодаря доходам от бизнес – деятельности средний сын Кожона учится в спортивной школе. В целях дальнейшего увеличения поголовья скота, Кожон обратился в компанию «Бай - Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS) на покупку овец. В планах - вложить доходы в дальнейшее увеличение количества домашней скотины, а в будущем – достроить дом для своей семьи.
texts.en:
Kozhon is 44 years old, married and has four children. In the search of income for his family, Kozhon started his business of animal husbandry in 2005. Thanks to Kozhon's persistence and perseverance, the farm, which was started with a sum of 5,000 som (KGS), currently brings in around 6,000 som (KGS) per month from the sale of meat and dairy products. It numbers a cow and a calf, ten goats, a heifer and ten sheep. Thanks to the income from the business activity, Kozhon's middle son studies at a sports school. 

In order to further increase the number of livestock, Kozhon turned to the organization "Bai Tushum & Partners" for a loan in the amount of 40,000 som (KGS) for the purchase of sheep. The plan is to invest the income in further increasing the number of domestic animals, and in the future finish the house for his family.

loans.use: to purchase sheep

loans.name: Ma. Elna

texts.en:
Ma. Elna is 36 years old with 3 children aged 11, 7 and 5. She sells prepaid mobile credits to her community. Ma. Elna also makes calamay, a sticky rice dish, to sell. She works hard to support her family.

Ma. Elna has requested this loan to buy more prepaid mobile credit to sell. Ma. Elna hopes for her business to grow. She also hopes for her children to have bright futures.

loans.use: to buy more prepaid mobile credit to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy food products to sell in the stall

loans.name: Ma. Teresa

texts.en:
Ma. Teresa is 35 years old and is a married woman with 4 children.  Her oldest child is 17 years old. Ma. Teresa's husband is a farmer.

Ma. Teresa sells food items like rice cakes and banana cue (a snack made from bananas) to her community. She also helps her husband grow rice crops on their land. Ma. Teresa works hard to support her family. She requested this loan to buy flour, sticky rice, bananas and fertilizer for the farm. Ma. Teresa hopes to have a stable business. She also hopes to be able to sustain her children's education.

loans.use: to buy flour, sticky rice, bananas and fertilizers for the farm

loans.name: Isidra

texts.en:
Isidra is married with 3 children. Isidra is 45 years old and lives in the Philippines.

Isidra is a farmer and grows rice to earn a living. She has been doing this for 8 years. She has requested a loan of  PHP 12000 to purchase farm inputs like fertilizers and pesticide.

Isidra has been a member of PMPC for 6 years. In the future, Isidra hopes to have enough savings for her family.

loans.use: To purchase sacks of fertilizer and bottles of pesticide

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
Gina is married with 4 children. She is 40 years old and lives in the Philippines.

Gina is a farmer and raises pigs to earn a living. She has been doing this for 20 years. She has requested a loan of PHP 10000 to purchase sacks of feed and medicine.

Gina has been a member of PMPC for 10 years. In the future, Gina hopes to save money for the education of her children.

loans.use: To purchase sacks of feed and medicine

loans.name: Sreymom

texts.en:
Sreymom (pictured here), age 42, sells fish and chicken and prahoc (a popular Cambodian condiment made of fermented fish paste and salt). She makes prahoc by her own hand. She lives in a village about fifteen kilometers from Phnom Penh, across the Mekong River and she has three sons whom attend school. 

Sreymom is asking for a loan of $800 to buy small fish and other ingredients to make prahoc. She will also use a part of the loan to buy rice for food.

loans.use: To buy small fish and other ingredients to make prahoc and buy rice for food.

loans.name: Leonida

texts.en: Leonida is married with four children. She is 39 years old and residing in Matugas Alto, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. Leonida owns and operates a gardening plot, planting and harvesting a variety of vegetables to sell to earn a living. She has been in this business for five years. Each month, she earns 1,800 Philippines pesos (PHP) doing this type of business. She requested a loan of 5,000 PHP to purchase additional seeds, seedlings, and young crops to raise. In 2010, Leonida joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. She wants to make improvements to her house and to supplement the family's income.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings, and young crops to raise

loans.name: Maginda

texts.en:
52-year-old Maginda is a married woman with 7 children aged between 10 and 32. She is a farmer working in Trinidad, Bohol. Maginda primarily grows rice crops to sell. Maginda works hard to help her husband provide for their needs and send their kids to school.

Maginda has requested this loan to purchase seeds, fertilizers and other farm inputs. Maginda hopes to achieve an abundant harvest.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers and other farm inputs

loans.name: Murodbegim

texts.ru: Муродбегим проживает в районе Хамадони. Возраст, 54 года. Замужем. Имеет пятерых детей. Она занимается шитьем. Ее муж вместе с сыном находится в России.  Муродбегим кредит берет для приобретения швейной машинки.
texts.en: Murodbegim lives in Hamadoni District. She is 54 years old, married, and has five children. She sews. Her husband and her son are in Russia. Murodbegim is taking out a loan to purchase a sewing machine.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine

loans.name: Elsa

texts.en:
Elsa is married with 4 children. She is 36 years old and lives in the Philippines.

Elsa is a farmer and raises pigs to earn a living. She has been doing this for 5 years. She has requested a loan of PHP 10000 to purchase sacks of feed and medicine.

Elsa has been a member of PMPC for 1 year. In the future, Elsa hopes to be successful in her business for her family.

loans.use: To purchase sacks of feed and medicine

location.town: Mansabay Alto, Lopez Jaena , Misamis Occidental

loans.name: Khalida's Group

texts.en:
Khalida, 44 years old, is married and has 4 sons and a daughter. Her eldest son sells samosay, a local food made of flour, and two of her children are studying. Khalida is a housewife who stays at home to carry out household responsibilities.

Khalida's husband sells peanuts. He purchases them at wholesale prices and sells them for a profit from his shop. He is a very hardworking person who works with great dedication to fulfill the needs of his family. Khalida has applied for a loan from KIVA's partner, Asasah, for her husband’s business. He will use the loan to buy peanuts in larger quantities and of better quality, which will allow him to sell for higher profits. He is very experienced and knows the ups and downs of his business very well. Khalida is confident that an investment will help him make more income for the family.

Note:In the photo, Khalida is holding a book (called Asasah Passbook).

loans.use: To buy peanuts to resell

loans.name: Regina

texts.en:
Regina is married with four children. She is 54 years old and resides in Sinara Bajo, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. Regina owns and operates a gardening plot, planting and harvesting a variety of vegetables to sell to earn a living. She has been in this business for 20 years.

Each month, she earns 2,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) doing this type of business. She requested a loan of 6,000 PHP to purchase additional seeds, seedlings, and young crops to raise. In 2011, Regina joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. She wants to make improvements to her house and to supplement the family's income.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings, and young crops to raise

loans.name: Rozina's Group

texts.en:
Rozina, aged 44, is an energetic woman involved in sewing and a boutique business. She is a very talented woman. She sews and designs dresses and displays them in her boutique. After seeing her dresses, many customers are attracted to buy from her. She does this work to supplement her family's income. In addition, she is also a very good mother who takes care of her three children. Her daughter is the eldest and she is studying in the 13th standard while her other two children are studying in the 10th standard. 

Rozina’s aspiration is to grow her business to a larger scale so she can transform her family’s living standard from good to better and generate more revenue. Therefore, she has requested a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her business. With the loan, she will purchase cloth, beads, and thread in larger quantities to be able to make new designs of clothes for selling and generating more revenue.

loans.use: to buy cloth, beads, and thread for a sewing business and boutique.

loans.name: Akmal

texts.ru: Акмал занимается купле- продажей скота более 10 лет. Он имеет богатый опыт и с легкостью справляется своими делами. Он трудолюбивый и добрый семьянин. На воспитании имеет троих детей. Жена помогает по бизнесу. Кроме того занимается выращиванием сельхозпродуктов. Отходы культур идут на корм скота и поэтому ему выгодно содержать их и продать. Акмал хотел бы получить займ для покупки 2 голов мелкого рогатого скота с целью расширения бизнеса и улучшения жилищных условий семьи.
texts.en: Akmal has been involved in buying and selling livestock for over ten years.  He has a rich experience and runs his business with ease.  He is a hardworking and kind family man.  Akmal is raising three children.  His wife helps him with the business.  Besides this business, he is involved in growing agricultural crops.  The leftovers from the crops go toward feeding livestock, and this is why it is profitable for Akmal to keep and sell livestock.  Akmal wants to obtain this loan to purchase two heads of small livestock in order to expand his business and improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase small livestock

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn is 26 years old and is a married woman with 3 young children. Her husband runs a barbershop.

Marilyn sells food items like rice cakes to her community. She works hard to support her family. Marilyn also helps her husband manage their barber shop. She plans to use her loan to buy flour, sugar and barbershop materials such as scissors. Marilyn hopes for her family to have a stable business. She also hopes to be able to save for her children's education.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar and barbershop materials such as scissors

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.en: Cecilia is 43, a married woman with four children, two of whom are in school. She has had a food stall in Kator, South Sudan, for four years. Cecilia is requesting this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase tomatoes and onions. She will use her extra income from this loan to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase tomatoes and onions to sell.

loans.name: Kurbongul

texts.ru: Курбонгул занимается посевом зерновых культур. Этим видом деятельности занимается 10 лет. Ей 41 год. Она замужем. У нее 8 детей. Она берет кредит для закупа топлива.
texts.en: Kurbongul plants cereal crops. She has been engaged in this activity for 10 years. She is 41 years old, married, and has 8 children. She is taking out a loan to purchase fuel.

loans.use: to purchase fuel

loans.name: James

texts.en:
James is a 29-year-old single businessman. He has been running a hotel for the past three years with a monthly income of KES 18,000 which he uses to meet his basic needs.

He is applying for his fourth loan with KADET after repaying the previous loans successfully. James will use the loan to purchase tables and chairs for his hotel. With the anticipated profit from the business, he will increase his stock of sugar, rice and cooking oil. 

His hopes and dreams are to open a restaurant which will increase his income and to pay for his school fees and continue his education.

loans.use: To purchase tables and chairs for his hotel

loans.name: Furkat

texts.ru: Фуркат умный и перспективный молодой человек. Он женат, ему 26 лет. На воспитании имеет двоих детей. Более 5 лет он занимается купля- продажей скота, а также выращиванием сельхозкультур. Ему выгодно заниматься скотоводством, потому что он содержит их на отходы выращенных культур. Фуркат хочет расширить свой бизнес и просиь вас о помощи. Он хотел бы купить несколько голов крупного рогатого скота, 200 кг семена ячменя и 100 литров ГСМ для посева ячменя. Он надеется на вашу поддержку.
texts.en: Furkat is a smart and promising young man.  He is 26 years old, married and is raising two children.  He has been involved in buying and selling livestock and growing agricultural crops for over five years.  It is profitable for him to be involved in animal husbandry because he feeds livestock with leftovers from the grown crops.  Furkat wants to expand his business and asks you for help.  He wants to purchase several heads of cattle, 200 kilograms of barley seeds and 100 liters of fuel for planting barley.  He relies on your support.

loans.use: to purchase cattle, seeds and fuel

loans.name: Buvaishi

texts.ru: Бувайши замужем имеет 3 детей. Занимается скотоводством с детства. В их кишлаке работу найти трудно, многие  мужчины и женщины уехали на заработки в другие страны. Поэтому скотоводство и выращивание сельхоз культуры является их основным источником доходом. Опыт  в этом бизнесе 15 лет. Ее муж и братья, как  и все уехали в Россию. Муж получает заработную плату и присылает деньги с России. Бувайши хочет получить кредит на покупку коров. С нашей организацией начала сотрудничать недавно.
texts.en: Buvaishi is married and has three children.  She has been involved in animal husbandry since childhood.  It is difficult to find work in her village, and many men and women left to work in other countries.  This is why animal husbandry and growing agricultural crops became their primary source of income.  Buvaishi has 15 years of experience in this business.  Her husband and brother, like all others, left to go to Russia.  Her husband earns a salary and sends money from Russia.  Buvaishi wants to obtain this loan to purchase cattle.  She has recently began to work with our organization.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Savin

texts.en:
Savin (in the photo), age 39, is a weaver. Her husband, Savun, age 50, is a construction worker. They live in a village near the Mekong River about 20 kilometers from Phnom Penh City. They have one son and three daughters: one of the children is married and lives outside the family home, two have full-time employment, and another one is still too young to work. 

Savin is asking for her first loan in the amount of $300 to purchase materials (cotton threads) for her weaving business.

loans.use: to purchase materials for her weaving business.

loans.name: Janatoi

texts.ru: Чанатой 37 лет, она замужем и имеет 5 детей. У нее в хозяйстве есть 2 коровы, одна из коров дает большое количества молока. Благодаря ей она прокармливает семью, продавая молоко и молочные продукты. Сейчас её муж находиться в России и по возможности присылает ей деньги на подготовку зимы и другие нужды. Посоветовавшись с мужем, получила кредит  с нашей организации в 2010 году.  На этот кредит она приобрела корову, у которой сейчас уже есть теленок. Новый кредит она собирается также потратить на приобретение коровы, чтобы увеличить поголовье скота.
texts.en: Janatoi is 37 years old, married and has five children.  She has two cows in her household, one of which yields a large volume of milk.  Thanks to this, Janatoi feeds her family by selling milk and dairy products.  Currently, her husband is in Russia and send her money to prepare for the winter and other needs when he can.  After getting advise from her husband, she obtained a loan from our organization in 2010.  Janatoi purchased a cow with that loan, and now this cow has a calf.  She plans to use this new loan to also purchase a cow, in order to increase livestock headcount.

loans.use: to purchase a cow

loans.name: Simon

texts.en:
Simon is 59 years old and married to Ruth. They have five children.

He has been into the business of hawking  medicine and medicinal products for the last 13 years from which he earns a monthly income of KES 15,000. He is applying for his first loan of KES 20,000. He was introduced to KADET LTD by a credit officer.

Simon hopes to use the loan to buy a motorbike to help him move and reach a wider customer base in his business. He plans to use the profits to educate his children.

loans.use: To buy a motorcycle to reach more customers

loans.name: Munavvar

texts.ru: Мунаввар замужем и любящая мать четверых детей. Муж занимается строительством, а Мунаввар занимается скотоводством, а также выращиванием сельхозпродуктов. Муж помогает ей по бизнесу. Из- за не благополучных природных условий она не получила хороший урожай, поэтому из-за недостатка корма для скота она хотела бы получить займ для покупки сена и соломы для  скота, а также на остальную сумму хочет купить 4 голов мелкого рогатого скота. Она надеется на вашу доброту и с нетерпением ждет вашу поддержку.
texts.en: Munavvar is married and is a loving mother of four children.  Her husband is involved in construction work, and Munavvar is involved in animal husbandry and also growing agricultural crops.  Her husband helps her with the business.  Due to bad weather conditions, she did not obtain a good harvest and does not have enough fodder for the livestock.  This is why she wants to obtain a loan to purchase hay and straw for the livestock and also wants to use the rest of the sum to buy four heads of small livestock.  Munavvar relies on your kindness and eagerly awaits your support.

loans.use: to buy small livestock and fodder

loans.name: Loun

texts.en:
Loun is a vegetable farmer. She has had one previous Kiva loan. She hopes to continue her farming business, so she is asking for another loan in the amount of $1,000 to buy seeds, fertilizer, and pesticide.       

Loun is single and lives with her sister in a village about 20 kilometers from Phnom Penh, the capital city of Cambodia.

Photo: Loun is at home, not at the farm. She looks like a man, but she is really a woman.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, and pesticide.

loans.name: Hoeurn

texts.en:
Mr. Hoeurn, 41, is a local farmer who has been living in the Reussey Keo commune. He and his wife are always busy with rice farming, both in rainy and dry seasons. Hoeurn is the father of 4 children, 3 of whom live with him at home, while one is already married and living independently. 

Due to lack of funds, Hoeurn is having some difficulty carrying out his farm work. Therefore, he has applied for a loan from HKL to purchase rice seeds and mineral fertilizers to start growing his dry-season rice crops. In the future, he plans to expand his farmland and increase his output to better his living standards.

loans.use: to purchase rice seeds and mineral fertilizers.

loans.name: Milkah

texts.en:
Milkah is 29 years old and a businesswoman.  She is married to Cornelius, and they are blessed with two children. She has been farming vegetables and fruit for three years with a monthly income of KES 10,000 that she uses to support her family.

She is applying for a second loan with KADET after repaying the previous loan successfully. Milkah will use the loan to grow more green vegetables and fruit for her business. With the anticipated profit from the business, she will educate her children. Her hopes and dreams are to buy a bigger piece of land and open a retail shop.

loans.use: To buy green vegetables and fruits for her business

loans.name: Prima

texts.en:
Prima is a 50-year-old married woman with 6 children. Prima sells food items like banana cue (a snack made from fried bananas) and rice cakes to her community. She also cooks food to sell. Prima also runs a small sari-sari (variety) store where she sells canned goods and eggs. Prima earns 4000 PHP per month.

Prima requested this loan to purchase flour, sugar and more items to sell. Prima hopes for her business to grow.

loans.use: to purchase flour, sugar and more items to sell

loans.name: Phalla

texts.en:
Phalla (pictured here) is 35 years old and her husband Khan is 42 years old. They live in a village about fifteen kilometers from Phnom Penh City. They have been married since 1994 and have five children: two sons and three daughters. Three children are in school and the other two are still too young for school. 

Phalla is a garment worker, while her husband is a construction worker.  She is asking for her first loan in the amount of $1,000 to buy a motorcycle for her children to drive to school.

loans.use: To buy a motorcycle for her children to drive to school.

loans.name: Ajelina

texts.en:
Ajelina is a 40 year old married woman with eight children all of whom are in school. She has had a business of selling charcoal in kator south Sudan for six years.
Ajelina is requesting this loan through BRAC south Sudan to purchase charcoal. she will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase charcoal for sale.

loans.name: Safia's Group

texts.en:
Safia is requesting a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her sewing business. With the loan investment, she will buy a new sewing machine that will allow her to finish her orders on time and prepare better looking clothes for more profits.
She is very skillful and is very creative minded. Her creativity helps her to make different designs of clothes for her clients.
Her husband has a job and earns a low income, which is not enough for the whole family. That is why Safia started her business a few years ago. Now she has a good number of clients in her community who gives her regular orders every month.
She is the mother of a son and a daughter. Her son studied until 8th and is now looking for a job while her daughter is only 9 months old.
Safia is confident that a loan investment will help her earn more profits from her business and she will be able to save some profits for the future of her children.
Note: In the photo, the lady holding a book (called Asasah Passbook) is Safia.

loans.use: To buy a new sewing machine for her sewing business

loans.name: Simon

texts.en:
Simon is 36 years old and a businessman.  He is married to Jennifer. They are blessed with three children aged 13, 8 and 4 years respectively.  Simon has been in private vehicle transport service for the past ten years with a monthly income of KES 15,000 which he uses to support his family.

He is applying for his first loan with KADET after being introduced by an existing KADET customer. Simon will use the loan to service his vehicle. With the anticipated profit from the business, he will educate his children. His hopes and dreams are to buy a piece of land and venture into mixed crop farming.

loans.use: To service his vehicle

loans.name: Tulganoi

texts.ru: Тулганой 53 года, замужем, имеет 4 детей. Её муж пенсионер, также как и она.  Кредитуется в нашей организации с 2009 года. Опыт в откорме скота более 20 лет. Её сыновья и дочь находятся  в Казахстане на заработках. Раньше ее муж работал  на заводе их кишлака, и мог прокармливать всю семью. После распада СССР ни осталось ни одного действующего предприятия , который бы мог обеспечивать их небольшое населения в горном регионе. И основным их источником  доходом  является купля продажа скота и денежные переводы с России или Казахстана. Не надеясь на помощь детей Тулганой  с мужем упорно разводят скот, что бы иметь постоянный доход. На новый кредит Тулганой собирается купить коз и овец.
texts.en: Tulganoi is 53 years old, married and has four children.  Her husband is a retiree just as she is.  She has been obtaining financing from our organization since 2009.  Tulganoi has 20 years of experience in fattening up livestock.  Her sons and daughter are in Kazakhstan for work.  Previously, her husband worked at their village factory and was able to provide for the family.  After the breakup of the USSR, no functioning factory that could support their small population in the mountainous region remained open.  Their primary source of income is buying and selling livestock and monetary transfers from Russia or Kazakhstan.  Not relying on the children's help, Tulganoi and her husband breed livestock in order to have a regular income.  Tulganoi plans to use this loan to purchase goats and sheep.

loans.use: to purchase goats and sheep

loans.name: Ama

texts.en: Ama is married and has 5 dependents. For the past three years Ama has sold cassava and vegetables at the village of Akotokyir near Abura. She uses her income to assist her husband in paying their utility bills. She will use her loan to purchase more foodstuffs and vegetables to sell. With the new profit, Ama will expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more foodstuffs and vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Ann

texts.en:
Ann is 31 years old, a married businesswoman with two children. She has been running a greengrocery for the past three years, earning a monthly income of KES 10,000, which she uses to support her family.

She is applying for her second loan with KADET after repaying the previous loan successfully. Ann will use the loan to buy green vegetables and fruits for her business. With the anticipated profit, she will educate her children. Her hopes and dreams are to buy a piece of land and to venture into mixed-crop farming.

loans.use: to buy green vegetables and fruits for her business.

loans.name: Yaa

texts.en: Yaa operates a grocery shop. She also sells soap at the village of Akotokyire near Abura. She has been selling soap for 13 years now. Her husband is a pensioner, and they have 4 children who are in school. Yaa uses her income to support her husband in paying their children’s school fees. She needs this loan to purchase boxes of soap and a variety of groceries to sell. With the new profit, Yaa will expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase boxes of soap and a variety of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Zubayd

texts.ru: Зубайд житель города Турсунзаде. Он женат. Ему 32 года. У него один ребенок. Он занимается выращиванием овощей для продажи. Кредит берет для закупа семян.
texts.en: Zubayd is a resident of the city Tursun-zoda. He is married and 32 years old. He has one child. He works with growing vegetables for sale. He takes a loan for the purchase of seeds.

loans.use: to purchase seeds

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en:
Rebecca is a 54-year-old married woman with 7 children. Her husband is a fisherman.

Rebecca cooks viands to sell to her community. She also sells fish at the market. Rebecca works hard to support her family. She plans to use her loan to purchase vegetables and meat and to repair her fishing boat. Rebecca hopes for her and her husband's business to grow. She wants to be able to sustain her children's education.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables and meat and to repair her fishing boat.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more plastic bowls to sell.

loans.name: Adel

texts.en:
Adel is a 49-year-old married man and the father of 3 children. For 32 years, he has worked in construction, specializing in cement work. His wide experience in the field has earned him the trust of contractors.

Adel is well-known in the region, and he has a very good reputation. Adel works hard to improve his business, and he often purchases new tools and machines to keep his business up-to-date. Adel is applying for a loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua, in order to buy necessary tools and machines for his business.

This is Adel's first loan with Al Majmoua, and he hopes this loan will be with an excellent experience for future investments. He hopes he can provide his family with the best living and education possible.

loans.use: to buy necessary tools and machinery.

loans.name: Margret

texts.en:
Margret is a 25 year old married woman with three children. Two of them are in school. She has had a business of selling bread in kator south Sudan for four years.
Margret is requesting this loan through BRAC south Sudan to purchase breads. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees of her children.

loans.use: to purchase bread for sale.

loans.name: Ricardo

texts.en:
Ricardo is 33 years old and a married man with 5 children. He has had a "habal-habal" (motorcycle transport) business for 7 years. Ricardo is able to provide for his family's daily needs through his business. He hopes to have another source of income to sustain his children's education.

Ricardo has requested this loan to purchase spare parts for his motorcycle. He hopes to improve his family's quality of life through his business.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts for his motorcycle.

loans.name: Maame Ama

texts.en:
Maame Ama is a petty trader. She sells dresses and underwear at the village of Akotokyire, and she has been in this business for the past 8 years. 

Maame‘s husband is a student, and they have 2 children. Because her husband is a student, she is responsible for feeding, clothing, and paying the school fees for their children. Maame will need this loan to purchase more dresses and underwear to sell. With the new profit, she plans to acquire a shop where she can sell her dresses.

loans.use: to purchase more dresses and underwear to sell.

loans.name: Leakna

texts.en:
Leakna (pictured above), age 23, is single. She lives with her mother and sister in the suburbs of Phnom Penh about 25 kilometers away. Her mother is a rice farmer. 

Leakna is a garment worker. The kitchen where she cooks broke in some parts so she needs to repair it, but she does not have any money. 

Hence she has decided to ask for her first loan in the amount of $800 in order to make the repairs.

loans.use: To repair the kitchen where she cooks.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase maize in bulk for her kenkey.

loans.name: Review Nancy Kajuju

texts.en:
Nancy Kajuju is a 28-year-old green grocer in Mshomoroni, Mombasa.

She is married and has been operating this business for the last two years and she is doing great. 

She was introduced to KADET and this marks her second borrowing to finance her business. She plans to purchase onions, tomatoes, potatoes and kales to supply to the residents to Mshomoromi. She will use the anticipated profits to expand her business further. 

She hopes to have a bigger vegetables kiosk in the future.

loans.use: to purchase onions, tomatoes, potatoes and kale.

loans.name: Malai

texts.en:
Malai and her husband, Sovann, are rice and lotus farmers. In addition, Sovann is also a fisherman. They have been married since 1988 and have three sons and one daughter. One child is a construction worker, another one is a teacher and the other two attend school. They live in a village about seventeen kilometers from Phnom Penh City. 

Malai is asking for a loan of $1,000 to buy seeds, fertilizer and pesticide to maintain her rice and lotus farm. 

Photo: Malai is at home, not at the farm.

loans.use: To buy seeds, fertilizer and pesticide to maintain her rice and lotus farm.

loans.name: Rosalia

texts.en:
Rosalia is 46 years old and is a married woman with four children. Her children are between age 10 and 28. Rosalia's husband is a farmer.
