Su sueño es poder tener una tienda mucho más grande que le genere mejores ingresos y con estos pueda terminar de pagar sus estudios superiores, lo que le permitirá ser Licenciada en Enfermería y tendrá una mejor calidad de vida que brindarle a su pequeño Albeyro.
texts.en:
Maritza is a 21-year-old woman who has a small child that is one year and ten months old. They both live in Maritza's father's house where she has her small grocery store business. 

She was able to begin the business thanks to her father who supported her with the money necessary to start it. Her father previously made a living in this type of business but when Maritza began to work there, she was very enthusiastic. That is why she expanded the variety of products. Maritza tells us that she struggles a lot so that one day she will have a pretty store and will generate the income necessary to always provide a better quality of life for her and her baby. 

Currently, Maritza also has another job where she works twice a week. This job consists of bathing an elderly person (she has been doing for one year). It demonstrates her constant struggle to get ahead. She has another job where she works in a company that sells artichokes. She does not make a large income from that business but she believes that it is always important to have an additional income for her little Albeyro. 

With the help of the Kiva lenders, this hard working and diligent woman will have the opportunity to remodel her store and buy more groceries (rice, sugar, canned goods, etc.) to sell. This will allow her to have a better shop to attend to her customers. They feel happy to buy from her store. Her dream is have a much bigger store that will generate a better income. With this she will be able to finish paying for her higher education so she can get a degree in nursing and provide a better quality of life for her little Albeyro.

loans.use: to buy groceries (rice, sugar, canned goods, etc.).

loans.name: Buenaventura

texts.es:
La socia es la Sra. Buenaventura; ella tiene 60 años de edad y La socia es natural de Iscuchaka, Ella es madre soltera y tiene 1 hijo, la socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de ropa como chompas,pantalones,faldas y polos ella lleva a lugares como Quillabamba,Chumbivilcas y Pilcopata y lo vende en forma ambulatoria,la socia tambien vende choclo con queso en forma ambulatoria,por medio de estos pequeños negocios la socia saca adelante a su hijo,el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde vender la ropa . La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar polos,blusas,pantalones y chompas y tambien para comprar choclos y quesos al por mayor. 

La socia valora y agradece infinitamente el crédito otorgado ya que este le permite crecer con su negocio y mejorar su calidad de vida, así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo estipulado.
texts.en: The member is Sra. Buenaventura. She is 60 years old and is a native of Iscuchaka. She is a single mother and has one son. She continues to work in her business of selling sweaters, pants, skirts and shirts. She sells her clothing in Quillabamba,Chumbivilcas y Pilcopata and sells by traveling by foot. She also sells corn with cheese, selling by foot. It is by these small businesses that the member can help her son get ahead. It is her dream to have a location to sell clothing from. She is requesting this loan to but shirts, blouses, pants and sweaters and also to buy corn and cheese at wholesale. She values and is infinitely thankful for the loan granted, since it will permit her to increase her business and improve her quality of life. At the same time, she promises to make her payments on the stipulated dates.

loans.use: to buy shirts, blouses, pants and sweaters and also to buy corn and cheese at wholesale.

loans.name: Estela

texts.es:
Estela, es natural de San Vicente de Cañete, popularmente conocido como Cañete, esta ciudad está ubicada alrededor de una hora y media al sur de Lima, Cañete, con sus playas de arena, ruinas pre-incas, y la producción del adorado nacional licor de Perú, el Pisco (una especie de aguardiente de uva), ha sido durante mucho tiempo un destino turístico para los peruanos adinerados. Pero la verdadera Cañete es una ciudad cálida y tranquila con una gran población afro-peruana, los restos de un camino indígena, y las influencias del imperio español. La ciudad, junto con otros cerca de la costa del Pacífico, fue dañado durante el 2001 y 2007 terremotos Perú, pero ha soportado como lo ha hecho durante gran parte de su historia. Estela es una mujer que tiene un preciosa hija de apenas 1 año de edad y vive junto a su pareja en casa de su madre.

Ella trabaja en el campo desde hace un año y gracias a esos ingresos y a los que le brinda su pareja pueden pagar los gastos que necesitan asumir como familia. Estela siempre trata de salir adelante y así es como con mucho esfuerzo, debido a que el trabajo en el campo es duro y agotador, ha podido ahorrar un total de S/.3, 000, este dinero se junto con la finalidad de comprar una moto taxi para trabajarla y mejorar sus ingresos. Ella necesita la ayuda de los prestatarios Kiva para pagar la moto al contado y así podrá percibir los ingresos necesarios para brindarse una mejor calidad de vida junto a su pequeña familia. 

Esta idea de negocio le permitirá convertirse en independiente al largo plazo y así con mucho más esfuerzo, dedicación y motivación de su familia, Estela podrá cumplir su sueño de “Comprarse varias motos para trabajarlas y también comprarse un propio terreno”.
texts.en:
Estela is a native of San Vicente de Cañete, popularly known as Cañete.  This city is located about an hour and a half to the south of Lima. Cañete, with its sand beaches, pre-Incan ruins, and production of Pisco, the adored national liquor of Peru (a kind of grape brandy), has been for a long time a tourist destination for wealthy Peruvians.  But the real Cañete is a warm and tranquil city with a big Afro-Peruvian population.  The remains of an indigenous trail are located here and the influence of the Spanish empire is evident. The city, located along the Pacific Coast, was damaged in the 2001 and 2007 Peruvian earthquakes, but it has endured this as it has done over the greater part of its history.  

Estela is a woman who has a precious daughter who is barely a year old, and she lives with her partner in her mother's house.  She has been farming for a year, and thanks to this income and the income provided by her partner, they have been able to pay their family's bills.  Estela always tries to get ahead, and so with a lot of effort, as farming is hard and exhausting work, she has been able to save a total of 3,000 Peruvian soles.  She has been saving up this money with the goal of buying a moto-taxi (light, 3-wheeled passenger vehicle) that she could use to provide transportation services and so increase her income.  She is requesting the assistance of the Kiva lenders so that she can pay for this moto-taxi with cash.  With the moto-taxi, she will be able to earn the income needed to provide a better quality of life for her small family.

The idea of this business is that it will allow her to become independent over the long run.  So with much more effort, dedication and the motivation of helping her family, Estela will be able to achieve her dream of "buying a number of moto's to work, and also buying some land."

loans.use: to buy a moto-taxi

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es: Elizabeth, de 41 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa, además de ser alegre y amable. Es viuda desde hace 3 años, pero vive en compañía de sus hijos de 27, 16, 13, 8 y 7 años de edad a los que quiere mucho, habitando cómodamente su casa propia.  La actividad que tiene Elizabeth es la agricultura tiene un terreno de 5 hectáreas de extensión, la cual compró su difunto esposo hace 28 años. Ahí siembran naranjas, mandarinas y principalmente yuca, contando con  una extensión sembrada de 2 hectáreas, que una vez producida son comercializados en los mercados locales y en la capital. Para ello cuenta con el apoyo de sus hijos. Le gusta su vida en el campo, ya que le brinda tranquilidad, además de las ganancias que percibe para solventar los gastos de hogar. Ella tenía que continuar y cumplir con este trabajo, ya que fue un sueño de su esposo, por ello desea ampliar su producción en más hectáreas de plantaciones de yuca. Este será el préstamo número 3 con la institución MFP, se siente agradecida por el apoyo financiero para avanzar con sus proyectos. Con el monto solicitado de 1500 nuevos soles lo invertirá en el sembrío de 2 hectáreas de yuca en su terreno, para ello comprará semillas de yuca.
texts.en:
Elizabeth, age 41, is a hardworking and persevering woman, in addition to being happy and friendly. She has been a widow for 3 years but lives with her children, ages 27, 16, 13, 8, and 7. She loves her children a lot. They live comfortably in their own house.

. Elizabeth’s business is farming. She has a 5 hectare plot of land which her late husband purchased 28 years ago. There, she plants oranges, tangerines, and, principally, cassava, which she plants on 2 hectares. She sells her produce in local markets and in the capital. She has help from her children. She likes her life in the countryside since it offers her tranquility. In addition, her earnings pay the household expenses. She has to continue and complete this work since it was a dream of her husband. That’s why she wants to increase her planting of cassava into more hectares.

This will be her third loan with MFP. She feels thankful for the financial support which has advanced her projects. With the applied for sum of 1500 new soles she will invest in planting 2 hectares of cassava on her land. For this she will purchase cassava seed.

loans.use: to purchase cassava seeds.

loans.name: Hector Santiago

texts.es: El joven Héctor a sus 19 años de edad es un emprendedor quien lleva tan sólo un mes con su negocio de venta por catálogo de productos para la belleza y la salud, esta idea surgió al ver como a un conocido le explicaban como se hace esta actividad. Con el ánimo de iniciar fuertemente con su negocio y poder llevar a varias veredas del municipio de la ceja localizado al oriente de Antioquia sus productos, el joven Héctor necesita de la compra de surtido que le aporte la materia prima para cumplir sus propósitos y a futuro pueda consolidar su negocio y tener un gran número de clientes.
texts.en: Young Héctor at 19 years of age is an entrepreneur who has been selling beauty and health products by mail order for a month. The idea for the business arose upon seeing an acquaintance run a similar business and they explained to him how to run such a business. With the spirit to begin strongly with his business and to sell his products along several paths of the municipality located to the east of Antioquia, young Hector needs to purchase an assortment of his primary products to introduce to the community so that in the future he can consolidate his business and have a great number of clients.

loans.use: to buy assorted health and beauty products

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal  ”NUEVA LUZ";  El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac; situado en el departamento de Cusco.

La socia;  La socia tiene 30 años de edad, La socia es conviviente, la socia tiene 2 hijos de 10 y 8 meses de edad; la socia se dedica  al comercio minorista, la socia normalmente compra y venta de  celulares  y accesorios de celulares de todo tipo y modelos, la socia por estas fiestas navideñas se ha prestado de su familia un monto para comprar juguetes y poder aprovechar las fiestas y venderlos, ella desea pagar el prestamo y aumentar para comprar accesorios de celular y continuar con su negocio. La socia solicita el prestamo para invertir en la compra de accesorios para celulares y pagar el prestamo de la compra de los juguetes.
La socia se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido mediante el cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Nueva Luz communal bank, located in the Huanchac district in the department of Cusco.

The member, Janeth, is 30 years old and lives with her partner.  She has two children, ages 10 and 8 months.  She works in retail.  Normally she buys and sells cell phones and accessories for all brands and models.  

For this Christmas season she has a loan from her family to buy toys, to be able to take advantage of the holidays and sell them.  She wants to pay back the loan and increase buying her cell-phone accessories and continue with her business.

She is requesting the loan to invest in buying cell-phone accessories and to pay back the loan for buying the toys.

She is committed to making her payments on time in accordance with the payment schedule.

loans.use: to buy cell-phone accessories and to pay off a loan.

loans.name: Buscando Un Futuro Group

texts.es: Esmerita de 24 años de edad, es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos los cuales son menores de edad. Se dedica al negocio de tejido artesanal con el cual tiene 2 años y que empezó a medida de poder obtener ingresos para solventar sus gastos. Comenzó con la ayuda de una de sus amigas, quien le recomendó meterse en el negocio de la artesanía ya que tenía talento para  esto. También es costurera desde hace 9 meses, negocio que también le resulta rentable. Con mucho esfuerzo y trabajo, Esmerita ha podido comprar su terreno en donde piensa construir su casa. Actualmente sus ingresos los destina a los gastos de alimentación y vestimenta, su plan para el futuro es abrir una bodega en su domicilio. Piensa usar el reciente préstamo en la compra de materiales para la fabricación de pulseras, ya que tiene muchos pedidos por campaña navideña. Tiene 4 meses en el grupo el cual está conformado por 7 personas y que se formó gracias a las promociones por parte del analista.
texts.en:
Esmerita, 24, lives with her partner and has two minor children.  She has been working for two years in the business of handcrafted fabric.  She began with the help of one of her friends, who recommended she get involved in the handicraft business because she had talent for it.  She also has been a seamstress for nine months, a business that also is profitable for her.

With much effort and work, Esmerita has been able to buy her plot of land where she plans to build her house.  Currently her income is dedicated to food and clothing expenses.  Her plan for the future is to open a store in her home.

She plans to use the recent loan to buy materials to make bracelets since she has many orders because of the Christmas season.

She has been with the group for four months.  The group is made up of seven people and was formed thanks to promotions by the analyst.

loans.use: to buy materials to make bracelets.

loans.name: Gie Sante Yalla 2 Group

texts.fr: Le deuxième démembrement du groupement d’intérêt économique  Sante Yalla  est constitué de 10 femmes qui évoluent toutes dans le secteur du commerce plus particulièrement dans l’achat et la vente de divers produits tels que produits halieutiques, produits alimentaires, habits, cosmétiques, etc.  Elles habitent toutes la meme localité de l’une des banlieues du Sénégal. Ce groupe de crédit est représenté par madame Diatou, c'est-à-dire la personne  qui a la main levée sur la photo. Elle est mariée et mère de 6 enfants. Elle pratique depuis plus de 10 ans la vente de produits halieutiques (escargots) et de poissons séchés. C’est une activité qu’elle a hérité de sa mère qui était vendeuse de produits halieutiques.  Ce qui l’intéresse  surtout dans son activité c’est l’expérience  acquise progressivement et les chiffres d’affaires importants qu’elle réalise. Elle  est membre d’un des  guichets  de l’U-IMCEC  le  plus proche de son lieu d’habitation. Elle sollicite un crédit prévu  pour l’achat de produits halieutiques et poissons séchés destinés à la vente. Son objectif principal est le développement et le renforcement de son activité dans le but d’en améliorer la rentabilité. Ceci lui permettra d’assurer un bon suivi scolaire à ses enfants et aussi améliorer leur conditions nutritionnelles.
texts.en: The second part of Sante Yalla, a group of economic interest, is composed of 10 women who are all in the retail field, especially in the purchase and sale of various products such as fish, food, clothes, cosmetics, etc. They all live in the same neighborhood in Senegal. This loan group is represented by Diatou, the person raising her hand on the picture. She is married and is a mother of 6. For 10 years, she has been selling snails and dried fish. She found this occupation through her mother, who used to sell the same products. What matters most to her in this business is the experience she gains progressively, as well as the substantial profit she makes . She is a member of her local U-IMCEC branch. She is applying for a loan so that she can buy snails and dried fish she will resell. Her aim is to develop and strengthen her business in order to increase its profitability. This will enable her to ensure proper schooling and better feeding for her children.

loans.use: to buy snails and dried fish she will resell.

loans.name: Unidas Para El Exito Group

texts.es: La Sra. Pelagia tiene 43 años, es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos, los cuales aún dependen de ella. Lleva 2 años siendo cliente de Edaprospo y se dedica al alquiler de cabinas de internet, negocio que lleva el nombre de “Internet Loyola”. Tiene 5 años en este negocio  el cual comenzó con la idea de obtener un aumento en sus ingresos para así poder cubrir sus necesidades. Con su esfuerzo y trabajo, ha podido ampliar su negocio y comprarse algunos electrodomésticos para su hogar. Actualmente ella cubre los gastos de alimentación, agua, luz y teléfono mientras que su pareja cubre las cuotas del préstamo. Su plan para el futuro es remodelar su cabina de internet y dar la mejor educación a sus hijos. Piensa usar el reciente préstamo en la compra de memorias para sus máquinas que da en alquiler. Pelagia pertenece a la alcancía comunal “Unidas para el Éxito”, grupo con el cual lleva 2 años y que está conformado por 7 personas. Tiene 1 año como presidenta del grupo, el cual se formó gracias a la invitación de una de las socias perteneciente a otra alcancía de la empresa.
texts.en:
Pelagia, age 43, is in a common-law marriage and has two children who are still dependent upon her.  She has been a client of Edaprospo for two years.

She rents out internet terminals.  Her business is called “Internet Loyola”.  She has had the business for five years.  She started it with the idea of increasing her income to be able to cover her necessities.  With her effort and work she has been able to expand her business and buy some domestic appliances for her home.

She now covers the food, water, electricity and telephone expenses while her life partner covers the loan payments.  Her plan for the future is to remodel her internet café and to give her children the best education.

Pelagia belongs to the “Unidas para el Éxito” (United for Success) communal bank.  She has been in the group, which is comprised of seven members, for two years.  She has been the president of the group for one year.  The group was formed thanks to an invitation from one of the members of another communal bank with the association.

loans.use: to buy memory for the computers.

loans.name: Manuel Salvador

texts.es: El señor Manuel Salvador a sus 31 años de edad se dedica a trabajar la agricultura desde hace 20 años, aprendiendo esta labor de su padre. Actualmente, el señor  Manuel Salvador tiene cultivos de fríjol y arveja en un terreno alquilado en una  finca de un conocido. Por el invierno sus cultivos se han desmejorado y tienen enfermedades, por lo cual el señor Manuel Salvador necesita de la compra de abonos y riegos agrícolas que le permitan mejorar sus cultivos y producir verduras de calidad, las cuales pueda vender y así mejorar sus ingresos y calidad de vida de su hijo de 7 años y su esposa.
texts.en: Manuel Salvador, thirty-one, has been in agriculture for twenty years, having learned the trade from his father. He currently grows peas and beans on a plot of land he rents on an acquaintance's farm. Over the winter his crops have had disease and done poorly, so Manuel Salvador needs to buy fertilizer and an irrigation system to help them do better and produce a high enough quality of vegetable for him to sell. That way he can increase his income and improve the quality of life for his wife and seven-year-old son.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and an irrigation system for his peas and beans.

loans.name: Nahun

texts.es:
Nahun, de 31 años de edad, es un hombre trabajador y con muchos deseos de superación. Convive con Segundina quien es ama de casa, fruto de esa unión tienen dos hijos de 9 y 4 años de edad, a los que quiere mucho, habitando su casa propia. La actividad que realiza Nahun es la agricultura para eso cuenta con un terreno de 20 hectáreas de extensión que compró hace 8 años tiempo que viene dedicándose a ésta actividad. producto que es comercializado en los mercados de su localidad. Asimismo cuenta con el apoyo de dos peones para las labores de siembra y cosecha, pagándoles un jornal de 20 nuevos soles por día a cada uno. Le gusta su actividad pues lo considera rentable ya que le ha permitido tener un ingreso económico para mantener a su familia, comenta que escogió éste oficio por la necesidad económica y la necesidad de tener un oficio. Ahora con la agricultura se siente cómodo y contento pues lo considera rentable, viendo más alternativas de cultivos. Tiene planes de ampliar su negocio y sembrar más extensiones de yuca ya que tiene bastante demanda. Este será el préstamo número 4 con la institución MFP, comenta sentirse agradecido por el apoyo financiero que viene recibiendo para alcanzar sus objetivos. 
Con el monto solicitado de 1000  nuevos soles, tiene planes de invertir en el sembrio de 01 hectárea más de yuca para poder atender la demanda que tiene este producto, por ello comprará semillas de yuca.
texts.en:
Nahun, age 31, is a hard-working man with a great desire to succeed. He lives with Segundina, who is a housewife. They live in their own home with their two children ages 4 and 9, whom they love very much. Nahun works in agriculture and has a 20-hectare plot of land which he bought eight years ago when he started farming. He sells his produce in the local markets. Two labourers help him with the sowing and harvest, and he pays them each 20 Nuevos Soles per day. He enjoys his work because it is profitable and allows him to have an income to support his family. He says that he chose this line of work out of economic need and the need to have a job. He is happy and comfortable with his job. He has a lot of selection in what he can plant, and therefore it is profitable for him. This will be his fourth loan with MFP. He tells us that he is grateful for this financial support so that he can achieve his goals.
With the requested 1000 Nuevos Soles, he plans to invest in sowing one more hectare of cassava in order to take advantage of this product's demand. In order to do so, he will buy cassava seeds.

loans.use: to buy cassava seeds.

loans.name: Vyuka B Group

texts.fr:
Eric est un commerçant de chèvre et de haricots âgé de 28 ans. Il habite  à Rutegama et Il exerce ce métier depuis  9ans .Il est marié à M Diane ; le couple a deux enfants. Eric a un niveau de la sixième année  primaire.
 Avant  de se lancer dans le commerce, il était militaire. Il a déjà bénéficié 6 crédits de Turame. Le crédit Kiva, lui permet d’augmenter son capital pour implanter une boutique sur la route et satisfaire ses besoins.
Il est membre du groupe communautaire «  Vyuka B  »
texts.en: Eric is a seller of goats and beans. He is 28 years old. He lives in Rutegama and has been in this line of work for 9 years.  He is married to Diane. The couple have two children. Eric completed six years of elementary school. Before launching his business, he was in the military.  He has already received 6 loans from Turame.  The Kiva loan will allow him to increase his capital and open a store on the road and satisfy its needs. He is a member of the Vyuka B community group.

loans.use: to open a store on the road and meet its needs.

loans.name: Dukerebuke Group

texts.fr:
Joselyne est une commerçante de bière  industrielle et Fanta, âgé de 26 ans. Elle exerce son métier depuis 3 ans.Elle habite à Gitega.Elle était élève avant de se lancer dans le commerce.Elle a étudié jusqu’en 10e année secondaire,elle est mariée à  Hermès, ensemble ils ont 2 enfants qui étudient. 
Le crédit Kiva qu’il obtient lui permet d’augmenter son capital et  acheter beaucoup de caisses de bière et Fanta pour gagner plus.
Il est membre du groupe communautaire « DUKEREBUKE»
texts.en: Joselyne is a vendor of commercially produced beer and Fanta; she is 26 years old. She has been in this business for three years. She lives in Gitega. She was a student before launching into this business. She remained in school until the 10th year of secondary studies. She is married to Hermès, and they have two children, who are in schoo

loans.use: to add to her working capital and stock up on cases of beer and Fanta [for sale] in order to increase her income

loans.name: C 1876 Turwanyubukene Group

texts.en:
Vincent is 33 years old and has three children who ages are between 1 and 7 years old and he takes care of four dependents. He sells local drinks and his business is open from 7am until 6pm every day. He currently employs four people to help him. He is the leader of the group called "C1876 TURWANYUBUKENE" in the local language. In the photo, he is the first person on the left side, second line. Vincent has six years of experience.

Vincent has requested a loan from Kiva lenders via Vision Finance Company in order to purchase a large quantities of sorghum to make local drinks. With any profit, he will save money for his future and pay school fees for all the children that live with him.

loans.use: To purchase large quantities of sorghum to make local drinks.

loans.name: Angela

texts.es:
La socia es la Sra. Angela; ella tiene 42 años de edad y La socia es natural de Acomayo, Ella es casada y tiene 1 hijo,la socia ahora se esta dedicando al negocio de venta de mates,la socia vende mates en forma ambulatoria desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 3:00 p.m,la socia tambien se dedica al negocio de tienda de abarrotes,ella vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz,azucar,leche,aceite y galletas,por medio de estos epqueños negcoios la socia saca adelante a su hijo,el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los mates . La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar insumos para que haga los mates como manzanilla,cebada y azucar al por mayor y tambien para comprar arroz,aceite,galletas y leche.

La socia valora y agradece infinitamente el crédito otorgado ya que este le permite crecer con su negocio y mejorar su calidad de vida, así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo estipulado.
texts.en:
This is Angela. She is 42, married with one child, and from Acomayo. Her business is selling mate [a traditional infused drink]. She sells mate on the street from 8:00 am to 3:00 pm. She also has a grocery store where she sells basic staples such as rice, sugar, milk, oil, and cookies. Thanks to these small businesses, she is able to get her child ahead. Her dream is to have a storefront to sell mate. She is requesting this loan for the wholesale purchase of ingredients for making mate, such as camomile, barley and sugar, and also for the purchase of rice, oil, cookies and milk.
She is very grateful for this loan and deeply appreciates it. It will allow her to expand her business and improve her quality of life. She promises to repay her quotas as established.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for making mate wholesale, such as camomile, barley and sugar, and also for the purchase of rice, oil, cookies and milk.

loans.name: Fausta

texts.en: Fausta is 25 years old and a teacher by profession. She has been teaching for 4 years and has no diffuculities in her job. She hopes to build a permanent family home and she is requesting a loan to start the construction of her family home.

loans.use: to construct a family home

loans.name: Omar

texts.fr: Monsieur Omar vit au Sénégal et est âgé d’une quarantaine d’années. Il est marié et père de 4 enfants dont l’âge varie entre 7 mois et 13 ans. Il s’active depuis deux ans dans  la vente de poulets. Il a choisi cette activité a cause de sa rentabilité. Ce qui l’intéresse  le plus ce sont les revenus qui lui sont procurés ainsi que l’expérience qu’il acquiert dans ce domaine. Il est membre de l’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC depuis avril 2006. Il a déjà remboursé 2 prêts antérieurs. Il sollicite un crédit de 500 000 prévus pour l’achat de poulets destinés à la vente en vue de renforcer son stock. L’accroissement de ses bénéfices lui permet de mieux supporter  les besoins quotidiens de sa famille.
texts.en: Omar, in his forties, lives in Senegal. He is married and has 4 children between the ages of 7 months and 13. He has been selling chickens for 2 years. He chose this activity because it was profitable. What matters most to him is the income and the experience he is getting in this field. He has been a member of a branch of U-IMCEC since April 2006. He has already paid 2 loans back. He is applying for a 500 000 loan so that he can increase his stock of chicken, which he will then resell. An increase in his profits will enable him to better meet the daily needs of his family.

loans.use: to buy chickens he will resell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy bananas to make gin for sell this season

loans.name: Rodolio

texts.es: Rodolio, de 36 años de edad, es un hombre trabajador y de ideas firmes con deseos de superación. Convive con Brin, quien es una mujer y ella también se dedica a la agricultura. Juntos habitan en su casa propia en compañía de su pareja y sus hijos de 11 y 9 años de edad. Las actividades que realiza Rodolio, es la agricultura y ganadería, para ambas tiene un terreno de 60 hectáreas de extensión,  en donde realiza un  proyecto que tiene en marcha, como es la siembra de palma aceitera sobre 5 hectáreas, puesto que éste producto tiene bastante demanda, por ser un cultivo alternativo. Asimismo posee 02 vacas a las que cría con planes de hacerlas aumentar en número. Pero para continuar con estos trabajo necesita la ayuda de 06 peones que contrata y paga un jornal de 20 nuevos soles diarios cada uno. Comenta que le agrada su vida de campo pues le ha traído muchas alegrías como los ingresos económicos para pagar los gastos propios de su hogar, así como el ver como marcha sus proyectos, y viendo los buenos resultados que tiene, piensa continuar en su actividad e incursionar en otros productos como la caña de azúcar e implementar su ganadería. Este será el préstamo número 6 con la institución MFP, se siente contento de contar con un apoyo financiero para concretar sus proyectos. Con el monto solicitado de 1000 nuevos soles en la compra de madera como marupa y madera blanca, para implementar su granja de animales.
texts.en: Rodolio, age 36, is a hard-working man with solid goals and a desire to succeed. He lives with Brin, who also works in agriculture. They live in their own home with their children ages 9 and 11. Rodolio works in agriculture and livestock. For these activities, they have a 60-hectare plot of land. They have 5 acres of palm trees, since this is a less common product that is in high demand. Rodolio has two cows which he is raising and planning to breed. In order to continue with his work, he needs the help of six labourers whom he will hire and pay 20 Nuevos Soles per day, per worker. He says that he enjoys life as a farmer because it has brought him much happiness and an income to cover his household costs. He enjoys seeing the development of his crops and the good fruit of his labour. He plans to continue with this work and start planting other crops such as sugar cane. He also plans to expand his livestock holdings. This will be his sixth loan with MFP, and he is happy to have financial support for his projects. With the requested 1000 Nuevos Soles, he will invest in the purchase of wood such as marupa and white wood, in order to better outfit his animal stalls.

loans.use: to buy wood.

loans.name: Mirando Al Exito Group

texts.es: La Sra. Mirsa de 47 años de edad, es conviviente y tiene 4 hijos. Es cliente nueva de la empresa Edaprospo y se dedica a la venta de productos de nutrición. Tiene 3 años en este trabajo el cual lleva el nombre de Herbalife y que comenzó por la recomendación directa de un asesor que la evaluó y la incluyo en dicho negocio con la idea de poder  llegar a ser  la presidenta de la empresa. Con su esfuerzo y trabajo ha podido viajar tanto a nivel nacional como internacional ofreciendo sus productos, también ha mejorado la calidad de vida de muchas personas. Sus ingresos los destina a cubrir los gastos de alimentación, agua y luz. Su plan para el fututo es  dar una buena calidad de estudio a sus hijos y cambiar su estilo de vida. Piensa usar el préstamo en la compra de más mercadería para su negocio. Mirsa pertenece a la alcancía comunal “Mirando al Éxito”, el cual está conformado por 6 personas y que se formó por medio de una de las socias quien incentivo a la formación del grupo.
texts.en: Mirsa, forty-seven, has a common-law partner and four children. She is a new client of Edaprospo and has been earning her living selling Herbalife nutrition products for three years. She started out on the direct recommendation of an advisor who evaluated her and got her into the business with the idea that she could become president of the company. Through her own work and endeavor she has sold her products and made it to the national and international levels. She has improved the quality of life for many people as well. She'll use her income to cover expenses for food, water and lighting. Her plan for the future is to provide a higher-quality education for her kids and to change her lifestyle. She's plans to use the loan to buy more merchandise for her store. Mirsa belongs to the "Mirando al Éxito" [Looking at Success] communal bank, which has six members and was formed on the initiative of one of the members.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Maria Lida

texts.es: La señora Maria Lida a sus 36 años de edad se dedica a prestar servicios de belleza desde hace 14 años. En el año 2009 inicio en el municipio de Marinilla localizado al oriente de Antioquia su propia sala de belleza adecuada en la sala de su casa y con la cual puede generar los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su hogar, sus dos hijos y sus padres. Con el ánimo de prestar un mejor servicio a sus clientes y mejorar sus ingresos, la señora Maria Lida necesita de la compra de productos tales como shampoo, crema para peinar el cabello y tinturas que le faciliten su trabajo y pueda seguir generando los ingresos para su familia y a futuro cumplir su sueño de tener su propio local de belleza en un centro comercial de la ciudad de Medellín.
texts.en: Maria Lida, thirty-six, has been providing beauty services for fourteen years. She started out in 2009 in the town of Marinilla, on the east side of the department of Antioquia. Her salon is located in her house and it allows her to make the money she needs to support her household, two children and parents. In order to better serve her clients and increase income, Maria Lida needs to buy products including shampoo, styling cream, and hair colors. This will facilitate her work and let her keep making money for the family and realize her future dream of having her own beauty salon in a shopping center in the city of Medellín.

loans.use: to buy products for her beauty salon.

loans.name: Las Emprendedoras De La Q Group

texts.es: Sofía de 46 años de edad es separada y tiene 4 hijos de los cuales 2 aún son dependientes. Tiene 3 años como socia de Edaprospo y se dedica a la venta de gaseosa y cerveza, negocio con el cual lleva alrededor de 10 años y que comenzó con la venta de gaseosa para las personas que jugaban en una loza deportiva ubicada frente a su domicilio. Su plan para el futuro es expandir su negocio, ya que compró un terreno en donde piensa construir su local. Ella pertenece a la alcancía comunal “Las Emprendedoras de la Q”, el cual está conformado por 6 personas, y que se formó por la invitación de una de las vecinas. Tiene 8 meses como presidenta del grupo y piensa usar el préstamo como capital de trabajo para la compra de su mercadería, ya que quiere demostrar el emprendimiento que ella tiene para poder sobresalir adelante tanto a nivel personal como familiar.
texts.en: Sofía, forty-six, is separated and has four children, two of whom are still dependent. She's been an Edaprospo client for three years. She has been selling soft drinks and beer for ten years. She started out selling soft drinks to people playing on sports fields in front of her house. Her future plan is to expand her business. She bought a plot of land where she's thinking about building her shop. She belongs to the "“Las Emprendedoras de la Q” communal bank, which has six members and was formed on the initiative of one of her neighbors. Sofía has been president of the group for eight months. She plans to use her loan as working capital so she can buy merchandise; she wants to demonstrate that she is enterprising enough to overcome on both the personal and family levels.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Cesar

texts.es:
César es de la ciudad de Paraguarí, tiene 32 años está casado con la Sra. Cinthia, tienen 1 hijo de 9 años de edad, el cual está en la primaria. Ellos comentan que su hijo es la razón de lucha de ellos.
César  es carpintero desde hace más de 7 años, empieza sus actividades diarias a muy tempranas horas y regresa muy tarde por la noche. El comenta que tiene buena clientela ya que siempre hace muy buenos trabajos y eso le ayuda. Una de las metas de César es aumentar su taller y de esa forma poder recibir más pedidos. Además de eso nos comenta que comenzó recientemente con la actividad de venta de bebidas heladas y productos de primera necesidad, en lo que ya le esta yendo muy bien también.
El solicita el crédito para la compra de bebidas, con lo cual podrá abastecer su nuevo local, y de esa forma cumplir con sus clientes.
texts.en:
César is from the city of Paraguarí.  He is 32 years old and married—he and his wife Cinthia have one son, who is 9 years old and is in primary school.  César and Cinthia say that their son is their reason for striving onward.

César has been a carpenter for more than 7 years.  He starts his daily activities very early in the morning and comes back home late at night.  He says that he has a good clientele, and he does very good work and that helps.  One of César’s goals is to expand his workshop so that he can receive more orders.  In addition, he recently started selling frozen beverages and staple products, and that activity is also going well.

César is asking for the loan so he can purchase beverages.  This will allow him to stock his new business and thus meet the needs of his customers.

loans.use: to purchase beverages to sell.

loans.name: Maryluz

texts.es: La señora Maryluz a sus 32 años de edad es madre cabeza de familia, tiene tres hijas de 10, 8, y 4 años quienes no reciben ningún tipo de apoyo de su padre, por lo que sola la señora Maryluz debe velar por el sostenimiento de su hogar. La señora Maryluz trabaja en casas de familia realizando en estas el aseo y limpieza, pero recibe ingresos muy pocos que no le alcanzan, por lo que necesita de la compra de mercancía tal como tendidos de cama, sabanas, manteles y cortinas para iniciar su propio negocio con el cual pueda generar mayores ingresos para su familia y bienestar de sus tres hijas.
texts.en: Maryluz, thirty-two, is a mother and the head of her household. She has three daughters, 10, 8, and 4, who don't receive any help at all from their father, so Maryluz alone sees to the maintenance of the household. She cleans private homes but doesn't make enough money, so she needs to buy merchandise like bedclothes, sheets, blankets, and curtains to start her own business. That way she can make more income for her family and for the wellbeing of her three daughters.

loans.use: to buy linens to start her business.

loans.name: Ageteraine Kitana Group

texts.en: Deo is a married man with 8 children and the leader of the Ageteraine Kitana group. He sells fish and has been in the business for 8 years. He started as a farmer and later saved to start the fish business. He faces a challenge of seasonal variations in price and high taxes. His family goal is to educate his children and his business goal is to diversify his business to guard against the risks that he is facing in the market. Deo wants a loan to buy fish to sell.

loans.use: to buy fish for sale

loans.name: Amigas De Fe Y Alegria Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “AMIGAS DE FE Y ALEGRIA” iniciará su quinto ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del centro focal Germán Busch, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Ilaria. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: heladería y venta de pescado, brosteria, venta de prensas, venta de papa y queso, venta de salteñas, producción de colchones, venta de comida.

La señora Ilaria,  indica que hace dos años que trabaja en Pro Mujer y que integro la institución por invitación de un asesor. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de ploos a la brosther que viene trabajando hace años.

El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar su capital (compra de viveres) que comprará la Ceja  y posteriormente a la elaboración lo venderá en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, pues ella esta casada y tiene tres hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el compartir.

En al fotografía no esta presente la señora Marcia, ya que ella se encontraba en consulta médica
texts.en:
The Amigas de Fe y Alegría communal bank will begin its fifth cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Germán Busch regional office.  It is made up of eight members and is directed by a board of directors headed by Ilaria.  The businesses that the communal bank members carry out are varied; among them we have an ice cream shop, fish sales, fried chicken, newspaper sales, potato and cheese sales, sales of "salteñas" [fried pies], mattress production, and food sales.

Ilaria indicates that she has been working with Pro Mujer for two years and that she joined the institution on the invitation of an advisor.  Currently she has a "pollos a la broster" [fried chicken] business that she has had for years.

The loan she will get now is to increase her capital buying supplies, which she will buy in La Ceja and after making it she will sell in her space.  This type of work allows her to generate resources to help her family, since she is married and has three children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she responds that she likes sharing.

In the photograph Marcia is not present because she had a medical appointment.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Twizigirane Group

texts.fr:
Médiatrice est commerçante âgée de 30 ans et elle fait le commerce de boutique (savons, sel, fanta, haricôts, etc) Elle habite la localité de Nyamugari et exerce cette activité depuis 3 ans. Avant d’exercer cette activité elle était cultivatrice. Elle  a un niveau de la 6è primaire. Elle est mariée à  Méthode, commerçant de souliers et ont ensemble 3 enfants .Le fils aîné est en 4è primaire.
Médiatrice a déjà bénéficié 6 crédits de Turame.Le crédit kiva, lui permet d’augmenter son capital et diversifier les articles (savons, sel, fanta, haricôts, etc) pour sa boutique.
Elle membre du groupe communautaire « Twizigirane »
texts.en:
Médiatrice is a 30-year-old shopkeeper and sells soap, salt, Fanta, beans, etc. She lives in Nyamugari and has been running this business for three years. Before running this business she was a farmer. She completed six years of primary school. She is married to Méthode, a shopkeeper who sells shoes and they have three children together. The oldest son is in the fourth year of primary school.

Médiatrice has already benefitted from six loans from Turame. This Kiva loan will allow her to increase her capital and diversify the items (soaps, salt, Fanta, beans, etc.) for her shop. She is a member of the community group Twizigirane.

loans.use: to increase her capital and diversify the items (soaps, salt, Fanta, beans, etc.) for her shop.

loans.name: Luisa

texts.es:
La señora Luisa, continua con la administració y el cuidado de sus productos en la agricultura y ganadería, y también la socia compra y vende cereales, ella en esta ocasión desea invertir su credito en la compra de tarwi, quinua, trigo entre otros y venderlos en su stand en uno de los mercados de Urubamba y en el mismo Rayanniyoc. La socia desea invertir el prestamo para comprar cereales e incrementar su negocio.

La socia a futuro cercano desea poder crecer en cuanto a sus negocio y convertirse en comerciante mayorista.
texts.en:
Luisa continues managing and caring for her crops and cattle. She also buys and sells cereals. She would like to invest the current loan in the purchase of cereals, including tarwi [lupini beans], quinoa, wheat, etc., to sell at her stand in one of the Urubamba markets and in Rayanniyoc. She wants use it grow her business, too.

In the near future, Luisa wants to be able to grow the business and become a wholesale vendor.

loans.use: to buy cereals and expand her business.

loans.name: Las Madres Trabajadoras De San Juan Group

texts.es: La Sra. Rosa tiene 52 años, es casada y tiene 2 hijos de los cuales 1 es dependiente. Tiene 7 años siendo cliente de Edaprospo y se dedica a la confección de zapatos para bebes, negocio al cual le puso el nombre de “Confecciones Rosita”. Tiene 15 años en este negocio, el cual comenzó con la idea de poder abrir un negocio propio de venta de lubricantes para autos y motos, objetivo que ya cumplió desde hace 10 años con su esfuerzo y trabajo. Su plan para el futuro es aperturar un nuevo local para así aumentar su mercadería y obtener una mayor rentabilidad. Actualmente ella cubre los gastos de alimentación, agua y luz; mientras que su cónyuge cubre los gastos del alquiler del local. Tiene 8 meses como presidenta de la alcancía comunal “Las Madres Trabajadoras de San Juan”, el cual está conformado por 6 personas y que se formó por un acuerdo mutuo entre las vecinas de la zona. Rosa piensa usar el crédito en la compra de tela para su negocio y así confeccionar más zapatos, ya que por campaña navideña, sus ventas aumentaron.
texts.en:
Rosa is fifty-two, married, and has two children, one of whom is dependent. She's been an Edaprospo client for seven years and makes baby shoes. Her business is called "Rosita's Shoes"; she's been in business for fifteen years. She started out with the idea of opening her own car and motorcycle lubricant business, a objective she completed ten years ago through her own effort. 

Rosa's future plan is to open a new shop so she can increase inventory and make more profit. She currently covers expenses for food, water, and lighting, while her partner covers the rent. She's been president of her communal bank group, "Las Madres Trabajadoras de San Juan" [Industrious Women of San Juan] for eight months. The group has six members and was formed by a mutual agreement among area neighbors. Rosa plans to use her loan to buy fabric for her business and to make more shoes because sales increase over the Christmas season.

loans.use: to buy fabric for her business.

loans.name: Vyuka I Group

texts.fr:
Tite est un commerçant de bière et de beignets, âgé de 49 ans. Il exerce son métier depuis 18 ans. Il habite à Rutegama. Il pratiquait l’agriculture avant de se lancer dans le commerce.
Il a étudié jusqu’en 6e année primaire, Il est marié à Consolate et père de 6 enfants dont 4 étudient. Il est à son 7e crédit avec Turame.
Le crédit Kiva qu'il obtient, lui permet d’augmenter son capital et avoir une grande quantité de bières et beignets à revendre.
Il est membre du groupe communautaire « Vyuka I »
texts.en:
Tite is a 49-year-old shopkeeper who sells beer and doughnuts. He has been in this profession for 18 years. He lives in Rutegama. He was a farmer before going into business.

He studied up to the sixth year of primary school, is married to Consolate and father to six children of whom four study. He is on his 7th loan with Turame.

The Kiva loan which he gets will allow him to increase his capital and have a large quantity of beer and doughnuts to resell.

He is a member of the community group Vyuka I.

loans.use: to increase his capital and have a large quantity of beer and doughnuts to resell.
